line-height: 150%;\">Benjamin Franklin made\na big hue and cry that he vigorously opposed the 1765 Stamp Act ( supported by\nRothschild ). &nbsp;Secretly he installed his\nclose friend to the post of stamp distributor for Pennsylvania. When the Pennsylvanian\nYanks came to know about this <span style=\"color: red;\">double agent</span> nonsense, they stormed his Benjamin's Philadelphia\nhouse and nearly set it on fire. &nbsp; Showing\ngreat acuity, Benjamin Franklin quickly saved his skin, by giving a loud testimony in the House of Commons that\nAmericans don\u2019t like it, and the act was repealed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-iGGxJsgUlko/UKXa-JbYjFI/AAAAAAAAYVQ/LlpcLf71LbI/s1600/imagesGGHJFR.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-iGGxJsgUlko/UKXa-JbYjFI/AAAAAAAAYVQ/LlpcLf71LbI/s1600/imagesGGHJFR.jpg\" height=\"280\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Stamp Act 1765 was a\ndirect tax imposed by the British Parliament specifically on the colonies of\nBritish America. Like previous taxes, the stamp tax had to be paid in British currency, not in US colonial paper money.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<br />\nPunch into Google search <b><span style=\"color: red;\">DIRTY SECRETS OF BOSTON TEA PARTY- VADAKAYIL</span></b>.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All are aware that the\nRothschild dynasty fortune sky rocketed with Amschel Mayer Rothschild-- after\nhe stole Tipu Sultan's gold. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Both his German Jew\nfather ( Moses ) and grandfather ( Kalman ) were money lenders ( of Charles\nDickens&nbsp; SHYLOCK fame ) and were\ncharterers of ships which came to India, and my hometown Calicut. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is on record that Benjamin\nFranklin secretly contributed to the Mikveh Israel Jewish congregation in\nPhiladelphia. Benjamin Franklin was a Slave owner and dealt in Opium too. &nbsp;Yanks are told that he had just two slaves.\nWell what I say is that he was in the slave business. If I am Kentucky fried\nChicken magnate that does NOT mean that my house will be full of chicken.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After\nthe death of his wife Deborah, Benjamin started consuming Opium which is highly\naddictive and started having a sexual romp. He had his propaganda machine\ngiving unsolicited declarations that he consumed Opium to keep his Gout and\nKidney stones under control. But all these diseases did NOT prevent him from\nhis occult sexual enjoyments in the Hellfire club.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His Jewish mother was\nvery concerned that he had joined the Freemasons, and strongly objected. In\ndiplomatic double-talk he advised her not to worry about what she didn't know\nabout.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"As to the Freemasons, unless she will believe me when I assure her\nthat they are in general a very harmless sort of People; and have no principles\nor Practices that are inconsistent with Religion or good Manners, I know no Way\nof giving my Mother a better Opinion of them than she seems to have at present\n(since it is not allow'd that Women should be admitted into that secret\nSociety)... I must entreat her to suspend Judgment till she is better\ninform'd,...\"69 To paraphrase-- So Mom I can't tell you anything more, but\ndon't judge until you're well informed about us\".<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was a Past Grand\nMaster of the Free mason\u2019s lodge at Pennsylvania.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">During his stay in\nFrance, Benjamin Franklin was active as a freemason, serving as Grand Master of\nthe Lodge Les Neuf S\u0153urs from 1779 until 1781. His lodge number was 24. </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-6qKIhf1XbW8/UKXe9KSLZ2I/AAAAAAAAYVg/GjVaku36_Ig/s1600/imagesmg7te.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-6qKIhf1XbW8/UKXe9KSLZ2I/AAAAAAAAYVg/GjVaku36_Ig/s320/imagesmg7te.jpg\" height=\"171\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Before the American War\nfor Independence in 1776, the colonized part of what is today the United States\nof America was a possession of England. &nbsp;It\nwas called New England, and was made up of 13 colonies, which became the first\n13 states of the great Republic. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Why 13 \u2013 pray? &nbsp;Why not 14? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Free Masons have a\ngreat penchant \u2013 nay\u2014fetish for he unlucky for some number 13\u2014and it is all\nover their dollar bills. &nbsp;By the way\nBenjamin Franklin\u2019s face is what you see on the 100 US dollar bill.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-5WgnYSJIMyg/UKXfCyUz77I/AAAAAAAAYVo/NOohl2SU7xo/s1600/dollar_bill_showing_New_World_Order.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"clear: left; float: left; margin-bottom: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-5WgnYSJIMyg/UKXfCyUz77I/AAAAAAAAYVo/NOohl2SU7xo/s640/dollar_bill_showing_New_World_Order.png\" height=\"419\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Franklin sought to\ncultivate his character by a plan of 13 virtues fit for a Free masons . His\nautobiography lists his 13 virtues as: &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>TEE HEEEEEEEE!</b></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\"Temperance. Eat\nnot to dullness; drink not to elevation.\"<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\"Silence. Speak\nnot but what may benefit others or yourself; avoid trifling conversation.\"<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\"Order. Let all\nyour things have their places; let each part of your business have its\ntime.\"<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\"Resolution.\nResolve to perform what you ought; perform without fail what you resolve.\"<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\"Frugality. Make\nno expense but to do good to others or yourself; i.e., waste nothing.\"<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\"Industry. Lose no\ntime; be always employ'd in something useful; cut off all unnecessary\nactions.\"<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\"Sincerity. Use no\nhurtful deceit; think innocently and justly, and, if you speak, speak\naccordingly.\"<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\"Justice. Wrong\nnone by doing injuries, or omitting the benefits that are your duty.\"<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\"Moderation. Avoid\nextremes; forbear resenting injuries so much as you think they deserve.\"<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\"Cleanliness.\nTolerate no uncleanliness in body, cloaths, or habitation.\"<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\"Tranquility. Be\nnot disturbed at trifles, or at accidents common or unavoidable.\"<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\"Chastity. Rarely\nuse venery but for health or offspring, never to dullness, weakness, or the\ninjury of your own or another's peace or reputation.\"<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\"Humility. Imitate\nJesus and Socrates.\"</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During his stays at\nCraven Street between 1757 and 1775, it is well known Franklin developed a\nclose relationship with Polly (Mary ) the daughter of the landlady, Margaret\nStevenson and also and her wide circle of women friends.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In London, his house at\n36 Craven Street &nbsp;was first marked with a\nblue plaque and has since been opened to the public as the Benjamin Franklin\nHouse. &nbsp;In 1998, workmen restoring the\nbuilding dug up the remains of a baby, five children and four adults hidden\nbelow the home.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-X1i_O3bZCEA/UKXl5JG64bI/AAAAAAAAYWc/EL0Y-j--BNo/s1600/downloadffghhj.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-X1i_O3bZCEA/UKXl5JG64bI/AAAAAAAAYWc/EL0Y-j--BNo/s400/downloadffghhj.jpg\" height=\"299\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Times reported on February 11, 1998:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Initial estimates are\nthat the bones are about 200 years old and were buried at the time Franklin was\nliving in the house, which was his home from 1757 to 1762 and from 1764 to\n1775. Most of the bones show signs of having been dissected, sawn or cut. One\nskull has been drilled with several holes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">\n</span></b></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Benjamin Frankin was\nthe only soul to have &nbsp;Two aircraft\ncarriers, USS Franklin (CV-13) and USS Bon Homme Richard (CV-31) &nbsp;simultaneously in commission and in operation\nduring World War II. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-jaiS-3vlGw8/UKXjdr-bvzI/AAAAAAAAYWM/Lw10RF2Mcko/s1600/rry.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-jaiS-3vlGw8/UKXjdr-bvzI/AAAAAAAAYWM/Lw10RF2Mcko/s400/rry.jpg\" height=\"233\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Gen Eisenhower , US\nPresident FD Roosevelt , Winston Churchill , Stalin \u2013 &nbsp;all were Jews.</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A signer of both the\nDeclaration of Independence and the Constitution, Franklin is considered one of\nthe Founding Fathers of the U.S. His pervasive influence in the early history\nof the United States has led to his being jocularly called \"the only\nPresident of the United States who was never President of the United States.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-z5PJ8NQlIU4/UKXmhDf-x7I/AAAAAAAAYWs/Bi8DwRHeNRA/s1600/ffrr.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-z5PJ8NQlIU4/UKXmhDf-x7I/AAAAAAAAYWs/Bi8DwRHeNRA/s320/ffrr.jpg\" height=\"320\" width=\"261\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The very first US postage stamp ( 1847 ) has his face on it.,&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">as he had earned for himself\nthe title of \"The First American\".&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was one of the Committee\nof Five that drafted the US Declaration of Independence.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; Around the time of the signing of this treaty Benjamin Franklin became\nthe first Postmaster General, John Jay the first Supreme Court Chief Justice\nand Samuel Adams served as Vice President under George Washington for two terms\nbefore being elected as the second President of the United States.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These powerful positions were rewards from a grateful Rothschild and his stooge the\nEnglish King.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Founding Fathers\nwere planning to control America for themselves.&nbsp; George Washington&nbsp; may be a hero in the eyes of corporate state\nand federal government politicians but he was actually an opportunist, a great traitor\nto American people.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Washington had a law\nbackground and relied upon the Articles of Confederation to enact his\ntreasonous plan to become King and overthrow the newly created Republic of the\nUnited States. On April 30, 1789 upon his election to the Presidency Washington\ndissolved the organic Constitution for the United States of America signed\nunder the Articles of Confederation and reinstated the Virginia Colony\ncorporation. This effectively eliminated the first Constitutional civilian\ngovernment.&nbsp; It was Washington who initiated\na legacy of military dictatorships within the office of the American\nPresidency.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Washington\u2019s first\nofficial act as president was to install a corporate military government that\nreplaced the constitutional civilian government.&nbsp; This military government is intentionally\nhidden in plain sight and is evidenced by the military terms used to describe\ndesignated federal offices, (e.g.) Commander in Chief, Attorney General,\nAuditor General, Secretary General, Postmaster General, Surgeon General, etc.\nIn other words, every federal office is supervised by a military general.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The organic\nConstitution bound the hands of the President and Congress. As such it had to\nbe eliminated or circumvented. President Washington\u2019s treasonous actions were\nfully supported by the first elected members of the Continental Congress. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Washington intended to\nenlist the support of Freemasons &nbsp;to\ndeclare him as America\u2019s King. To his chagrin his plan failed because he could\nnot secure the influence or support required.&nbsp;\nThis is because many influential colonists were already in the pocket of\nKing George and the Rothschild family. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Washington is lucky to\nhave escaped assassination. George Washington and the Continental Congress\nfeared their treasonous conduct would become public knowledge and result in\nswift and certain reprisal. So they concealed these facts by hiring authors to\nwrite and publish a different account of historical facts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Enough of Washington-- let me get back to our dear old horny Ben!</i></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Hellfire Club was an\nexclusive clubs high society rakes established in Britain , also known as the\nOrder of the Friars of St. Francis of Wycombe.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">This was &nbsp;the meeting places of \"persons of\nquality\" &nbsp;and high power , who\nwished to take part in immoral acts. They were NOT praying or discussing how\nmuch charity to give whom.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">The first\nHellfire Club was founded in London in 1719, by Philip, Duke of Wharton and a\nhandful of other high society friends. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The most infamous club associated with the\nname was established in England by Sir Francis Dashwood. </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Their dark activities included mock religious\nceremonies and partaking in meals containing dishes like Holy Ghost Pie, Breast\nof Venus, and Devil's Loin, while drinking Hell-fire punch. Members of the Club\nsupposedly came to meetings dressed as characters from the Bible and of course bizarre sex.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-d18Wn_va5-I/UKYUsSyWkOI/AAAAAAAAYXk/zUzavnjw5Ag/s1600/hellfire-caves-map-2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">Above: Benjamin Franklin's high profile part of the cave shows that he was indeed a valuable bloke around there.</span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These caves are a man made\nnetwork of tunnels carved out the chalk and flint of West Wycombe Hill and were\ncommissioned by Sir Francis Dashwood himself to be one of the secret meeting places of\nhis libertine society \u201cThe Knights of Sir Francis.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>He got carried away by the\ntunneling done by the Templar Knights at Jerusalem under Solomon's temple.</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nPunch into Google search--<span style=\"color: red;\"> </span><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">SECRET EXCAVATIONS BY TEMPLAR KNIGHTS- VADAKAYIL</span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The West Wycombe Caves\nin which the Friars met are now a tourist site known as the \"Hell Fire\nCaves\". Once you\u2019ve passed the Steward\u2019s Cave the next alcove is Paul\nWhitehead\u2019s Cave named for the poet and satirist who was a member of the Order\nand a close friend of Sir Francis Dashwood.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Sir Francis formed\nhis version of the Hellfire club \u2013 The Friars (Knights) of Sir Francis in 1746.\nit was Paul Whitehead who was appointed to manage the Order as both Secretary\nand Steward.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Over the next thirty\nyears it would be Paul Whitehead who would be the \u201cfixer\u201d and the MC, for the\nvarious secret societies founded by Dashwood including the Monks of\nMedmenham.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His various duties appear to\nhave included the procurement of attractive child prostitutes, political\nadvisor, satirist, speech writing, keeper of the wine and drug lists,\nblackmailer, researcher and master of the minutes.&nbsp; Yes, they actually made a minutes of these shady\nmeetings and a log book.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-JrIwcazoN4s/UKYauvG7IZI/AAAAAAAAYYE/mdwxF5xiHZs/s1600/imagesNY5.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">Above: <i>'Without Ceres and Bacchus, Venus\nwould freeze'. In other words, without food and wine, love grows cold.</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is likely that there\nhas never before or again been a man who knew so many secrets about so many\npowerful British, European and future American leaders.&nbsp; This was a sort of primitive Bilderberg club.</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sir Francis neither employed\nWhitehead for managing this cave.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A week before his death\na messenger arrived at his house and delivered an important letter and then,\nthree days before his death in 1774, he summoned the servants of his home,\nColne Lodge, and ordered a great bonfire be built in the garden.&nbsp;&nbsp; It burnt as a \u201cconflagration\u201d for the next\n76 hours as books and papers were piled onto it day and night.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He is reputed to have declared\n: \u201cNeither history nor my critics shall judge me by my works. No man shall pick\nover my words and divine the sublime.\u201d <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-iw4PMEMgNy8/UKYa5JLKChI/AAAAAAAAYYM/67hzva_xyjI/s1600/hellfire_banquet_IMG_4505.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-iw4PMEMgNy8/UKYa5JLKChI/AAAAAAAAYYM/67hzva_xyjI/s400/hellfire_banquet_IMG_4505.jpg\" height=\"425\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once the last of his\npapers were ashes he took to his bed and within six hours White head was dead\nand gone\u2014he took an overdose of opium.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bizarrely, his will\nstipulated that his heart was to be given to Sir Francis Dashwood and placed in\nan urn for which he bequeathed 50 Pounds for said purchase.&nbsp; When he died in 1774, as his will specified,\nhis heart was indeed placed in an urn at West Wycombe and it was a tourist item.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But alas, it was stolen in 1829. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\">SNIFF!</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://0.gvt0.com/vi/y3vK2qlcheQ/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/y3vK2qlcheQ&fs=1&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/y3vK2qlcheQ&fs=1&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sir Francis Dashwood\nwas a member of the British East India Company , and hence he worked under\nRothschild who owned the company. His father was First Baronet and was in the\nwine business.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Iy5bbyrKGkQ/UKYab4NmZQI/AAAAAAAAYX0/wdH5_5ey_h0/s1600/584112-2654-2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Iy5bbyrKGkQ/UKYab4NmZQI/AAAAAAAAYX0/wdH5_5ey_h0/s320/584112-2654-2.jpg\" height=\"285\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Inside the caves Dashwood\ncreated a bizarre and elaborate tunnel system, with a banqueting hall, an inner temple - and\neven a fake River Styx. </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Everywhere in\nthe tunnels, spooky carved faces leer.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Just up the hill is St.\nLawrence's Church - built by Dashwood, from the ruins of an old Norman tower,\nwhich itself was inside the banked enclosure of West Wycombe Camp - an iron age\nfortification.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-75CABKT2uEw/UKYbNHsGN0I/AAAAAAAAYYc/_bE9PGl4mGI/s1600/hellfire-caves-club-entrance.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-75CABKT2uEw/UKYbNHsGN0I/AAAAAAAAYYc/_bE9PGl4mGI/s400/hellfire-caves-club-entrance.jpg\" height=\"640\" width=\"480\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So the ship\u2019s engineers\ndid the electric arc-welding without use of return current cable, and the PLCs\u2019\nand microprocessors got corrupted. &nbsp;Entire\nautomation went for a toss\u2014as this was team play between panels in Nitrogen\nroom, bridge, ECR, CCR and Pump room entrance. . &nbsp;The solution was to send a Jap makers engineer\n( guarantee period ) half way across the world for repairs , and this would\ncost a fortune. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Kqd8XX9jUVY/UKRtWjvELuI/AAAAAAAAYSk/-vhtGXOXs88/s1600/imagesryuio.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Kqd8XX9jUVY/UKRtWjvELuI/AAAAAAAAYSk/-vhtGXOXs88/s1600/imagesryuio.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Instead a new street\nsmart Captain by the name of Capt Vadakayil was sent. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I am NOT an electronics\nor computer engineer, but I do have the grey matter on how to take automation\ninterlocks and sequential safe guards for a royal ride . &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So we managed to do the\nloading without going off hire. &nbsp;After I\nfinished a contract and went back to the ship after 9 months , they engineers\nwere still cheating the system the same way I did so as NOT to go off hire ( I\nhad kept a written account on how to do this ) . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I did NOT allow this to\ngo on any further, and then a Jap service engineer came and did the repairs.\nEven he could NOT comprehend , how I managed to circumvent the automation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">I&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">am sure</span></span><span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;many of my\nreaders have NOT understood what I mean.<o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-kT3LVtGdOKM/UKRi9mtxaEI/AAAAAAAAYOc/EF0hXn6dFM4/s1600/imageshjii.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-kT3LVtGdOKM/UKRi9mtxaEI/AAAAAAAAYOc/EF0hXn6dFM4/s400/imageshjii.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So let me put a second\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">EXAMPLE BBB )</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I sent to take over\ncommand of a Chemical tanker with Zinc tanks. The ship used to load Methy Tert\nButyl Ether ( MTBE ) . Our inert gas system was IGG not clean Nitrogen plant.\nSo after unloading MTBE at San Francisco, using smoky gas oil burnt IGG, we had\nto go to Jose Venezuela to load lab grade Methanol.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ship was on this run. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">At Panama canal, a British Tank Cleaning Suptd used to embark, to do the final cleaning\nand wall wash tests. This man was paid a fortune just to be on board for 3\ndays. He was sort of indispensable.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The wall wash tests\nused to be done electronically by Mass spectrometer , instead of using lab\nreagents for HC,and Chlorides. The lore on the ship was , that things happen\nlike magic after this Limey comes from UK. Till then the tanks fail miserably in\nthe wall wash.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So after I &nbsp;took over command , &nbsp;the\nBrit came on board. Our zinc tanks were clean already , and was good enough for\nMethanol but was failing on the spectrometer. &nbsp;Jose also\nhas a similar spectrometer donated by the French Charterers. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I gave instructions to\nthe Chief Officer. &nbsp;Once the Brit tank\ncleaning suptd comes on board, he must be watched every time he comes to the CCR\nnear the spectrometer. If he fiddles around with it, I must be called down\nimmediately.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sure enough Chief officer calls me . : Sir, he is fiddling around\nwith the machine right now, he does NOT know that we are watching him\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Jj0OL2mWldg/UKRt5-oDF6I/AAAAAAAAYSs/WVOf_ANPaUo/s1600/imageshjk;;p.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Jj0OL2mWldg/UKRt5-oDF6I/AAAAAAAAYSs/WVOf_ANPaUo/s1600/imageshjk;;p.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I immediately came down\nand caught him in the act , literally with his pants down \u201c Why are you\nfiddling around with the span and sensitivity adjustments? &nbsp;I demand an explanation!. &nbsp;You have just altered the Quadratic equation\ncoding !. So this is how you make yourself indispensable \u2013by shining at the\nexpense of the poor ship staff \u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His face and body\nlanguage explained it all. He could just mumble an apology.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The tanks were clean,\nas they were all methanol sprayed with crew in gas suits with airline breathing&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">apparatus &nbsp;\u2014 it was just that the test\nwas failing on the \u201cdoctored \u201c spectrometer. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-qhll82nNeT0/UKRhVFlvX4I/AAAAAAAAYOM/jsUPFgHmLds/s1600/imagesfhted.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-qhll82nNeT0/UKRhVFlvX4I/AAAAAAAAYOM/jsUPFgHmLds/s400/imagesfhted.jpg\" height=\"261\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let me give a third\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">EXAMPLE CCC )</span></b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I had joined a Chemical\ntanker at load port Amsterdam , as a sailing Superintendent.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The officers and crew\nwere entirely European and Russian. I was to train the crew to do one set of\noperations - a standard loading , a standard discharge and a standard tank cleaning,\ndo a CDI at load port and a oil major vetting at disport and then get off . &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After I left the ship after 6 weeks at the\nFrench disport , I remember being totally drained. &nbsp;&nbsp;It is\nNOT easy to make people UNlearn wrong practices and then learn standard practices.\n&nbsp;This is even though, the 4 senior\nofficers we with me at the Head Office for 10 days of theoretical training. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So when I went to the\nCCR along with the CDI inspector, I saw two Dutch service engineers repairing\nthe tank pressure systems. All 24 Stainless steel tanks when opened out and\nwere at atmospheric pressure were showing all haywire pressures\u2014some positive ,\nsome negative.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So I asked them, how long they had been working on it. They said\nfor about 4 hours\u2014they had boarded as soon as the gangway was down. So I told\nthem \u201c I am the Tech Superintendent . &nbsp;You must stop your work, connect back\nwhatever you have disconnected and leave the ship \u2013 &nbsp;if there is breach of\ncontract we will pay you \u201d . &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-tEXQ8FP3Jx8/UKRsuNVw8WI/AAAAAAAAYSU/Cdx4H69k9Js/s1600/downloadrrrr4.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-tEXQ8FP3Jx8/UKRsuNVw8WI/AAAAAAAAYSU/Cdx4H69k9Js/s400/downloadrrrr4.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Lithuanian\nChief Engineer was a bit shocked. He asked me if I was a Navigator or an\nEngineer. The Dutch electronic service engineers were even more shocked.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After we sailed out I\ntook the Chief Engineer and the Russian Electrical Officer on deck and showed\nthem how to dissipate some static using a jumper wire between two terminals on\na junction box on deck.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every tank had its own junction box with sensors and PCBs.&nbsp; Much later Chief Engineer came to me totally\namused. &nbsp;All 24 tanks were showing\ncorrect readings\u2014 and all it took was a jumper wire.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">WHAT MUST BE UNDERSTOOD\nIS THAT IN THIS YEAR 2012. &nbsp;&nbsp;ALL THIS CAN\nBE DONE USING <span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">A REMOTE CONTROL</span>.</span></b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-jGSOcEaPe5E/UKRjh1De9cI/AAAAAAAAYOk/B0DRT6wgzcg/s1600/downloadbbjjkk.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-jGSOcEaPe5E/UKRjh1De9cI/AAAAAAAAYOk/B0DRT6wgzcg/s400/downloadbbjjkk.jpg\" height=\"240\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So a few months ago,\nthe US drone manufacturers were boasting that nobody can hijack their drones . They\nwere made to eat dirt when a group of students , hacked&nbsp; into&nbsp;\nencrypted video the drones&nbsp;\ntransmitted to US military common bases on the ground.&nbsp; Their Keylogger software&nbsp; infected these systems. Then their hijack\nprogram captured&nbsp; data from UAV\nsurveillance missions, to take over control of the drones. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">This is NO big deal .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;
