font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>VERY SOON CHINA WILL\nSTART MASS PRODUCING HIGH TECH DRONES \u2014AND USA WHO IS HAVING DRONE MONOPOLY (AND\nMISUSING THEM LIKE STATE TERRORISTS) , &nbsp;WILL\nSAY THAT DRONES ARE NO GOOD FOR HUMAN RIGHTS , (LIKE LAND MINES) AND BAN THEM OFFICIALLY\nUSING UNO.</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://1.gvt0.com/vi/q7Oty69mQ80/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/q7Oty69mQ80&fs=1&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/q7Oty69mQ80&fs=1&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">India uses roughly 1.4\nmillion EVMs in 829,000 polling stations in a general election.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1984, the Supreme\nCourt of India held that the use of electronic voting machines in elections was\n\u201cillegal\u201d as the Representation of People (RP) Act, 1951 did not permit use of\nvoting machines in elections.&nbsp; Later, the\nR.P. Act was amended in 1989 incorporating Section 61A.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Djv2zfa0uVU/UKRsBhWHBeI/AAAAAAAAYR8/PQYfIubGdNE/s1600/imagesbjkk.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Djv2zfa0uVU/UKRsBhWHBeI/AAAAAAAAYR8/PQYfIubGdNE/s1600/imagesbjkk.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, the amendment says voting machines\n\u201c<i>may be adopted in such constituency or constituencies as the Election\nCommission may, having regard to the circumstances of each case, specify</i>.\u201d&nbsp; Violating the provisions of the R.P Act, the\nElection Commission has conducted 2004 and 2009 nationwide general elections\nonly using electronic voting machines.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-MJURSA5--2E/UKRsbjU-1YI/AAAAAAAAYSM/V_BeEsoylHI/s1600/imagesbjkooo.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-MJURSA5--2E/UKRsbjU-1YI/AAAAAAAAYSM/V_BeEsoylHI/s1600/imagesbjkooo.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This makes the Sonia Gandhi's ( UPA) election victory (\ngoing by the 1984 judgment of the Supreme Court ) , of 2004 and 2009 &nbsp;illegal.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-LMbat6qz-YQ/UKRgkeOdMLI/AAAAAAAAYN8/k87ubsl6W9Y/s1600/imagesgf68.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-LMbat6qz-YQ/UKRgkeOdMLI/AAAAAAAAYN8/k87ubsl6W9Y/s320/imagesgf68.jpg\" height=\"205\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The electronic voting\nmachines are safe and secure only if the source code used in the EVMs is\ngenuine. Shockingly, the EVM manufacturers, the BEL and ECIL have shared the\n\u2018top secret\u2019 EVM software program with two foreign companies,<b><span style=\"color: red;\"> Microchip (USA)</span></b>\nand Renesas (Japan) to copy it onto microcontrollers used in EVMs. This process\ncould have been done securely in-house by the Indian manufacturers.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Several developed countries in\nthe world rejected Electronic Voting Machines (EVMs) because they are difficult\nto secure, easily subject to manipulation and open to large scale fraud and\npose a serious threat for free, fair and transparent elections in democratic\nsocieties.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">EVMs&nbsp; are allowed in most\nstates of the US only with a paper back up. Indian EVMs do not produce a paper\ntrail, which is&nbsp; a major drawback .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-b-jZXhw0RGo/UKRkT1THMAI/AAAAAAAAYO0/0rJ6dqWM57I/s1600/imageshjk;p.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-b-jZXhw0RGo/UKRkT1THMAI/AAAAAAAAYO0/0rJ6dqWM57I/s400/imageshjk;p.jpg\" height=\"300\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Potential dangers of \u201cvote fraud\u201d and more importantly, lack of transparency\nand verifiability associated with them prompted ban or restrictions of their\nuse. Developed nations like the United Kingdom, France, Japan , Italy, Germany,\nHolland and Singapore have so far stuck to voting on paper ballots, owing to\ntheir simplicity, and verifiability.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>Voter confidence in the Indian democratic system is paramount!.&nbsp; Are we short of man power in\nIndia by any means?<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b style=\"color: magenta; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: x-large; line-height: 150%;\">Sustaining a fair and\nfree &nbsp;democracy is more critical than\nsaving election costs or any gain in efficiency.</b><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>Indian people want\nelections results that can be physically verified, with a paper trail. The\nIndian voter must have a way to know that his vote has indeed gone to the party\nhe has voted for.&nbsp; Otherwise EVM voting\nis unconstitutional .</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-eMOq4WTqBfM/UKRg49nrp3I/AAAAAAAAYOE/fkCvDvzgyIA/s1600/imagesnnml;l.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-eMOq4WTqBfM/UKRg49nrp3I/AAAAAAAAYOE/fkCvDvzgyIA/s400/imagesnnml;l.jpg\" height=\"400\" width=\"314\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For example The EVM voting in Ukraine was all rigged as\nper CIA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Paper trail means , an EVMs\nshould print a paper record of each vote. This paper must be deposited in a\nconventional ballot box. This ensures physical evidence and speedy results. A\nVoter Verified Paper Ballot (VVPB) provides an auditable way to assure voters\nthat their ballots will be available to be counted.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Without VVPB there is no\nway to independently audit the election results.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">A decision in favour of\ninstalling a printer would mean upgrading over 14 lakh EVMs used in elections.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Provision of printed\nballot papers would enable officials to recount the votes in case of any\ndispute between candidates when a narrow victory margin is involved.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-zLQQMyq-uzM/UKRnveD1ENI/AAAAAAAAYQ0/9ocXfY92InQ/s1600/WO-AL482_ORPHAN_G_20121019174437.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-zLQQMyq-uzM/UKRnveD1ENI/AAAAAAAAYQ0/9ocXfY92InQ/s400/WO-AL482_ORPHAN_G_20121019174437.jpg\" height=\"265\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">Above Lynn and Evelyn Rothschilds in their Chennai NGO.</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the Netherlands, in\n2006, licenses of 1,187 EVMs were withdrawn after citizen group `We do not\ntrust voting machines` showed they could hack into EVMs in 5 minutes from up to\n40 metres without the knowledge of voters or election officials. The nation\nwill return to paper voting.\u201d </span><i style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">(Publication: ComputerWorld, Dt: 19-05-2008,\nAuthor: Andreas Udo de Haes</i><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">)</span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the Indian\nNational Congress surpassed all projections and shocked the nation, to win 262\nseats in 2009,&nbsp; According&nbsp; to&nbsp; Dr.\nSubramanian Swamy, President of the Janata Party (24-8-2010) , the&nbsp; Leader of Indian National Congress Mrs. Sonia\nGandhi reportedly hired hackers to hack into election results of the electronic\nvoting machines, which resulted in landslide victory of the Indian National\nCongress in the national elections in 2009. (<i>Electronic Voting Machine: Excellent\ntool of manipulation- by News Desk, December 17,\n2011-http://www.weeklyblitz.net/1993/electronic-voting-machine-excellent-tool)</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://3.gvt0.com/vi/QdpGd74DrBM/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/QdpGd74DrBM&fs=1&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/QdpGd74DrBM&fs=1&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Above: This video went viral in USA--f<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">raudulent voting\nmachine in Pennsylvania alters the vote from Obama to Romney</span></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">Voting is a fundamental\nright and this process is what &nbsp;democracy\nis all about.<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"> There must be a way for a voter to cast a REJECT vote, where he\nrejects all the rotten eggs he has to choose from</span>. If the REJECT votes win, the\nelections must be held again with fresh candidates.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Uavg_eXSiUY/UKRgCiH7DII/AAAAAAAAYNk/fJSv4xR4RCE/s1600/imageshyrk76.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Uavg_eXSiUY/UKRgCiH7DII/AAAAAAAAYNk/fJSv4xR4RCE/s1600/imageshyrk76.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The EVMs were devised\nand designed by Election Commission of India in collaboration with two Public\nSector undertakings viz., Bharat Electronics Limited, Bangalore and Electronics\nCorporation of India Limited, Hyderabad. The EVMs are now manufactured by the\nabove two undertakings.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">EVMs were first used in\n1982 in the by-election to North Paravur Assembly Constituency of Kerala for a\nlimited number of polling stations (50 polling stations)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">EVMs are powered by an\nordinary 6 volt alkaline battery manufactured by Bharat Electronics Ltd.,\nBangalore and Electronic Corporation of India Ltd., Hyderabad. This design\nenables the use of EVMs throughout the country without interruptions because\nseveral parts of India do not have power supply and/or erratic power supply.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Currently, an EVM can\nrecord a maximum of 3840 votes, which is sufficient for a polling station as\nthey typically have no more than 1400 voters assigned. Currently, an EVM can\ncater to a maximum of 64 candidates. There is provision for 16 candidates in a\nBalloting Unit.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-SCTBx6eG14U/UKRpL_Ox36I/AAAAAAAAYQ8/UzenpvfiC3Q/s1600/imagesfghkii.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-SCTBx6eG14U/UKRpL_Ox36I/AAAAAAAAYQ8/UzenpvfiC3Q/s400/imagesfghkii.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the total number of candidates exceeds 16, a second\nBalloting Unit can be linked parallel to the first Balloting Unit and so on\ntill a maximum of 4 units and 64 candidates. The conventional ballot paper/box\nmethod of polling is used if the number of candidates exceeds 64.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The EVMs cannot be\npre-programmed to favour a party or a candidate because the order in which the\nname of a candidate/party appears on the balloting unit depends on the order of\nfiling of nominations and validity of the candidature, this sequence cannot be\npredicted in advance. Further, the selection of EVMs for polling stations is\nrandomized by computer selection preventing the advance knowledge of assignment\nof specific EVMs to polling stations.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-wqJR3VeF7u4/UKRgRvReCtI/AAAAAAAAYNs/qok4Wd3EZ0c/s1600/jjhyt.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-wqJR3VeF7u4/UKRgRvReCtI/AAAAAAAAYNs/qok4Wd3EZ0c/s400/jjhyt.jpg\" height=\"293\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The general process of EVM\nvoting is as follows:</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1. The voter checks\nin&nbsp; with the voter\u2019s ID&nbsp; with poll workers .&nbsp; The&nbsp;\npolling personnel and the agents verify the name&nbsp; and identify the voter .&nbsp; They obtained signature or thumb print of the\nvoter . To prevent double voting, they mark the voter\u2019s right index finger with\nindelible ink<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2. Next, a poll worker\npresses the BALLOT button on the control unit to allow one vote. This\ncauses&nbsp; a green READY light to glow on\nthe ballot unit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3. The voter enters the\npolling booth and presses the blue button for the candidate of his or her choice. A\nred light next to the candidate button glows, the ready light turns off, and\nthe control unit emits a loud beep to indicate that the vote has been cast. The\nred light then turns off automatically. This process repeats for each voter.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ioScyYfLMT8/UKRrCbievxI/AAAAAAAAYRk/sjev0JzCQM8/s1600/imageskklpp.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ioScyYfLMT8/UKRrCbievxI/AAAAAAAAYRk/sjev0JzCQM8/s1600/imageskklpp.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4. At the end of the\npoll, the presiding officer removes a plastic cap on the control unit and\npresses the CLOSE button, which prevents the EVM from accepting further votes.\nThe ballot unit is disconnected and the control unit is placed in storage until\nthe public count, which may occur weeks later.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">5. On the counting day,\nthe control units are delivered to a counting centre. In public view, an election&nbsp; official breaks a seal on the control unit\nand presses the RESULT button . The display on the control unit shows a\nsequence of outputs: the number of candidates, the total votes, and the number\nof votes received by each candidate.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">6. The Counting\nofficials manually record the totals from each machine and add them together to\ndetermine the results of the election. The machines are then placed in storage\nuntil the next election<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-HnAwpnjx_Ko/UKReM1J-11I/AAAAAAAAYNU/grejxlrYMK4/s1600/imagesbteu4.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-HnAwpnjx_Ko/UKReM1J-11I/AAAAAAAAYNU/grejxlrYMK4/s320/imagesbteu4.jpg\" height=\"131\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">EVM manipulations can be via hardware of software.&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">As of 2012, Indian EVMs\u2019 are solely dependent on\nimporting the microchips used in them. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Computer-based voting\nmachines can have software bugs or even election-rigging malicious software in\nthem.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The 2010 discovery of\nthe Stuxnet cyberweapon, which used a thumb drive to attack Iran\u2018s nuclear\nfacilities and spread among its computers, illustrated how one type of attack\ncould work</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">Dr. Alex Halderman, professor of computer science in the University of Michigan says, \u201cEVMs used in the West require software attacks as they are sophisticated voting machines and their hardware cannot be replaced cheaply. In contrast, the Indian EVMs can easily be replaced either in part or as wholesale units.\u201d&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<div style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One crucial part that\ncan be faked is microcontrollers used in the EVMs in which the software is\ncopied. EVM manufacturers have greatly facilitated fraud by using generic\nmicrocontrollers rather than more secure ASIC or FPGA microcontrollers. Not\njust only microcontrollers, mother boards (cards which contain\nmicrocontrollers) and entire EVMs can be replaced.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Pm0V3uBX_R8/UKRgaOdBbVI/AAAAAAAAYN0/8aqcxlvjEGA/s1600/imagesyy8o.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Pm0V3uBX_R8/UKRgaOdBbVI/AAAAAAAAYN0/8aqcxlvjEGA/s400/imagesyy8o.jpg\" height=\"254\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Neither the Election\nCommission nor the manufacturers have undertaken any hardware or software audit\ntill date. As a result, such manipulation attempts would go undetected. To\ndetect such fraud, the upgraded EVMs have a provision to interface with an\nAuthentication Unit that would allow the manufacturers to verify whether the\nEVM being used in the election is the same that they have supplied to the\nElection Commission.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The EVM manufacturers\ndeveloped an \u201cAuthentication Unit\u201d engaging the services of SecureSpin, a\nBangalore based software services firm. The Unit was developed and tested in\n2006 but when the project was ready for implementation, the project was\nmysteriously shelved .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In normal operation,\nthe EVM limits the rate of voting to no more than 5 per minute. However,\nClip-on&nbsp; device bypasses the software\nrestrictions of the EVM, so an attacker is able to again forcibly take control\nof an EVM and stuff the electronic \u201cballot box\u201d with any number of votes. These\nattacks are easy to perform, but they would be hard to detect or defend\nagainst.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dishonest insiders or\nother criminals with physical access to the machines at any time before ballots\nare counted can insert malicious hardware that can steal votes for the lifetime\nof the machines.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-WCfdaBacTYw/UKRj5ZnRrrI/AAAAAAAAYOs/bJWur3dFHEU/s1600/imageshuioo.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-WCfdaBacTYw/UKRj5ZnRrrI/AAAAAAAAYOs/bJWur3dFHEU/s400/imageshuioo.jpg\" height=\"245\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Any computer software\nis basically generated from software programming and coding. And all these soft\nwares could be tampered with by a computer programmer who knows the source\ncode. Testing electronic voting systems for security problems, especially if they\nwere intentionally introduced and concealed, is basically impossible. If\nmalicious coding is inserted by programmers into commercial software that are\ntriggered by obscure commands , the election results can change completely.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-0I-7owoAPLk/UKRrN7ySEpI/AAAAAAAAYRs/IkF8K9IBbWA/s1600/downloadbhhyy.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-0I-7owoAPLk/UKRrN7ySEpI/AAAAAAAAYRs/IkF8K9IBbWA/s1600/downloadbhhyy.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The votes that are cast\nusing the electronic voting machines, are stored in a safe storage or space in\nthe computer machine memory.&nbsp; The time\ngap between election and the counting of votes is a risk to possible hacking\nand manipulation .&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An Indian AVM can be\nhacked by &nbsp;just inserting a simple chip\nbehind the display section of the control unit, which would go unnoticed. When\nthe results button is pressed on the counting day and the results begin to\nflash on the display screen of the control unit, the Trojan in the inserted chip\nwill get activated. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-xqGVOOXObuM/UKRpWbNcX3I/AAAAAAAAYRE/yvxbe3ka40E/s1600/downloadghkoo.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-xqGVOOXObuM/UKRpWbNcX3I/AAAAAAAAYRE/yvxbe3ka40E/s400/downloadghkoo.jpg\" height=\"271\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Alex Halderman, a\nresearcher at the University of Michigan, and a colleague at Princeton\nUniversity hacked into a paperless touch-screen voting machine in 2010 and\ninstalled the video game Pac-Man. That lab exercise took three afternoons but\ndid not break any tamper-proof seals and left no traces.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Similarly, he and\nPrinceton researchers in 2006 demonstrated that if someone could get a few\nminutes\u2019 unattended access to a paperless machine, that person could install a\nsoftware virus that could spread to other machines and switch those machines\u2019\nvotes before deleting all traces of itself.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-QJr-aXE2Bbc/UKRsKeGIm1I/AAAAAAAAYSE/QOpjQ3xGbOg/s1600/imageshjioo.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-QJr-aXE2Bbc/UKRsKeGIm1I/AAAAAAAAYSE/QOpjQ3xGbOg/s1600/imageshjioo.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In fact, Dr. Halderman\nquips, he has a paperless e-voting machine in his office now. It plays the\nUniversity of Michigan fight song \u201con command because I hacked it,\u201d .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Where is the\nintelligence in physically securing machines with seals? If a seal is broken,\nwhat can be done? Votes can be recounted only if the machines gave a printout.. Dont ever foregt that o</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">nly electronic records\ncan be changed.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-TeDhaemHSJM/UKRtCJ40NMI/AAAAAAAAYSc/9C8XPFM01x8/s1600/imagesfgyy.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-TeDhaemHSJM/UKRtCJ40NMI/AAAAAAAAYSc/9C8XPFM01x8/s1600/imagesfgyy.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For an election to be\nfree and fair, then if the\nresults are in doubt, the ballots can be checked and counted again by a\ndifferent set of people/machines. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">With EVMs, there is no\nmechanism to do a fresh count.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\">The individual voter must be assured that the candidate he casts his vote for,</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\">actually gets that vote.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In a video, Hari K.Prasad &nbsp;(&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Managing Director of\nNetIndia Group Of Companies),&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prof J. Alex Halderman ( E</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">lectrical engineering\nand computer science at the University of Michigan &nbsp;)&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">and Rop Gonggrijp demonstrate two kinds of attacks\nagainst a real Indian EVM. </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">One attack\ninvolves replacing a small part of the machine with a look-alike component that\ncan be silently instructed to steal a percentage of the votes in favour of a\nchosen candidate. These instructions can be sent wirelessly from a mobile\nphone by SMS.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-X6BauqFTCR0/UKRelZ3VbSI/AAAAAAAAYNc/WM-1_syLA-M/s1600/downloadytr+y.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-X6BauqFTCR0/UKRelZ3VbSI/AAAAAAAAYNc/WM-1_syLA-M/s320/downloadytr+y.jpg\" height=\"240\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Another attack uses a pocket-sized device to change the votes stored in\nthe EVM between the election and the public counting session, which in India\ncan be weeks later.</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">These attacks are\nneither complicated nor difficult to perform, but they would be hard to detect\nor defend against. The best way to prevent them is to count votes using paper\nballots that voters can see.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://2.gvt0.com/vi/ZlCOj1dElDY/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/ZlCOj1dElDY&fs=1&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/ZlCOj1dElDY&fs=1&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">See video above: The 2009 elections where Sonia Gandhi won , was a surprise to all Indians --check out the blue tooth technology in hijacking the EVM.&nbsp;</span></i></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-YP25Pz3tt60/UKP8JYrmpQI/AAAAAAAAYJE/GPqGRxxwBAs/s1600/htrur.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-YP25Pz3tt60/UKP8JYrmpQI/AAAAAAAAYJE/GPqGRxxwBAs/s400/htrur.jpg\" height=\"280\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hari Prasad Vemuru, a\njailed Indian e-voting researcher, is one of the four winners of the 2010\nPioneer Awards of San Francisco headquartered Electronic Frontier Foundation\n(EFF), a leading civil liberties group. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">How do you like this?&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Instead of feeling happy\nthat an Indian \u2013an expert security researcher-- &nbsp;Hariprasad &nbsp;Vemuru, revealed serious flaws in our EVMs\u2019 ,\nhe was jailed by UPA. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Initially Prasad spent\na year trying to convince the government , but they insisted that the Indian\nEVMs\u2019 government-made machines were \u2018perfect\u2019 and \u2018tamperproof '.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>This is the\npathetic state of India under WTE ( waitress turned empress ) rule.&nbsp;</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is no security\nconcern per se in procuring microcontrollers from foreign manufacturers as this\nis merely a piece of hardware. After procuring the microcontrollers from these\nmanufacturers, the EVM manufacturers, namely the BEL and ECIL, could have fused\nprogram in the microcontrollers, as \u201cOne Time Programmable \u2013 Read Only Memory\n(OTP-ROM)\u201d chips, in their own manufacturing premises. This would have ensured\nthat the program in the microchips remained secure.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In compliance with UN\nResolution 660, Iraqi forces began their withdrawal from Kuwait on February 26,\n1991.&nbsp; Saddam Hussein proactively\nannounced this on Baghdad radio the same day and eye witnesses in Kuwait\nconfirmed that Iraqi forces were leaving that afternoon. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-BaUn4tJV2k4/UKHNiMQE7RI/AAAAAAAAX30/RUnm0CJ1tHI/s1600/imagesjjuu.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\">White House spokesman\nMarlin Fitzwater declared that US forces would NOT attack the Iraqi forces in\nretreat, as they were doing so in compliance with UN resolution 660 of 2nd Aug\n1990 . </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b> and did NOT take any hostages from Kuwait with him.</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Saddam Hussain's\nelite troops were withdrawing from Kuwait, with a UN sponsored white flag\n--they bombed the first and last trucks of the 60 miles long convoy,\neffectively boxing them into a huge traffic jam , and making them sitting ducks\n-- and decimated them with Napalm, Phosphorus incendiary bombs, outlawed under\n1977 Geneva protocol.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; Mechanized artillary units were in ambush\noverlooking from nearby hills. The whole job was quick and calculated, and\napparently cannot be done without direct sanction from President Bush.</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A huge percentage of\nthem were half alive, we are talking about several thousands, when waiting\nbulldozers ( tanks specially fitted with bulldozer blades ) operated by\nmercenaries shoved them into more than 50 huge ready made large ditches on the\nroad side and covered them with sand. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">60 long miles of double\nline convoy of 2100 trucks laden with soldiers who have wives and children.</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">No clues! On\nOctober 10, 1990, the U.S. Congressional Human Rights Caucus held a hearing on\nthe subject of Iraqi human rights violations.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-6la8-7ilnI8/UKHPxEGA0LI/AAAAAAAAX48/XlgeC13nL2Q/s1600/imagesl76.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-6la8-7ilnI8/UKHPxEGA0LI/AAAAAAAAX48/XlgeC13nL2Q/s1600/imagesl76.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The centerpiece of the\nevent was the emotional testimony of a 15-year-old Kuwaiti girl, known only by\nher first name, Nayirah.&nbsp; Her full name\nwas supposedly being kept secret to protect her from Iraqi reprisals. The girl\nrelayed a shocking story while sobbing uncontrollably .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\" I volunteered at\nthe al-Addan hospital. While I was there, I saw the Iraqi soldiers come into\nthe hospital with guns, and go into the room where . . . babies were in\nincubators. They took the babies out of the incubators, took the incubators,\nand left the babies on the cold floor to die.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://2.gvt0.com/vi/LmfVs3WaE9Y/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/LmfVs3WaE9Y&fs=1&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/LmfVs3WaE9Y&fs=1&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Above the lying girl -- lying through her teeth!! &nbsp;even a idiot can see from her body language that she is faking it.</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The massacre never\noccurred. The lying girl Nayirah's last name was al-\u1e62aba\u1e25 and she was actually\nthe daughter of Saud bin Nasir Al-Sabah, the Kuwaiti ambassador to the United\nStates. font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1921, the famous\nAmerican journalist Walter Lippmann said that the art of democracy requires\nwhat he called the \u201cmanufacture of consent.\u201d&nbsp;\nThis phrase is an Orwellian euphemism for thought control.&nbsp; The idea is that in a state such as the U.S.\nwhere the government can\u2019t control the people by force, it had better control\nwhat they think.&nbsp; \u2026 Propaganda is to\ndemocracy what bludgeon violence is to totalitarianism.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; We are the tools and vassals of rich men behind the scenes. We are the\njumping jacks, they pull the strings and we dance.
