We are\nintellectual prostitutes.\u201d \u2013 <i>\u201cJohn Swinton, Chief of Staff New York Times at\nNew York Press Club, 1953\u2033</i><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-qe3V-ckZnwo/UKHJXYXyUDI/AAAAAAAAX08/GOtGXFPqpdI/s1600/imagesiojntg.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-qe3V-ckZnwo/UKHJXYXyUDI/AAAAAAAAX08/GOtGXFPqpdI/s1600/imagesiojntg.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is the naked truth\nabout most modern journalism. When they first become a career media worker they\nstart off with some values . Soon they start climbing the ladder, and then they\nprostitute themselves. It\u2019s as common as it\u2019s straightforward. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-vxEqPXmqZxQ/UKHQWL8F3YI/AAAAAAAAX5M/7mRCP7HHrUk/s1600/imagestte453.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"216\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-vxEqPXmqZxQ/UKHQWL8F3YI/AAAAAAAAX5M/7mRCP7HHrUk/s320/imagestte453.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you start off your play with a big ball\u2014like\na football , as your climb higher your balls get smaller , to a tennis ball\nsize. When you reach the top level and your balls get really small like a golf\nball. You become a stooge.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On the ship which I command, I do NOT allow a camera when disaster strikes. The camera has the tendency to make men out of mice and mice out of men. This is one times we our people to be true to themselves, without playing to the gallery. When you play to the gallery , when s#it hits the fan on a Chemical tanker, lives get lost.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-E01HdLEHRFQ/UKHKVQFCzlI/AAAAAAAAX1s/fZPKC3JuJZI/s1600/imagesiiujnnbvv.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-E01HdLEHRFQ/UKHKVQFCzlI/AAAAAAAAX1s/fZPKC3JuJZI/s1600/imagesiiujnnbvv.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Embedded journalism is\nall about selected and \u201c trained to lie \u201c news reporters being attached to\nmilitary units involved in armed conflicts. &nbsp;It first came to be used in the media coverage\nof the 2003 invasion of Iraq. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At the\nstart of the war in March 2003, as more than 700 reporters and photographers (\nofficial count \u2013actual were much more ) were traveling as embedded journalists.\nThese reporters signed contracts with\nthe US and British&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\">military . The stage was set to mislead and misinform the world during their war against Iraq \u2014 aided by these compliant \u201cembedded\u201d journalists.</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-JQuewOC_zNs/UKHWIZcvQbI/AAAAAAAAX8U/kSVyZMR-gfA/s1600/imagesjhyr.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-JQuewOC_zNs/UKHWIZcvQbI/AAAAAAAAX8U/kSVyZMR-gfA/s1600/imagesjhyr.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When asked why the\nmilitary decided to embed journalists with the troops, Lt. Col. Rick Long of\nthe U.S. Marine Corps replied, \"Frankly, our job is to win the war. Part\nof that is information warfare. So we are going to attempt to dominate the\ninformation environment.\" So it is about the US military wanting to get\ntheir own lies and black propaganda told.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-vCRGLQ2h83U/UKHLyBbAPnI/AAAAAAAAX20/Ncs5RjVJVB0/s1600/images4t5t.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-vCRGLQ2h83U/UKHLyBbAPnI/AAAAAAAAX20/Ncs5RjVJVB0/s1600/images4t5t.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">As one US embedded\nreporter said \u201c We were a propaganda arm of the US government. &nbsp;At the start the censors enforced that, &nbsp;but by the end we were our own censors. We\nwere the cheerleaders of a immoral and brutal war\u201d.</span></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is NIL ethics in embedded\njournalism . &nbsp;It is just a lame propaganda\ncampaign and an effort to keep reporters away from civilian populations . &nbsp;They want only \u201ctheir type\u201d of reporters who\nare sympathetic to invading the forces and prepared to lie and toe the line. It is a media circus.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-wSQmDu091ps/UKHT3Ej3I2I/AAAAAAAAX7s/pH6NLElluDw/s1600/imagesomnvf.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-wSQmDu091ps/UKHT3Ej3I2I/AAAAAAAAX7s/pH6NLElluDw/s1600/imagesomnvf.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most of the embedded\nreporters were just plain scared of losing their jobs and being black balled\nfor ever, for they could ill afford to take on the US military and the US\ngovernment simultaneously. The traitor label is hard to erase , one it is stuck\non you by a vindictive force. They submitted like prostitutes and converted\nthemselves into stenographers instead of journalists. Feelings of camaraderie\nalways affect a journalist's ability to be independent and objective.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is high time every\njournalist is made to take an oath like how a doctor takes a Hippocratic oath.\nThe Hippocratic Oath is an oath historically taken by doctors and physicians,\nswearing to practice medicine ethically and honestly.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-FXZv2tr-14s/UKHHOrWwAiI/AAAAAAAAXz0/0WWv_XP2Uzc/s1600/imageshjnbtt.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-FXZv2tr-14s/UKHHOrWwAiI/AAAAAAAAXz0/0WWv_XP2Uzc/s400/imageshjnbtt.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\">Walter Rogers, from CNN, told that some of his colleagues had\ntaken to wearing US military uniform, which they are NOT allowed to do.&nbsp; Some journalists even found themselves\nactively helping in the practical military effort.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They had little\nchoice-who want to be DIS-embedded in the middle of a desert war. The embedded\nreporter cannot report the truth. Do you thing he could report a war crime?. He\ncould get eliminated in \"friendly fire\". Ten journalists died in\nfriendly fire. If an embedded journalist was to report unfavorably on coalition\nforces they were accompanying they would not get any cooperation. This means he\nhad to report bravery and never cowardice\u2014if he wanted to survive.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-M9-3cBHaQDs/UKHIO3hjdFI/AAAAAAAAX0c/504J8PpS59w/s1600/imagesu6655r.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"305\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-M9-3cBHaQDs/UKHIO3hjdFI/AAAAAAAAX0c/504J8PpS59w/s400/imagesu6655r.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">US military spokesman,\nJim Wilkinson was blunt on his attitude to the \u201cunilaterals\u201d ( the ethical guys).\n\u201cThey were a pain in our rear a lot of times,\u201d Wilkinson told a documentary.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The \u201creal superstars of\nthis war were those media journalists who were embeds,\u201d Wilkinson went on,\nboasting in a blunt manner , \u201cGeneral Franks signs my cheque and I make news\nbased on his terms.\u201d</span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Michael Wolff, from New\nYork magazine, &nbsp;learnt the hard way when\nhe asked Wilkinson some inconvenient questions &nbsp;during a press briefing. &nbsp;He snarled \u201c this is war, you a$$hole\u2019. Don\u2019t\nfu#k around with things you don\u2019t understand \u2019. And then finally it was; \u2018no\nmore questions for you, why don\u2019t you just fu#kin\u2019 go home?\u2019<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-2Wm7ZNaGvCo/UKHLlN3FG8I/AAAAAAAAX2s/WAz0VNOeazs/s1600/imagesthhy6.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"298\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-2Wm7ZNaGvCo/UKHLlN3FG8I/AAAAAAAAX2s/WAz0VNOeazs/s400/imagesthhy6.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cWhere the embeds stuff\nwere not enough, the US military would simply write their own imaginary\nreports, or shoot and edit their own films, and distribute it to news channels\nthat would lap it up. Or they would simply lie\u201d&nbsp;\nsaid one ex-embedded reporter.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Those who are capable\nof tyranny are capable of perjury to sustain it.</span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-zGO2Lf_63bI/UKHVgLRIOfI/AAAAAAAAX70/tzUUwuBjIWw/s1600/imagesyuiooop.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-zGO2Lf_63bI/UKHVgLRIOfI/AAAAAAAAX70/tzUUwuBjIWw/s320/imagesyuiooop.jpg\" width=\"256\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In any case these\nembedded reports were piece meal reports like the seven blind men of Hindoostan\nwho touched various parts of the elephant , and came up with their own stories\nwithout comprehending the big picture. None of them had the ability to pull\nback the lens, and go from microscope to telescope.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Propaganda is as\npowerful as heroin, as it surreptitiously dissolves all capacity to think. All\nstrategies at the White House and Pentagon seem designed for more public\nrelations and propaganda in future wars. The government wants to keep wars\nshort, and unseen (using drones ) lest the public will to fight withers, as it\ndid in Vietnam.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-nb4nr8SYVIU/UKHL8MDl4oI/AAAAAAAAX28/4sM0a_MNKWM/s1600/imagesttte3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-nb4nr8SYVIU/UKHL8MDl4oI/AAAAAAAAX28/4sM0a_MNKWM/s1600/imagesttte3.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cognitive scientists\nhave found that the human brain works with frames and metaphors. Frames are in\nthe synapses of our brains, in our neural circuitry. We don't think about\nfacts; the mind switches to the way those facts are framed. Thus, framing the\nissue becomes all powerful in influencing our thought about it.&nbsp; Frames once entrenched are hard to dispel.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Metaphors were used by\nthe U.S. military to frame the issues of American foreign policy in the Iraq\nWar. One is to frame a nation as a person to justify a war against his people. &nbsp;In the case of Iraq, the evil person was\nSaddam Hussein. &nbsp;That individual becomes\ndemonized in all the government's references.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Check out the demonization of Ahmadinejad.\nAssad, Gaddafi, Hitler, Stalin, Castro, Ho Chi Minh, Milosevic &nbsp;etc . The metaphor becomes part of an\nelaborate system of deceit. There will be friendly nations, hostile nations,\nrogue states, evil axis, our allies, and so forth.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-f7QP6H296Wo/UKHVzOUtg4I/AAAAAAAAX8E/yQf_Onx_r6A/s1600/downloadiiui76y.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-f7QP6H296Wo/UKHVzOUtg4I/AAAAAAAAX8E/yQf_Onx_r6A/s1600/downloadiiui76y.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the \"nation as\nperson\" metaphor, narratives assume a classic fairy-tale structure. The\n\"self-defense story\" and the \"rescue story.\" &nbsp;The story always has a John Wayne type all\nAmerican hero leading a riding posse , a heinous crime, and a evil outlaw. The\nvillain is inherently evil and irrational. If the hero can't reason with the\nirrational villain, he has to decimate him\u2014to sustain his and his allies way of\nlife.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The self-defense story\nworked well in the Persian Gulf War. President George Bush claimed that evil\nSaddam with WMD was threatening our oil supply, our way of life. &nbsp;Then the \"rape of virgin maiden\nKuwait,\" &nbsp;led to the rescue story.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-CP42rsDCOjk/UKHVnLZTFTI/AAAAAAAAX78/Pl5C3oIRmI0/s1600/downloadkkuytrr.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"273\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-CP42rsDCOjk/UKHVnLZTFTI/AAAAAAAAX78/Pl5C3oIRmI0/s400/downloadkkuytrr.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The self-defense story focused on Saddam's connection to Al Qaeda and\nterrorism, or the oft-proclaimed Weapons of Mass Destruction. The rescue story\nfocused on saving the Iraqi people and bringing democracy and enduring freedom\nto the region.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As the Iraq war\nprogressed and Weapons of Mass Destruction were not seen anywhere, the bullshit\nstory line shifted from defense to emphasize rescue. &nbsp;The briefings at Central Command were used day\nafter day during the fighting to report abuses by Saddam and his evil\ngovernment, with chemical weapons. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-RF_9y-EpR3A/UKHV_AefP3I/AAAAAAAAX8M/4Vmwg4isxuo/s1600/imagesjyuu89i.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; line-height: 150%;\">(Remember,\nGaddafi was reported to have distributed thousands of Viagra tablets to his horny\ntroops, to make their hornier beats , to rape them poor virgin gals ) .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">One theme was that\nSaddam's militias wore civilian clothes to ambush U.S. soldiers. Another was\nthat the Iraq army was shooting civilians and terrorizing Iraqis to fight\nagainst their will. ( this is what is happening in Syria now ).&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bush used the term\n\"crusade\" in his post 9/11 speech in which he vowed to avenge the\nacts of terrorism and issued a warning to the \"axis of evil.\" &nbsp;&nbsp;His\nmilitary briefers continually blamed \"Saddam's Fedayeen.\" &nbsp;A few days later, however, they stopped using\n\"Fedayeen\" because they learned in Arabic it means one who martyrs\nhimself for a cause, a positive connotation, to get the key to paradise. &nbsp;So they started calling the Iraqis terrorists\nand death squads.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-UzjOF579Ygs/UKHHF5zGgYI/AAAAAAAAXzs/y_N-Q1_8xB8/s1600/imagesg4w2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; line-height: 150%;\">America was reeling in\nthe aftermath of 9/11, but anyone who focuses on intelligence in looking at\nforeign policy issues knew that Iraq didn\u2019t have a dang thing to do with those\nheinous terrorist attacks on the twin towers. Why does Vatican keep quiet? &nbsp;Does UN exists only to protect the interests\nof AIPAC?<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-EsSTzuxSL1s/UKHDnJhZakI/AAAAAAAAXx8/GFKTCqB3uzI/s1600/yy65.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-EsSTzuxSL1s/UKHDnJhZakI/AAAAAAAAXx8/GFKTCqB3uzI/s1600/yy65.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In his second\ninauguration address, President Bush pledged to \"bring democracy to the\nworld\u201d. &nbsp;His speech written by AIPAC\nspeech writer , lasted 23 minutes. He mentioned the words \"democracy\"\nand \"liberty\" 21 times. &nbsp;The\nworld did NOT get fooled . They just recoiled in disgust, understanding quite\nwell what the United States meant by \"democracy\" and\n\"liberty\".<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-q3mc26yD_28/UKHDd28OusI/AAAAAAAAXx0/s0KDlFdwcSA/s1600/jjhgff.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"201\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-q3mc26yD_28/UKHDd28OusI/AAAAAAAAXx0/s0KDlFdwcSA/s400/jjhgff.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Arnett reported\nthe truth about US bombing of baby milk powder factories&nbsp; , White House spokesman Marlin Fitzwater\nclaimed was \"a production facility for biological weapons\". When\nArnett reported death of more than 400 Iraqis by two precision-guided missiles on a\ncivilian air-raid shelter in the Amariya district of Baghdad with women,\nchildren and old men packed inside,&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fitzwater called him a lair.&nbsp; He was denounced in US congress as \"the\nJoseph Goebbels of Saddam Hussein's Hitler-like regime&nbsp;&nbsp;\"&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; FIRST BATTLE OF PANIPAT 1526</span> , &nbsp;<span style=\"color: magenta;\">KOHINOOR DIAMOND </span>, <span style=\"color: red;\">AYODHYA SRI RAM TEMPLE VAASTU</span> , &nbsp;VARAHA AND VAMANA AVATARS OF LORD VISHNU , GODHRA RIOTS , &nbsp;<span style=\"color: purple;\">RANA SANGHA </span>, &nbsp;<span style=\"color: blue;\">SILHADI</span> - CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Below photo: &nbsp;First things first. &nbsp;Check out the massive pillars of the ancient Ram temple of Ayodhya beneath the foundations of the Babri Masjid. &nbsp;See the size of a man in comparison? Do they still say that Babri Masjid was NOT built on top of a temple?&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-T5hk3eWe9WI/UaW7FhOnPxI/AAAAAAAAi30/VTj5_8NJz94/s1600/ayodhya+comwall.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-T5hk3eWe9WI/UaW7FhOnPxI/AAAAAAAAi30/VTj5_8NJz94/s640/ayodhya+comwall.jpg\" width=\"473\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Below picture: &nbsp;What about the ancient document about this Ram temple unearthed? Why all these Muslim propaganda and lies?&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">The Hari-Vishnu Inscription --</span><span style=\"color: red;\"><o:p></o:p></span></b></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i><b><span style=\"color: red;\">Line 15 of this inscription clearly tells us that -<o:p></o:p></span></b></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i><b><span style=\"color: red;\">A beautiful temple of Vishnu-Hari, was built with heaps of\nstones and beautified with a golden spire unparalleled by any other temple\nbuilt by earlier kings... This wonderful temple was built in the temple-city of\nAyodhya situated in Saketamandala. <o:p></o:p></span></b></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i><b><span style=\"color: red;\">Line 19 describes \u2013<o:p></o:p></span></b></i></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i><b><span style=\"color: red;\">God Vishnu as destroying king Bali and the ten headed\nDashanan, i.e., Ravan.</span></b></i><o:p></o:p></div>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-5HU7xCjsnik/UaW7d6BCatI/AAAAAAAAi38/8_Rf4bttsMw/s1600/ayodhya+HARI-VISHNU.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"226\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-5HU7xCjsnik/UaW7d6BCatI/AAAAAAAAi38/8_Rf4bttsMw/s400/ayodhya+HARI-VISHNU.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">The white historian has been digging in un-inhabited deserts to unearth ancient Indian history, to get gypsy pottery and mud hut ruins and then to smirk TEE HEEEEE this is the glory of Vedic India -- &nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: blue;\">Hey,&nbsp; how about choosing a spot in the mid centers of our ancient cities like Ujjain , Ayodhya , Delhi , Udaipur, Pataliputa etc ? &nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: magenta;\">OH , I forgot, you are like surgeons who deliberately mistake the heart for the kidney to kill the patient , right !!</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-siPx1BNZFec/Uaw6qWNTF7I/AAAAAAAAi8o/y4kmsrbFaQM/s1600/OB-VP029_iayodh_D_20121206090724.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: large;\"><b>Miah saheb , aisa kyun hai? &nbsp;Masjid je neeche mandir ?</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-q6l8D_jlpCg/VH9HrnSwHzI/AAAAAAAAzhc/ibGu8EY93F0/s1600/OB-VO980_iDDayodh_J_20121206032336.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"426\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-q6l8D_jlpCg/VH9HrnSwHzI/AAAAAAAAzhc/ibGu8EY93F0/s1600/OB-VO980_iDDayodh_J_20121206032336.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-pJczZDlZKZI/VH9H-MKEjlI/AAAAAAAAzhk/0XzfDcIuH9A/s1600/OB-VP465_iayodh_J_20121DDE207000051.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"426\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-pJczZDlZKZI/VH9H-MKEjlI/AAAAAAAAzhk/0XzfDcIuH9A/s1600/OB-VP465_iayodh_J_20121DDE207000051.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A couple of years after\nthe Babri Masjid at Ayodhya was demolished , I sailed on a ship with a\nPakistani Chief Officer and a Pakistani 3<sup>rd</sup> Engineer. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chief Officer was a\nSunni Muslim. &nbsp;He was not too religious,\nand he would have a beer with me in my cabin after his sea watch at 2000 hrs. &nbsp;He had dark Indian Bihari type looks.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Third Engineer was a\nShia Muslim. He was a religious scholar and a puritan. He would have been a\nreligious Mullah as he did Islamic studies in Khandahar , Kabul ( Afghanistan )\nand Teheran in Iran. He was fair and handsome looked like Imran Khan. He used\nto sit in my cabin and have a Coke with me sometimes from 1930 to 2000 hrs. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Third Engineer M , was\nmy fan, and used to confide in me. &nbsp;And\nhe loved to discuss Islam and the Koran with me. &nbsp;He was so fanatic in his Islamic views , that\nin all his books he used to write\u201d Death to USA and death to Israel in the\nfirst page ), but he was a good man.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I saw this once when I went for cabin\ninspections, and he was on watch in the Engine room. He also had a Koran in his\ncabin, a magnetic compass, and a prayer mat, which occupied pride of place. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Third Engineer M , knew\na lot about Mughal Emperor Babur\u2014as this was part of his Islamic studies..&nbsp; It is NOT normal for a Third Engineer to come\nto Captain\u2019s cabin. But since he did NOT have too many friends on the ship, and\nSunni does NOT talk to Shia , he was a loner. Talking to me was a sort of\ncatharsis for him. And I had a soft corner for him.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The day he signed off from\nthe ship, he told me that I knew more about Islam than him. He gave me his\ntelephone number and said, any time my ship comes to Pakistan , I should ring\nhim up and then he would take me out for a tour. &nbsp;He said he had the political clout to do that\u2014as\nIndians are NOT given a shore pass. &nbsp;If\nyou get caught, &nbsp;it would mean jail for\nmaybe 2 decades.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was supposed to\nmarry a Islamic scholar. He showed me her photo\u2014a very attractive woman. I\nadvised him, that he must marry a girl, who has nothing to do with extreme\nreligion, as that would NOT make him a happy husband.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When he shook my hands to\nleave the ship, after collecting his cash and documents , he told me that he\nwill marry another Pakistani girl as per my advice\u2014a happy go lucky worldly\ngirl. &nbsp;And he also whispered that that he has deleted the \"death to America/ Israel\" &nbsp;logos from his books and that he is NOT a narrow minded hardcore Islamist any more.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The day I joined the\nship and took over command, the Chief Engineer walks in and said that he does\nNOT want the Third Engineer as he is on a revolt , and refusing to do work. He\nsaid it had something to do with Second Officer telling him the wrong direction\nof Mecca.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anyway after the ship\nsailed out of port, I went down to have lunch. The Captains table with 6 chairs\nwas circular. After we had lunch, I told Chief Engineer that he must get Third\nEngineer relieved of his 12 to 4 watch and come to the Officers saloon along\nwith him.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So pretty soon he came\n, and I asked him what his problem was in this universe. Initially he said he\nwants to go home blah blah. After a bit of arm twisting , he came out with the\nreal reason. Second officer hurt his religious feelings by giving him the exact\nopposite direction of Mecca to pray. Usually he would locate his own direction\nwith his compass, but that particular day, it was raining and sea was a bit\nrough.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So then I sat on the\ntable 12 O clock. I made him sit on the chair at 4 O clock. Then I asked him \u201c\nAm I on your left or right side? He said \u2018You are on my right side\u201d.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then I made him sit on\nthe 8 O clock chair- and asked him the same question. So he said \u201cNow you are\non my left side\u201d</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then I said \u201c Imagine\nthat I am Mecca. &nbsp;And now imagine that you\nchanged perspective because the ship altered course . And imagine this table is\nthe world which is round .\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He caught on\nimmediately. He apologized for his trespasses and that was it. He did a proper job\nafter that.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the world is round, you can fly to any place in opposite directions-- and still reach the same place. One way will be slightly longer , that is all.\nAs navigators sometimes we are indeed faced with this true dilemma on a very\nlong East West voyage, whether to go eastwards or westwards, &nbsp;to reach the\ndestination. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">6 can become 9 if you view it the wrong way. There is NO need to sulk about it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now , punch into Google\nsearch <b><span style=\"color: blue;\">CULTURAL WISDOM \u2013VADAKAYIL</span></b>.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These are a few lessons I gave M . And he used to be quite excited about all\nthis .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One day, we discussed\nthe Babri Masjid demolition. He was genuinely upset about it. It was NOT that\nhe was trying to play politics. He considered the Mughal Emperor Babur to be a\nhero. For a person with Imran Khan type looks and DNA ( not a Muhajir like\nChief Officer of the Indian sub continent ) , yes , Babur is a hero. This is why\nPakistan named their missiles ,\nBABUR.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">So I asked him\u201d How\nmany more such demolished Indian mosques, like Babri Masjid do you know of since\n1947\u201d<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-size: large;\">He did NOT know of any\nother .</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>Then I asked him \u201c\nPlace your hand on your heart and tell me \u2013 how many Hindu temples have been destroyed\nin Pakistan and Afghanistan by Muslims, &nbsp;after 1947 &nbsp;?\u201d </b></span></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">He felt very sheepish.&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Then he replied \u201c More than 500 \u201c \u2013 to which I told him, the actual\nfigure is double of that.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">I asked him \u201cDo you\nknow why the Hindus demolished the Babri Masjid?\u201d<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">He knew this very well . He said that \"the original name of this Ayodhya mosque is NOT Babri Masjid, &nbsp;but was\ncalled <i>Masjid I Janmastan </i>, and it was built on the foundations of a big ancient Hindu\ntemple, using the same stones \u201c</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A few days before that\nI had told him that the black stone on the South East corner of Kaaba , 5 feet\nabove the ground is a Shiva Lingam .It was originally a Shiva temple. He was stunned\ndid NOT come to my cabin the next day.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On his Koran cover the\nnumber 786 was inscribed. He could NOT explain this number , other than saying that it represented Bismillah. He was taken aback when I told him, that this number\nis Hindu king mantra &nbsp;OM as seen in the\nmirror.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://1.gvt0.com/vi/SNraVirlP8U/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/SNraVirlP8U&fs=1&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/SNraVirlP8U&fs=1&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">He came after two days , stating that he\nwas so disturbed that the main attraction of Mecca was a Shiva lingam\u2014and even\nhe had <span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">kissed Shiva\u2019s penis.</span></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; He has been to\nMecca more than 10 times.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Muslims substitute 786 for\nthe phrase \u0628\u0633\u0645 \u0627\u0644\u0644\u0647 \u0627\u0644\u0631\u062d\u0645\u0646 \u0627\u0644\u0631\u062d\u064a\u0645 bism ill\u0101h ir-ra\u1e25m\u0101n ir-ra\u1e25\u012bm (\"in the\nname of Allah, the compassionate, the merciful\").<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
