, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The first time, &nbsp;all his friends and relatives had given him\nsilk handkerchiefs to rub on the stone. So he started rubbing, one by one, and\nthe guard got pissed off and started hitting him with a whip and he continued\nrubbing the pieces of cloth till he started bleeding from all over his body.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shiva Lingam is a black\nmeteorite stone from which DNA rained on the earth from cosmos, as per our\nVedas. They contain the \u201c source of life\u201d ( Sagala / DNA ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch <b><span style=\"color: blue;\">NASA DNA , BUILDING BLOCKS IN &nbsp;METEORITE - VADAKAYIL</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n</b></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then I asked him. Do\nyou know why the Mughals never worshipped in Babri Masjid , ever since they\nbuilt the mosque. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He said \u201d As per Islamic\ntradition is does NOT look like a mosque. It was built by Babar\u2019s General Mir\nBaqshi, who was a Hijra ( a eunuch ), who did NOT know much about Islam . The Mughals\ndid NOT build an UJU , for washing the body parts before namaz , and there is\nno vast open space inside for people to pray \u201c.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I agreed \u201c Yes, a\nmosque with dome like the ones as Istanbul usually has </span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">minerats</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"> for AJAAN , to\ncall the faithful for prayers, while Babri Masjid does NOT have it \u201d. . <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-E4rG0UW7DMY/UJ9ZTOxGtaI/AAAAAAAAXk8/aJkHl2IjWT4/s1600/mosque-hitech-city.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"213\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-E4rG0UW7DMY/UJ9ZTOxGtaI/AAAAAAAAXk8/aJkHl2IjWT4/s320/mosque-hitech-city.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And then I led him to\nit--he knew it but was pretending that he did NOT , initially. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>He said \u201c The Mughals\nfound, a SUWAR Hindu motif inside. This is the reason why Muslims refused to pray. Who wants to go to hell ? \u201d.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then I had to explain\nto him the ten avatars of Vishnu.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ten Vishnu Avatars\nare:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1. Matsya (the fish) <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2. Koorma (the\ntortoise)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3. Varaha (the boar)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4. Narasimha (the\nhuman-lion)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">5. Vamana (the dwarf)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">6. Parasurama (the\nangry man, Rama with an axe)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">7. Lord Rama (the\nperfect man, king of Ayodha)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">8. Lord Krishna (the\ndivine statesman) <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">9. Lord Ayyappa.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">10. Kalki (the mighty\nwarrior)--the FINAL avatar<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The third avatar is NOT\na pig ( suvar ) but a boar , which of course falls into the same category.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-u-OHOqf-_10/UJ6l7e92NhI/AAAAAAAAXVA/uIoriYptL70/s1600/imagesGTR4.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-u-OHOqf-_10/UJ6l7e92NhI/AAAAAAAAXVA/uIoriYptL70/s320/imagesGTR4.jpg\" width=\"241\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lord Vishnu assumed the\nVaraha Avatar or the Boar avatar , to defeat Hiranyaksha, a demon who had taken\nthe Earth (Prithvi) and carried it to the bottom of what is described as the\ncosmic ocean in the story. The battle between Varaha and Hiranyaksha took a\nvery long time and finally Varaha won.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-nZc80h3fVbs/UJ6mHSGqvEI/AAAAAAAAXVI/CLy5MJ1UV9A/s1600/imagesFGTR54E.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-nZc80h3fVbs/UJ6mHSGqvEI/AAAAAAAAXVI/CLy5MJ1UV9A/s640/imagesFGTR54E.jpg\" width=\"361\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Varaha carried the Earth out of the\nocean between his tusks and restored it to its proper orbit in the cosmos.\nVishnu married Prithvi (Bhudevi) in this avatar. She then gave birth to their\nson, an asura, Narakasura. Varaha is depicted in art as either purely animal or\nas being anthropomorphic, having a boar's head on a man's body.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-cWATfn2llZE/UJ6mOfSWReI/AAAAAAAAXVQ/jzotdEQBSxY/s1600/imagesFGBN.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-cWATfn2llZE/UJ6mOfSWReI/AAAAAAAAXVQ/jzotdEQBSxY/s400/imagesFGBN.jpg\" width=\"299\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the latter\nform he has four arms, two of which hold the wheel and conch-shell while the\nother two hold a mace, sword or lotus or make a gesture (or \"mudra\")\nof blessing. The Earth is held between the boar's tusks. The avatar symbolizes\nthe resurrection of the Earth from a pralaya (deluge) and the establishment of\na new kalpa (cosmic cycle).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch <b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE BANYAN TREE \u2013 VADAKAYIL</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">- to know about cosmic\ninhalation and exhalation ( Tamas / Rajas \u2013 Yin-Yang )&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then he said that even\nlooking at a pig is NOT allowed in Islam, forget about praying in a building\nwith such motifs.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So I told him\u201d Even\nIndian Muslims feel the same way, NOT just the Mughals .&nbsp; A Muslim friend of mine bought a brand new\nFiat car in Chennai and while taking a joy ride with his friend, killed a pig which\nsuddenly crossed the road. &nbsp;Nothing\nhappened to the car. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But he had to sell\nit as his friend went and told everybody in his mosque. &nbsp;And all in the mosque advised him to sell it. &nbsp;Finally he could NOT get a good price even from\nthe Hindus , and he had to sell it to a poor Christian, who could NOT afford it\nand gave him very little money.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is no reference\nto the Ayodhya mosque in Babur's diary, the Baburnama. The contemporary\nTarikh-i-Babari records that Babur's troops \"demolished many Hindu temples\nat Chanderi\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Enough of my Pakistani\nThird Engineer.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1992, after the\nBabri riots, there was a Govt excavation at the site, monitored by the Muslims.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They found that the\nmosque was indeed built on the foundations of a grand Hindu temple,using the\nsame material. They found a Sanskrit an inscription on a thick stone slab. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The twenty-first verse in\nSanskrit says the following; <i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>\"For the salvation of his soul the King,\nafter paying his obeisance at the little feet of Vamana Avatar, went about\nconstructing a wondrous temple for Vishnu Hari (Shri Rama) with marvelous\npillars and structure of stone reaching the skies and culminating in a superb\ntop with a massive sphere of gold and projecting shafts in the sky - a temple\nso grand that no other King in the History of the nation had ever built before.\nThis temple is built in the temple-city of Ayodhya. \"</b><o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-gUMKPnwDp5g/UJ6qmLEAIyI/AAAAAAAAXW8/6RhcQx_GT0A/s1600/nagarilipi+script.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"153\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-gUMKPnwDp5g/UJ6qmLEAIyI/AAAAAAAAXW8/6RhcQx_GT0A/s400/nagarilipi+script.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">Above : an example of Nagari Lipi script.</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">More than &nbsp;260 other Hindu artifacts were recovered on\nthe day of demolition, itself , all pointing clearly that the mosque was built\nby using the same material . &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The inscription on the huge\nstone slab has 20 lines, 30 shlokas (verses), and is composed in Sanskrit\nwritten in the Nagari Lipi script. &nbsp;The message\nwas deciphered by a team comprising epigraphists, Sanskrit scholars, historians\nand archaeologists.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-iFquf_lGcO8/UJ6r1zTU1tI/AAAAAAAAXXE/bc3u_RK63jY/s1600/imagesMAHABALI.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-iFquf_lGcO8/UJ6r1zTU1tI/AAAAAAAAXXE/bc3u_RK63jY/s1600/imagesMAHABALI.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To find put more about\nthe King and the Vmana avatar or Lord Vishnu\u2014</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-- &nbsp;punch into Google search <b><span style=\"color: blue;\">ONAM\n2012- VADAKAYIL.</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-hfyIKLyNyKI/UJ6r8atCwdI/AAAAAAAAXXM/1ehEXhbM73c/s1600/imagesMGFT.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-hfyIKLyNyKI/UJ6r8atCwdI/AAAAAAAAXXM/1ehEXhbM73c/s1600/imagesMGFT.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This Asura King Mahabali,\nhad his capital in Kerala. This is the reason why we do NOT celebrate Diwali in\nKerala . &nbsp;Diwali is to celebrate the\nvictory of Devas over Asuras.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">THE MUSLIMS IN INDIA ARE AT LIBERTY NOT TO BELIEVE ALL THIS. &nbsp;GO AHEAD , &nbsp;PRAY HERE, AND GO TO PARADISE .</span></b></span></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Ayodhya temple\nwhich was destroyed by Babar was built as per Hindu Vaastu. There is a water\nbody at North East. The river Sarayu flows past.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Sarayu river is\nmentioned several times the Vedas ( 5000 BC ) and the Ramayana ( 4300 BC ) .\nThe Sarayu forms at the confluence of the Karnali (or Ghaghara) and Mahakali\n(or Sharda) in Bahraich District. The Mahakali or Sharda forms the\nIndian-Nepalese border. The river is mentioned three times in the Rigveda. ( RV\n4.30.18. / &nbsp;RV 5.53.9 )&nbsp; Sarayu is invoked together with Sindhu and\nSarasvati (two of the most prominent Rigvedic rivers) in the late hymn RV\n10.64.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ramayana describes Rama\nalong with Sita and Lakshmana crossing the river Sarayu.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Ramayana (1.5.6 ),\nthe Sarayu flowed beside the ancient city of Ayodhya and here is where Lord &nbsp;Rama, the seventh Avatar of Vishnu immersed\nhimself to return to his eternal, real Mahavishnu form, when he retired from\nthe throne of Kosala.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His brothers Bharata and Shatrughna also joined him, as\ndid many devoted followers. The Sarayu is also the river upon whose banks King\nRama was born.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://0.gvt0.com/vi/Z14VvpmhctQ/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/Z14VvpmhctQ&fs=1&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/Z14VvpmhctQ&fs=1&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According the Ramayana,\nthe banks of the River Sarayu is also the place where King Dashratha\naccidentally killed Shravan Kumar., and is also called the only river flowing\nbeneath the earth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>&nbsp; line-height: 150%;\">According to Waitress truned Empress, &nbsp;her \u201cnot so bright\u201d son, &nbsp;and her pseudo secular inner coterie, who love\nher more than their motherland , Lord Rama is just a myth.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-NOEp_5zQwpE/UJ6vrAuGDlI/AAAAAAAAXY4/ipBzkcbBw80/s1600/bbb.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; They even want to sponsor Ayodhya city\u2014such is their\nfaith.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-MAYO_QG3kgk/UJ6wS7FHgUI/AAAAAAAAXZI/l_2fwbUxGr8/s1600/EEER.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"253\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-MAYO_QG3kgk/UJ6wS7FHgUI/AAAAAAAAXZI/l_2fwbUxGr8/s400/EEER.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google search <b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE KOREAN BRAHMINS- VADAKAYIL</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The pillars of the old\ntemple were re-used, which contained the images of Hindu gods and goddesses\nagainst the tenets of Islam.. All three judges accepted that under the mosque\nis a Hindu temple and that the Ram temple was specifically demolished. The\nother large grand temples which were converted to Mosques are Krishna\nJanmbhoomi(Mathura), Kashi Vishwanath(Banaras).<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-3Acnnc4nFv0/UJ9dQP8QT0I/AAAAAAAAXm0/Ixh8ZNcXC3Q/s1600/imagesGGHKL.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-3Acnnc4nFv0/UJ9dQP8QT0I/AAAAAAAAXm0/Ixh8ZNcXC3Q/s1600/imagesGGHKL.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ever since Babri Masjid\nwas made, there has been hundreds of attacks by Hindus on this mosque\u2014almost every\nyear . During Muslim invader rule, these uprisings were ruthlessly suppressed\nby torture in public and hanging. During British rule, they used this structure\nto DIVIDE AND RULE.&nbsp; Rather they used to\nremind Hindus that this is their Ram temple.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As per the District\nGazetteer ( Englishman ) Faizabad 1905, \" Till 1855, Hindus used to worship in the &nbsp;building. But after the Sepoy Mutiny or First\nwar of Independence (1857), an outer enclosure was &nbsp;put up in front of the Masjid and the Hindus\nforbidden access to the inner yard. So the Hindus made the offerings on a\nplatform (chabootra), which they have raised in the outer yard.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During the Hindu Muslim\ncommunal riots of 1934, ( fanned by the British ) the walls around the Masjid\nand one of the domes of the Masjid were damaged. These were reconstructed by the\nBritish Government.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1947 before\nIndependence , Lord Mountbatten gave a written fiat&nbsp; prohibited Muslims from being around the site\nby&nbsp; 200 metres. This was enforced by the\nBritsih.&nbsp; The main gate was locked.&nbsp; However, they allowed the Hindu pilgrims to\nenter via the side door.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-7WcOdholXcs/UJ9ZmqcWe_I/AAAAAAAAXlE/EOI7oo3gHn8/s1600/_39462916_ayodhya_inf416.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"262\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-7WcOdholXcs/UJ9ZmqcWe_I/AAAAAAAAXlE/EOI7oo3gHn8/s400/_39462916_ayodhya_inf416.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Indian Home\nMinister Shankar Rao Chavan made a high profile visit to the site. There were\nseveral Hindu and Muslim experts with him . After inspecting the Hindu vaastu ,\nHindu motifs and dieties he declared \u201c Now I want to see the Babri Masjid.\u201d On\nbeing told \u201cwhat you are seeing is the mosque\u201d, Chavan felt so foolish.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mr. K.K. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE:-- <i>A man took aim at Ibrahim Beg. But then\nIbrahim Beg yelled,\"Hai! Hai!\"; and he let him pass, and by mistake\nshot me in an armpit from as near as a man on guard at the Gate stands from\nanother. Two plates of my armour cracked. I shot at a man running away along\nthe ramparts, adjusting his cap against the battlements. He abandoned his cap,\nnailed to the wall and went off, gathering his turban sash together in his\nhand.</i> :- UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Digression: Now let me narrate an\ninteresting incident. I was coming back by train from Chennai to Calicut after\ndoing my Master\u2019s revalidation course. In the First class AC coupe, I found all\nwere from the Rotary club of Calicut. I go to the Rotary club swimming pool and\nhealth club, every day while on leave. They had gone to Chennai for the wedding\nof a Rotarian and were coming back together.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In between I say a young guy of\nabout 20 in the compartment. He looked at almost everybody twice and then he\ncame to me and asked me for 200 bucks, which was a big amount those days. He\nsaid that he a college student is from Delhi, he lost all his money in Chennai and\nnow he wants to go back home.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So I told him \u201c Listen I have been watching you\nfor a long time. You were looking at each and everybody on the railway platform\nitself , and now you have chosen me alone, to beg &nbsp;. What is the catch? Do I look like an asshole\nto you?\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He replied \u201c Well sir,\nyou appear to &nbsp;be the generous type. &nbsp;All the others will NOT part with 5 rupees,\nleave alone 200 rupees. After I go back home I will send this money to your\nhome \u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Familiar story\u2014only a\nfool and his money are soon parted.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So I asked him \u201c What\nis your subject in College \u201c<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He relied \u201c History,\nand I have come here to do a project \u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So I gave him my express\ncondition \u201c I will ask you a simple history question, which every Indian history\nstudent will know. &nbsp;When was the First\nbattle of Panipat? &nbsp;Even if you don\u2019t know,\n&nbsp;I want an answer, just to find out by\nhow many decades or centuries you are off target\u201d .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He gave me an approx. answer\nwhich was out by 200 years .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So I said \u201c Sorry,\nbuddy. You can try your luck with some other rich asshole \u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He got down from the\ncompartment. I was watching him closely through the window. Afetr 5 minues he\ncame back to me again . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He said \u201c Sir, what is\nthe actual date?\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So I have him 200 bucks\nand said \u201c The year is 1526\u201d . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was so happy that he\ntouched my feet. I reckon only a history student would have come back to ask me\nthe correct answer.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">The first Battle of\nPanipat ( few miles off Delhi ) was the first battle in India for Babur, after\nhe invaded. This soldier of fortune, &nbsp;defeated the &nbsp;army of Ibrahim Lodhi , on 21 April 1526. &nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It\nmarked the beginning of the Mughal Empire in India . This was one of the\nearliest battles involving gunpowder firearms and field artillery. Babar had\nguns and field cannons . Ibrahim Lodhi had an army which was 12 times bigger,\nwith hundreds of elephants.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-orPKcKz02rI/UJ8Rw7e-qrI/AAAAAAAAXdI/1--bWB8PkJw/s1600/imageskiuhg.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"249\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-orPKcKz02rI/UJ8Rw7e-qrI/AAAAAAAAXdI/1--bWB8PkJw/s400/imageskiuhg.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>The historical record\nof this critical battle is a BIG LIE.&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>Babur was invited to India, as a\nmercenary soldier.<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Muslims first got a\ntoehold in India pretty much the same way. &nbsp;the same way, 335 years before , &nbsp;1191 AD, the ruler of Kabul , Shahabuddin\nMuhammad Ghori was given a bribe ( supari ) in gold by Jai Chandra Rathod, the\nGahadvala king of Kannauj of the Gujjar ethnic group to teach a lesson to a\nhandsome young Indian King by the name of Prithvi Raj Chauhan III (of the\nRajput Chahamana dynasty) with whom his pretty daughter eloped..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanyogita or Samyukta\nwas the stunningly beautiful but headstrong daughter of Rathod. She had heard\nof the valour and goodlooks of Chauhan and was infatuated with him. She started\ncorresponding with him in secret , as her father was at logger heads with\nChauhan. The love between Prithviraj and Samyukta is India's most popular\nmedieval romance. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On finding out about\nthe secret affair, Raja Jaichand was outraged that such a forbidden had been\nbudding behind his back.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">He decided to marry off\nhis daughter as soon as possible to a worthy king by a Swayamwar .</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In haste he invited the entire royalty from\nfar and wide to the ceremony, every eligible prince and king - except\nPrithiviraj Chauhan, much to the chagrin of Samyukta .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To insult Chauhan,&nbsp; Jaichand installed a life size statue of\nChauhan at the gate of the Swyamwar arena , dressed up as a doorman.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chauhan</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">was provoked and he decided to elope with\nSamyukta.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On the day of the\nceremony, Samyukta walked through the court holding the ceremonial garland,\nignoring the gazes of all her ardent suitors. She passed through the door and\nput the garland around the neck of Prithviraj's statue, declaring him her\nhusband.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Rw-UtbwFAHc/UJ8RgRTxjaI/AAAAAAAAXc4/9Y49TrX0ZZk/s1600/jodhaa1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Rw-UtbwFAHc/UJ8RgRTxjaI/AAAAAAAAXc4/9Y49TrX0ZZk/s1600/jodhaa1.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chauhan who was hiding\nin disguse nearby, immediately ran in scooped her inn his arms put her on his\nfast steed and made a daring getaway. This is now legend.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Ar9yr3MjCwE/UJ8RaJMOVVI/AAAAAAAAXcw/fVCQFsQ77RI/s1600/images+(4).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Ar9yr3MjCwE/UJ8RaJMOVVI/AAAAAAAAXcw/fVCQFsQ77RI/s400/images+(4).jpg\" width=\"314\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jaichand seething with anger planned revenge.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The hidden strategic\nKhyber Pass is a 53-kilometer&nbsp; passage\nthrough the Hindu Kush mountain range.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It cuts through the\nnortheastern part of the Safed Koh mountains . At its narrowest point, the pass\nis only 3 meters wide.&nbsp; It connects the\nnorthern frontier of Pakistan with Afghanistan, and was the only passage way to\nancient India. &nbsp;If you dont have a guide you die.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-vIBX5gJMI8Q/UJ8RSRfppHI/AAAAAAAAXco/am4Ip4PlBRM/s1600/images+(1).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"390\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-vIBX5gJMI8Q/UJ8RSRfppHI/AAAAAAAAXco/am4Ip4PlBRM/s400/images+(1).jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">Jaichand was not strong enough\nto defeat Chauhan in battle, so he paid the first Supari ever to a mercenary\nMohammed of Ghori, outside India with information as to how to enter India via\nthe treacherous Khyber pass.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1191, Shahabuddin\nMuhammad Ghori, leading an army of 120,000 men and horses, invaded India\nthrough the Khyber Pass and was successful in reaching Punjab. Chauhan had a\nlarger army of 20000 men and 300 elephants.&nbsp;\nThe two armies met at the town of Tarain, near Thanesar, in present-day\nHaryana, 150 kilometres&nbsp; north of Delhi.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">History repeated itself\n( like for Alexander&nbsp; in 326 BC ) and\nShahabuddin Mohammed Ghori's horse cavalry was unable to hold its own against\nthe 300 elephants. Terrified , the cavalry broke ranks and in the utter confusion\nChauhan won easily. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ghori was made a\nprisoner. He begged for his life and honourable Chauhan foolishly allowed him\nto return to Kabul against the advice of Samyukta and his wise ministers . This\nwas the biggest mistake which lead to Muslim rule in free India, for 650 years\nbefore the British rule.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ghori rode back to\nAfghanistan, and then a year later in 1192 at the Second Battle of Tarain\n,&nbsp; defeated Chauhan with a stronger and\nwiser army.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chauhan never expected\nthis , as he and his army were still still resting on their laurels , with even\nhis army staying with their wives,in celebration mode. Chauhan had pleaded to\nhis father in law Jai Chand for military help. Still in a deep sulk , he\nignored him .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prithviraj was taken\nprisoner and was brought in chains before Ghori.&nbsp; He eyeballed&nbsp;\nGhori getting him pissed off.&nbsp;\nGhori ordered him to lower his eyes, whereupon a defiant Prithviraj\ndeclared that the eyelids of a Rajput are lowered only in death.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ghori prompty put red\nhot coals in Chauhan\u2019s eyes and blinded him. He killed him only after\nhumiliating and taunting him for days . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ghori who was known to\nbe ugly , brutally and repeatedly raped Samyukta and she committed\nsuicide.&nbsp; Her father Jai Chand in remorse\nlater drowned himself in the river Yamuna. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thousands of Rajput\nwomen jumped into the fire with their children and killed themselves ( jauhar )\n. Countless hindus were forcibly converted to Islam<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ghori\u2019s&nbsp; lieutenant, Qutb-uddin Aibak later ruled\nIndia and founded India's first Muslim ruling dynasty. He ruled over India for\nfourteen years .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">His son-in-law constructed the famous Qutab Minar, a mosque\nand minaret, in his memory. This was built the Babri Masjid way. There was an astronomical observatory by the name of Dhruv Stumbh, here . Qutb Minar is just a superficial conversion.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-CLU64sdBegQ/UJ8Rk8_afMI/AAAAAAAAXdA/afPwZBm8ql4/s1600/downloadfffe.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-CLU64sdBegQ/UJ8Rk8_afMI/AAAAAAAAXdA/afPwZBm8ql4/s320/downloadfffe.jpg\" width=\"213\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The defeat of\nPrithviraj Chauhan also marked the end of Hindu rule in Delhi and the turning\npoint in Indian history. 1192 AD.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-2Gsqu5KzNpU/UJ8WJQPbdYI/AAAAAAAAXe8/i3c1VrKcdXI/s1600/imagesCANNLFJ3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"264\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-2Gsqu5KzNpU/UJ8WJQPbdYI/AAAAAAAAXe8/i3c1VrKcdXI/s320/imagesCANNLFJ3.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">India , the richest and most envied land on the planet , would now pass on\nto 855 years of slavery.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">By the time India became free in 1947, &nbsp;90 million\nHindus world be massacred in the most cruel manner.&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Almost all our grand temples would be destroyed. The Ottoman empire at its peak, was funded from India.</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-fQGYHATvmZo/UJ8U8LSUHdI/AAAAAAAAXe0/0NC2lV0IOuo/s1600/383px-Sun_temple_martand_indogreek.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-fQGYHATvmZo/UJ8U8LSUHdI/AAAAAAAAXe0/0NC2lV0IOuo/s1600/383px-Sun_temple_martand_indogreek.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Above the Marthanda Sun temple in Kashmir.</i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">By 1947, when we broke the shackles of slavery, India would be the poorest country on the planet, -- a pathetic nation of Hindu coolies and Hindu snake charmers-- a nation to be ridiculed for its poverty</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google search <b><span style=\"color: red;\">THE UNQUANTIFIED HOLOCAUST AND GENOCIDE- VADAKAYIL</span></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the year 1494, Babur succeeded his father as the ruler of Fargana, which is located in the present\nday Uzbekistan. In 7000 BC, during the rule of King Vikramaditya, Uzbekistan\nwas part of India.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-v6nLv9O25NM/UJ9ISyty1CI/AAAAAAAAXg4/xPY1SpmSogY/s1600/Babur.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-v6nLv9O25NM/UJ9ISyty1CI/AAAAAAAAXg4/xPY1SpmSogY/s400/Babur.jpg\" width=\"275\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Babar attacked a city\ncalled Samarkand and got possession of it after a struggle of seven months.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Babur invaded India four\ntimes through the border of Punjab during the Lodhi dynasty in India. He used\nto carry out the invasion from his capital at Kabul. Every time he came with guns,\nand every time he was beaten back in disgrace, by a more powerful army. These\nare things his diary will never tell.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then in 1526, he was\nINVITED to attack by a palace conspiracy \u2014and his victory would be assured,\nprovided he paid the right price.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ruler Ibrahim Lodi\u2019s\nuncle Alam Khan Lodhi, wanted to usurp the throne by deceit. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was a known fact\nthat Rajput King of Mewar,&nbsp; Rana Sangha (\nMaharana Sangram Singh ) had a more powerful army than the army Ibrahim Lodhi ,\nand was gearing up to drive away Afghan King Ibrahim Lodhi from Delhi.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once\nRana Sangha attacked it would be too late. Rana Sangha was the scion of the\nSisodia clan of Suryavanshi Rajputs.&nbsp; He\nsucceeded his father Rana Raimal as the king of the Mewar in 1509, and he was\nthe most&nbsp; powerful King&nbsp; in the whole of North India.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An emissary who was loyal\nto Alam Khan , by the name of Daulat khan Lodhi was sent to Kabul in secret. &nbsp;Daulat Khan was the governor of Punjab. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Babur came to India with\nhis 17 year old son Humayun and a 11000 strong army and field artillery. Ibrahim\nLohi has 150,000 troops, and 500 war elephants , but had no guns . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Contrary to what\nhistorians say, Ibrahim Lohi\u2019s elephants were trained to ignore gun shot sounds\nand their ears were padded. There was NO chance for Humayun who was in the lead\nattack party.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Within an hour of\nbattle , Ibrahim Lodhi was killed on the battle field by Alam Khan Lodhi and\nleft to bleed and die in a deceit most foul, by his own Generals , who suddenly\nswitched loyalties to Babur.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-vOF33pjQf7I/UJ9KgJdqSfI/AAAAAAAAXhI/PjG6k_hx07A/s1600/images4y45y.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-vOF33pjQf7I/UJ9KgJdqSfI/AAAAAAAAXhI/PjG6k_hx07A/s400/images4y45y.jpg\" width=\"254\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ibrahim\u2019s vast army, running\ninto miles , in the rear never even could strike a single blow. &nbsp;Babur did NOT massacre Ibrahim Lodhi\u2019s army\u2014this\nis on record. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In any case how could\nhe do that?</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hardly anybody died. I am\nsure Baburnama ( the propaganda piece of Babur ) will NOT record this\ndisgraceful event.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Muslim wars never had\nany honor or chivalry.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After Babur emerged\nvictorious at Panipat, he occupied Delhi. &nbsp;Thousands of Hindus were put to the sword, and\nwomen raped. His cruel crimes at Delhi, far exceeded his crimes in Samarkhand, where he put 700,000 inhabitants to the sword, captured all the attractive women and handsome young boys to be castrated as converted into eunuchs.. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then he sent his son Humayun to Agra, the capital of Ibrahim Lodi\nto capture the Royal palace and the treasure. &nbsp;Shortly after that Babur , the Sunni Muslim, joined Humayun , and &nbsp;ascended the throne of Agra and turned it to\nhis capital.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rana Sangha meanwhile had already crushed\nGujarat and conquered Malwa and was now close to Agra. It was at this juncture\nthat he heard that Babur had defeated and slayed Ibrahim Lodi and was now\nmaster of Delhi sultanate. &nbsp;Babur was the\nfirst one to confer on himself the supreme title of \u2018Padshah\u2019<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rana Sanga was upset when\nhe heard that Babur had declared himself of the Emperor . He now knew that\nBabur had NO plans to go back to Kabul, and hence decided to fight him, as he\nwas stronger. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As a first move, he\nprovided refuge to Ibrahim Lodhi\u2019s loyal Afghan fugitive princes like Mehmod\nLodi and Hasan Khan Mewati. &nbsp;Then he officially\n&nbsp;warned Babur and asked him to leave\nIndia, within a time frame . He hoped to attain this by talks with Babur and\nsent his vassal r Silhadi of Raisen as his emissary.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1527, Silhadi suddenly\naligned himself with Rana Sanga of Mewar in a grand Rajput confederacy against\nMughal emperor Babur. &nbsp;Rana Sanga had\ngiven his own daughter\u2019s hand to Silhadi\u2019s son as a token of their\nalliance.&nbsp; This was probably the greatest\nhonor a vassal could aspire for, &nbsp;as Rana\nbelonged to the most prestigious clan of Rajputs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Raja Shiladitya, who\nbetrayed Rana Sangha , ( Silhadi ) was a Tomar &nbsp;chieftain of northeast Malwa . He commanded a\nmercenary force of Purabiya soldiers ( hailing from present-day eastern U.P.\nand Bihar ) and for that reason is himself occasionally referred to as a\nPurabiya.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This man had a warped\ntraitor\u2019s DNA.&nbsp; He remained a decisive\nfactor in the politics of north and central India during his life and was\nresponsible for sinking the fortunes of many kings by his sudden defections. He\ngained everlasting notoriety by betraying Rana Sanga in the battle of Khanwa\nand causing the defeat of the Rajput confederacy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Siladitya also fell to\nthe same \u201ccarrot on stick treachery\u201d &nbsp;by\nwhich Ibrahim Lodhi was cheated.&nbsp;\nSiladitya was&nbsp; won over by Babur,\nwho promised him his own Kingdom. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Babur\nand Siladitya hatched a plot that in war. &nbsp;Siladitya, who had large contingent of 35,000\nmen would be in the central front rank . He would suddenly defect and join\nBabur\u2019s camp at critical moment of battle and thus defeat Rana Sanga through\ntreachery who had never been defeated in battle.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
