, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Siladitya went back to Chittor, told Rana\nthat war is a must, and it is easy to defeat Babur.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rajput army\nsupplemented by Afghan contingents of Hasan Khan and Mehmod Lodi met Babur\u2019s\narmy at Khanwa near Fatehpur Sikri in 1527. &nbsp;Battle lasted for 10 hours and it was\nabsolutely bloody. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At a critical and planned moment of\nbattle, the defection of Silhadi and his contingent caused a crucial gap in the\nRajput front ranks and Rana Sanga while personally trying to rebuild the breached\nfront was wounded seriously and fell unconscious.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rajput army thought\ntheir brave leader was dead and fell into sudden disarray. &nbsp;Rana Sanga was whisked away to safety by\nRathore contingent from Marwar and once he became conscious learnt of betrayal\nand defeat. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But Rana Sanga unwilling to\nadmit defeat set out once more to rebuild his military and renew war with\nBabur. &nbsp;He vowed not to set foot in\nChittor till Babur was defeated by him.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1528, he once more set out to fight\nBabur at Chanderi to help Medini Rai who was attacked by Babur. &nbsp;But he was poisoned by Silhadi\u2019s spies , and\ndied in his camp at Kalpi. &nbsp;For&nbsp;Silhadi knew\nhis fate if he was captured .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Knowing that Rana\nSangha was poisoned by wine, Babur suddenly stopped drinking wine , and\nresorted to Opium which was highly addictive. He made a huge show of breaking a lot of wine pitchers. Drinking wine is prohibited as per Islam. Opium wasted&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">Babur died in December, 1530 and was succeeded by\nhis eldest son Humayun.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Babur had left written\ninstructions that he be buried in Kabul. For a while his body was entombed in\nthe Aram Bagh in Agra, opposite the present site of the Taj Mahal.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-IsA0puXzlyM/UJ9IKCFjfpI/AAAAAAAAXgw/ERjvyP3b0yY/s1600/imagesghuii.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"271\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-IsA0puXzlyM/UJ9IKCFjfpI/AAAAAAAAXgw/ERjvyP3b0yY/s400/imagesghuii.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sometimes\nbetween in 1543, his remains were transported to his final resting place in\nKabul, at a site he himself had chosen..&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Gardens \u043ef Babur, called Bagh-e Babur, \u0456s\n\u0430 historic park \u0456n Kabul, Afghanistan, </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0430nd\n\u0430ls\u043e his final resting-place.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-rEFbjywpWaA/UJ9IEAYVfmI/AAAAAAAAXgo/eItnit5EE54/s1600/imagesrh65iu5.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-rEFbjywpWaA/UJ9IEAYVfmI/AAAAAAAAXgo/eItnit5EE54/s1600/imagesrh65iu5.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">On the way to Delhi\nBabur had sacked the rich city of</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Multan\nin the Province of Sind. There was mindless carnage and thousands put to the\nsword.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Guru Nanak had embarked on the\nthird of his preaching tours and had reached the City by foot shortly before it\nwas sacked. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">During the sack of the City,\nGuru Nanak was cast into a prison and put to the task of chakki peesing (\ngrinding corn ) for the army of the invaders.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Soon his guards\nreported to Babur that there was a holy peer baba in the jail.&nbsp; Babur then arranged for a meeting with Guru\nNanak and was impressed by him and his knowledge of Mecca , God and Islamic philosophy.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-t4POjHQ9Jvw/UJ9KFxlJ-8I/AAAAAAAAXhA/IOz096Jua1M/s1600/Guru_Nanak_Meets_Babur_Multan.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"277\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-t4POjHQ9Jvw/UJ9KFxlJ-8I/AAAAAAAAXhA/IOz096Jua1M/s400/Guru_Nanak_Meets_Babur_Multan.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Above: Babur had a trained falcon which could deliver messages and indicate army movements.</i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He set Nanak free, considering that it would be a ill omen to keep him in jail.\nThis event is recorded in the Guru Granth Sahib , and the chapter is called the\nBabur Vani. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Guru Nanak describes the atrocities of Babar and\nhis men in Punjab. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Wikipedia and the Western Historains describes this cruel tyrant as a noble, secualr, poetic, kind soul, lover of arts BLAH BLAH.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;I would rather believe eye witness Guru Nanak.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Guru Nanak was so moved by\nthe cruelty of Babur at Saidpur . </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">He\ndescribed the sorrows of Hindus . Babur's marauding army, in the words of Guru\nNanak, was \"the bridal procession of sin\u201d</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Babur spared Hindus who\nconverted to Islam. He would give these converted&nbsp; Muslims and property. .&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">Babar destroyed every Hindu temple he came across. &nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Babar himself became\na Ghazi which in Islamic terminology is a positive epitecht and it means\n\"a Muslim who has killed a kaffir non-Muslim\u201d. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Such a\nnice person is guaranteed heaven with \"beautiful women, wine and rivers of\nhoney.\"&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Babur also had a strange\ndiabolical passion to cut the heads of Kaffir non-believers and create pillars out\nof cut head. Anybody who saw such a pillar was sure to convert to zislam.</span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\nNow about the Kohinoor diamond--</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Babur had received\nreports that the Fort of Agra housed an immense treasure, which included a\nlarge diamond that defied all description. It was reported to him that its\nsize, color, and brightness were beyond comparison. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Humayun secured the\nKohinoor diamond at Agra by deceit. He told the wife of the Raja of Gwalior , \u201c If\nyou give me the Mountain of Light stone , your husband will be spared\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Upon arrival Babur at\nAgra was presented with the fabulous diamond.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Babur he valued it at\nthe price of two and a half days food for the whole world. The legend says that\nat this time its weight was about 789 carat, or nearly six troy ounces.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After his death the\nprecious stone was passed on to his son Humayun and later on - to successive\ngenerations of Moghul rulers, including Shah Jehan, the builder of Taj Mahal,\nwho has set the priceless gem in his famous Peacock throne as one of the\npeacock\u2019s eyes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After the death of Shah\nJahan, the Koh-i-noor diamond passed into the hands of his son Aurangzeb. When\nin his possession, it was shown to Tavernier - an enterprising French traveller\nand connoisseur, who made a tour through the East in search of rare and\nwonderful gems. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tavernier made and left\nto the history the first sketch of the Koh-i-noor diamond. &nbsp;Aurangazeb was fooled by a Venetian Hortensio\nBorgio, who promised to re-cut the diamonds and make it \u201cshine like the sun\u201d . When\nthe stone was given back to Aurangazeb he was shocked to note that the 789\ncarat stone was reduced to &nbsp;280 carat.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He got so pissed of\nthat he refused to pay him. Considering that Borgio stole a piece of the\ndiamond, he imprisoned him for a while, but did NOT kill him.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Muhammad Shah carried\nit with him hidden in the folds of his turban, a secret known only to a\nselected few, including a eunuch in the harem of the Emperor. Hoping to win the\nfavor of Nadir Shah, the disloyal eunuch whispered the emperor's secret into\nhis ears, and Nadir Shah in turn, devised a plan to deprive Muhammad Shah of his\nprized possession. The day was drawing near for him to leave for Persia and\nNadir Shah ordered a grand durbar to be held where he would hand over the\ncontrol of the Mughal Empire back to Muhammad Shah.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On 1 May 1739, during\nthe ceremony, he reminded Muhammad Shah of the ancient tradition of exchanging\nturbans between kings as a sign of friendship and fraternal ties. Nadir Shah\ngave little room for pause between word and action and removed the turban from\nhis head and placed it on the head of Muhammad Shah, leaving the latter with no\nchoice but to reciprocate the gesture. Muhammad Shah went through the ceremony\nwith such poise that it left Nadir Shah baffled. Was the Koh-i-noor really\nhidden under the folds of his turban, as the eunuch had revealed, or it was a\nhoax?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After the ceremony,\nNadir Shah hurried into his apartments and eagerly undid the folds of his\nturban, where he found the hidden diamond. Wonderstruck at its size, beauty,\nand brilliance, he shouted &nbsp;\"KOHINOOR\"\nwhich in Persian means \"mountain of light,\" and the gem of fortune\ncame to be known by this name thereafter. After returning to Persia, Nadir Shah\nkept the diamond near himself, within easy reach.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nadir Shah was\nassassinated soon after and the diamond fell into the hands of Ahmad Shah\nAbdali, one of his ablest generals, who later became the King of Afghanistan.\nAfter his death in 1772, the Koh-i-noor diamond passed into the hands of his\nsuccessors. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the battle for\nsuccession that followed, the Koh-i-noor ended in possession of one of his sons\nShah Shuja Mirza. In the changing fortunes of war, Shuja Mirza was defeated and\nmade prisoner by the allies of his brother, Mahmud Shah. However, before being\ncaptured, he managed to send his family to Punjab to seek refuge with Maharaja\nRanjit Singh (known also as \u2018Ranjeet the Lion\u2019). &nbsp;Wafa Begum, Shuja Mirza\u2019s wife, carried the\nKoh-i-noor diamond with her to Lahore.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Wafa Begum became\ngreatly distressed when she heard the dreadful news of her husband. She sent\nenvoys to Ranjit Singh and implored him to use his influence to get her husband\nreleased and in return for his help promised him the Koh-i-noor diamond. &nbsp;Ranjit Singh marched against the Afghans and\ngot Shah Shuja released. &nbsp;After securing\nthe Koh-i-noor diamond, Ranjit Singh had the prized jewel fitted in his turban.\nLater he had it sewn into an armlet, which he wore on all the important state\noccasions, where it remained for twenty years.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Before Ranjit Singh\ndied in 1839, his priests tried to get him to donate the diamond to the Temple\nof Jaggannath. Apparently he agreed, but by this time he was unable to speak\nand the keeper of the royal treasure refused to release the stone, on the\ngrounds that he has not received such orders.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Kohinoor signed away to\nqueen Victoria in 1849 by 11 year old boy King</span><b><span style=\"color: red;\"> Duleep Singh</span></b><span style=\"color: blue;\"> while in exile.&nbsp; As a reward he could play with the royal kids\nin London.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-yHxOrt8kzYY/UJ9Q4ovt8oI/AAAAAAAAXjE/qHoGiI72QR4/s1600/images+(4).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-yHxOrt8kzYY/UJ9Q4ovt8oI/AAAAAAAAXjE/qHoGiI72QR4/s1600/images+(4).jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The terms of the\ntreaty, at the end of the Second Anglo-Sikh War specified that: \"The gem\ncalled Koh-I-noor, which was taken from Shah Shuja-ul-Mulk by Maharajah Ranjit\nSingh shall be surrendered by the Maharajah of Lahore to the Queen of England.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">John Lawrence, the\ncolonial administrator, put it in his waistcoat pocket and forgot about it.\nWhen asked for the prize, Lawrence had no idea where it was. Racing home, he\nasked his servant- who said, yes, he had found a small box, containing a piece\nof glass in his master\u2019s waistcoat!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After gaining the\nfamous diamond, the Governor General, Lord Dalhousie immediately sent the\nKoh-i-noor to England after taking every care to ensure its safe passage over\nthe land and the sea-routes. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On 6 April 1850 the\nKoh-i-noor left the shores of India on board of the HMS Medea. So shrouded in\nmystery was its departure that even the Captain of the Medea did not know the\nprecious cargo his ship carried. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On 3rd July, the\nKoh-i-noor was formally handed over to Queen Victoria by Rothschild himself--\nthe owner of the East India Company in a private ceremony held in Buckingham\nPalace. The Koh-i-noor was removed from its mount and its weight, as calculated\nby the Queen's jeweler, was about 186 carats. It seems that the gem has been\nre-cut one more time before arriving to England and after Tavernier made the\nfamous sketch of it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When it was exhibited\nat the Crystal Palace, however, the public, used to \u201cbrilliant cuts\u201d was\ndisappointed by its \u201cmoghul - style\u201d cut. The Queen along with others in the\ncourt decided that the brilliance of the diamond would be enhanced if it were\nrefashioned into a brilliant cut.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The re-cutting of the Koh-i-noor took a mere\n38 days and cost of \u00a38000; the final result was an oval brilliant weighing 108.93\ncarat. &nbsp;Despite the efforts, the results\nwere most unfortunate, for it reduced the diamond drastically in weight,\ndepriving it of all its historical and mineralogical value. The Koh-i-noor\ndiamond, however, lost none of its original mystique.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1992 a new HM\nStationary Office publication on the British Crown Jewels and regalia gave the\nrevised weight of 105.602 carat for the Koh-i-noor and not the 108.93-carat\nfigure previously published. The stone was found to measure 36.00 \u00d7 31.90 \u00d7\n13.04 mm and it is set in the Maltese Cross at the front of the crown made for\nQueen Elizabeth the Queen Mother.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Elizabeth ( present\nqueen\u2019s Elizabeth II\u2019s mother ) was very shrewd and managed all affairs with an\niron will. She got the great Kohinoor diamond stolen from India for her own\ncrown , and was most of the time sozzled on leg bucklin' ZAZA ( this is 30% gin\nand 70% dubonnet --neat-- with a slice of lime ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By the way Lord Krishna\ncalled Kohinoor diamond Syamantakam, and could be worn only by Gods or women\nwith harmony . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">LITTLE DO THE BRITISH&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">REALIZE</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;THAT THEIR GREAT EMPIRE WENT INTO DECLINE AND THE MENTAL ACUITY OF\nTHEIR PEOPLE ERODED ( MAD COW ) AS A RESULT OF THE CURSE OF THE SYAMANTAKAM. .<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-vBcv4fJ0ED8/UJ9QejWo-mI/AAAAAAAAXi8/CZKqntJAVwE/s1600/imagesCAZXCX5B.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"242\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-vBcv4fJ0ED8/UJ9QejWo-mI/AAAAAAAAXi8/CZKqntJAVwE/s400/imagesCAZXCX5B.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Such great stones\ncannot be mined but are found on riverbeds in their natural state. 6100 years\nago a slave stole it from Lord Krishna when he was sleeping. Krishna got it as\na dowry from Jambawan, his father-in-law.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">INDIA WAS THE ONLY\nSOURCE OF DIAMONDS IN THE WORLD TILL ABOUT 150 YEARS BACK.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-nGRsX49ABww/UJ9QSMCqmyI/AAAAAAAAXi0/y7RTbgTELeo/s1600/kohinoor3+(1).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"212\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-nGRsX49ABww/UJ9QSMCqmyI/AAAAAAAAXi0/y7RTbgTELeo/s400/kohinoor3+(1).jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today, the Koh-i-noor\nis kept with other precious objects of the British Crown in a round display\ncase in the basement of the \"Jewel House,\" of the Tower of London.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now something about\nBabur\u2019s eunuchs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most of his slaves were\nwere eunuchs. He had a harem with more than an thousand attractive women, he\ncaptured . He also captured thousands of good looking boys and castrated them,\nwhich made them eunuchs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Eunuchs were the guards\nand guardians of the harem.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They also served the women in the harem . &nbsp;Their cadre was hierarchical. Senior eunuchs\nwere known as Nazirs and Khwaja Saras. Each one of them had a number of junior\neunuchs under him.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Each new sultan - and\nthey came to power, wanted his own set of slaves, and destroyed those of the\nearlier king. &nbsp;The also has to keep a\nhwak\u2019s eye on the activities of the women, to check even if they did mental\ncopulation with any&nbsp; real man.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But these eunuchs\nguarded the secrets of their own mistresses. They smuggled men, drugs and wines\nfor them into the harem. &nbsp;In exchange for\nsuch delicate and risky services the eunuchs could get from them \u201cwhatever they\ndesired\u201d, for they could blackmail their client ladies. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In return the sex-starved women of the harem allowed\nthe eunuchs to enjoy them according to his ability . &nbsp;HMMM !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-_SR_Hy7rnjE/UJ9YF-oJj6I/AAAAAAAAXk0/jY0cgp2xTQ8/s1600/dfrr.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-_SR_Hy7rnjE/UJ9YF-oJj6I/AAAAAAAAXk0/jY0cgp2xTQ8/s400/dfrr.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once a man was made\neunuch, his sensibility for manhood was dwarfed, his spirit of assertiveness\ndestroyed, and he was perforce turned into a loyal and devoted slave; it did\nnot matter to the master if his loyalty and devotion were fruits of compulsion.\n&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So the practice of\nmaking eunuchs went on and on under Muslim rule. &nbsp;Some gay Muslim kings did NOT want women and\nwanted eunuchs to service them.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was Aurangazeb who stopped this evil practice\nof castrating boys.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b>Now about the amazing Taj Mahal. ( <span style=\"color: blue;\">the interior is strange , neglected and bricked up</span> )&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-splXIOV1mJE/UJ9fWf9dphI/AAAAAAAAXnk/LV6TMmkfmGY/s1600/eer4.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-splXIOV1mJE/UJ9fWf9dphI/AAAAAAAAXnk/LV6TMmkfmGY/s400/eer4.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">When visitors enter the Taj mahal they are allowed to enter a very small part of the whole structure. It is a Muslim Queen's ( Shah Jahan's wife ) grave. &nbsp;But before that it was a majestic Rajput palace, amde with Rajasthan marble.</span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Check out some pictures-- and what ever you feel, &nbsp;keep it to yourself.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Below, a well to sink treasures in case of attack.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/03/india-must-revert-to-organic.html?showComment=1553134936233#c1899585168060886515\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 21, 2019 at 7:52 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttps://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/17-years-on-one-more-gets-life-in-jail-for-godhra-train-carnage/articleshow/68505843.cms<br />\n<br />\nBENAMI MEDIA , PAKISTANI ISIS FUNDED ISLAMIC NGOs AND DESH DROHIS LIKE TEESTA SETALVAD HAVE ACCUSED HINDUS OF PROACTIVELY ATTACKING MUSLIMS AT GODHRA..<br />\n<br />\nSORRY--<br />\n<br />\nIT WAS A REACTION TO EXTREME PROVOCATION... BECAUSE HINDUS NOW WILL NOT BE COWARDS ANYMORE AND WILL GIVE BACK AS GOOD AS THEY GET..<br />\n<br />\n800 YEARS OF SLAVERY IS NOT FORGOTTEN BY HINDUS..DURING ISLAM INVADERS RULE HINDUS WERE TREATED WORSE THAN SHIT..<br />\n<br />\nIt was a mob of more than 1500 persons \u2013 almost all Ghanchi Muslims who set fire to coach S-6 of Sabarmati express at Godhra.<br />\n<br />\nFake stories were cooked up that the Karsevaks tried to abduct a Ghanchi Muslim girl from Godhra railway station .<br />\n<br />\nMore than 2100 muslims were involved in this massacre , awaiting with jerry cans of kerosene and petrol -- even before the train bearing ayodhya kar sevaks steamed in to godra station -- as the train was 5 hours late .<br />\n<br />\nNo train station is ever so crowded at 0745 hrs in the morning . Petrol and Kerosene is NOT available in this manner inside a railway station..<br />\n<br />\nTHERE WERE MORE THAN 4000 LIVE WITNESSES TO WHAT TRANSPIRED .<br />\n<br />\nThe over crowded train itself had more than 2200 kar sevaks coming back after Ram Yagna at Ayodhya , and some of them got down at godra . The train was pelted with stones for a full 15 minutes before the fire was thrown through the broken windows .<br />\n<br />\nThe train had left the platform and was stopped by pulling the cabin at a secluded place few hundred metres from the Godra platform, at a Ghanchi Muslim slum .<br />\n<br />\nIn 1948, Ghanchi Muslims were the dominant sect in Godhra.<br />\n<br />\nGhanchis are well-known for their aggressive and impulsive reaction to the slightest provocation..<br />\n<br />\nMY SHIP WAS AT JEDDAH WHEN GODHRA RIOTS HAPPENED .<br />\n<br />\nA SAUDI PRINCE CAME N TV AND A WABABBI MULLAH WAS TRYING HARD TO GET HIM TO COMMIT-- THAT HINDUS ARE TERRORISTS<br />\n<br />\nTHE PRINCE CUT HIM OFF- HE SAID \" THE GODHRA INCIDENT WAS REVENGE FOR 31 INNOCENT WOMAN AND 12 CHILDREN BEING BURNT ALIVE INSIDE A TRAIN COMPARTMENT BY MUSLIMS -- WHAT IS WRONG WITH THAT ? \"<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/11/babri-masjid-demolition-mughal-emperor.html</span><br />\n<br />\nAfter several years of inquiry by several eminent men , the bastards came to the conclusion that the kar servaks in the railway compartment, on the way back from ayodhya , died in an ACCIDENTAL fire , of their own creation at Godhra station.<br />\n<br />\nAfter the godra riots -- they found hundreds of stone pelt marks outside the compartment and stones inside the compartment --<br />\n<br />\n----thousands of LIVE witnesses -- yet the enquiry commission of the ITALIAN waitress declared\u2014HINDU WOMEN USED STOVES INSIDE THE COMPARTMENT S6 TO COOK AND CAUSED THE FIRE.<br />\n<br />\nSince 2002 they main stream media tried to portray Modi as a murderer . The Italian waitress called Modi --MAUTH KE SAUDAGAR ( merchant of death )..<br />\n<br />\nNone of the TV channels or media ever said , even once , that if the godra train massacre did NOT take place , the 2002 riots also would NOT have taken place .<br />\n<br />\nThey acted as if 2002 riots were pre-meditated and NOT a knee jerk retaliation--under extreme provocation .<br />\n<br />\nThe entire main stream media and TV CONDONED the roasting alive of 59 people on 27th Feb 2002-- since the past 14 years .<br />\n<br />\n302 INNOCENT HINDUS WERE SLAUGHTERED BY MUSLIMS DURING THE POST-GODHRA RIOTS..<br />\n<br />\nTHE HINDU DEATH TOLL IN 2002 GUJARAT RIOTS , INCREASED BECAUSE BARKHA DUTT AND HER MUSLIM CAMERA MAN JAMI UPLOADED A ( PLANTED ) BURNT KORAN PAGE ON NDTV . CHECK 30.00 OF VIDEO BELOW ..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=12qeH4LbeEM</span><br />\n<br />\nThe train compartment was locked , molotov cocktails of kerosene and petrol bottles were thrown into the compartment and people roasted to death . at that time of the day markets were NOT open , and kerosene and acid bulbs were stocked in a nearby Muslim slum .<br />\n<br />\nThe presence of hundreds of big stones inside the compartment and the broken windows cut no ice .<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS HINDU MAJORITY INDIA FOR YOU..<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c1899585168060886515-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c1899585168060886515-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c6214801734075658860\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 KING CHERAMAN PERUMAL OWNED THE SHIVA TEMPLE KAABALISHWARA AT MECCA OASIS WHICH ALSO DOUBLED UP AS A SPICE FREE TRADE CUSTOMS OUTPOST ..<br /><br />146 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 KAABA AT MECCA , THE HOLIEST PLACE OF THE MUSLIMS AND THIS PLANETs FIRST MOSQUE IS THE NAME OF LORD SHIVA AS GOD WITH THE MATTED LOCKS WHICH IS THE SOURCE OF THE GANGES..<br /><br />147 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 KAABALA ( KABBALAH ) OF JUDAISM IS JUST A CORRUPTION OF KAABA + ISHAWARA ( KAABALISHAWARA ) ROOTED IN EIN SOF, THE ENDLESS ONE..<br /><br />148 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 KING CHERAMAN PERUMAL RUSHED TO MECCA ON BEING SUMMONED BY EMERGENCY PIGEON MESSAGE BY THE KERALA NAMBOODIRI ARYAN PRIEST OF THE SHIVA TEMPLE AT MECCA OASIS , BY SHIP TO SALALAH ( PORT AT DHOFAR, HIS OWN KINGDOM ) AND THEN BY CARAVAN ROUTE ..<br /><br />149 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 DURING A FLOOD AT MECCA , THE SHIVA TEMPLE SHIVA LINGAM WAS SUBMERGED UNDER FIVE FEET OF WATER AND THE HINDU SON ( MOHAMMAD ) OF THE YOUNGER SEMITE NAMBOODIRI BROTHER IN CHARGE OF CUSTOMS/ TRADE , UPROOTED THE SHIVA LINGAM (BLASPHEMY ) AND FIXED IT ON THE SE CORNER OF THE TEMPLE STRUCTURE FIVE FEET ABOVE THE GROUND..<br /><br />150 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 IS SANATANA DHARMA WE BUILD A TEMPLE OVER A SPOT WHERE A SHIVA LINGAM ( BLACK METEORITE DIVINE PHALLUS STONE WHICH PROVIDES THE DNA SEED ) IS FOUND, THE STONE CANNOT BE LIFTED OFF THE GROUND AND FIXED AT AN ALTERNATE SPOT..<br /><br />151 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 KING CHERAMAN PERUMAL REPORTEDLY CONVERTED TO ISLAM AFTER MEETING MOHAMMAD , AND DECREED THAT HIS SHIVA TEMPLE AT KODUNGALLUR HIS CULTURAL CENTRE BE CONVERTED TO A MOSQUE BY PIGEON MESSAGE ..<br /><br />152 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 KING CHERAMAN PERUMAL DIED ( REPORTEDLY WAS KILLED ) ON HIS WAY BACK TO CALICUT , INDIA AND HIS DEAD BODY IS BURIED AT A ISLAMIC DARGAH AT SALALAH OMAN MARKED AS THIYYAJUDDIN , KING OF HINDU THIYYA CLAN.<br /><br />153 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 THIS PLANETs FIRST PRISTINE KORAN WAS COMPILED AT KODUNGALLUR CHERAMAN PERUMAL MOSQUE A YEAR AFTER THE DEATH OF MOHAMMAD BY SEMITE YOUNGER BROTHERS OF NAMBOODIRIS UNDER THE CHARGE OF MOHAMMADs FRIEND AND DISCIPLE HINDU CONVERT MALIK BIN DINAR \u2026</span></b><br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2009/07/vedic-practises-in-mecca-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br /><br />CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<br />..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"c6043198391169861581-ce\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c7822148748057008874\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 THE FIRST KORAN EDITED AT CHERAMAN PERUMAL MOSQUE IS THIS&nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: red;\">PLANETs MOST EXPENSIVE BOOK</span><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp;AS IT WAS BOUGHT BY THE WORLDs RICHEST MAN KING MANSA MUSA OF MALI IN GOLD&nbsp;</span></b><br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/01/mansa-musa-king-of-mali-and-sri.html</span><br /><br /><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">155 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 KERALA SAGES FROM KODUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY PROVIDED THE COSMIC ALLEGORY PART OF THE KORAN USING THE NUMBER 786 ( HINDU KING MANTRA OM ) ON THE COVER PAGE AND COSMIC CODE 19 IN THE VERSES..</span></b><br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/12/god-code-by-timothy-paul-smith-damning.html</span><br /><br /><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">156 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 CODE 19 INCORPORATED IN THE KORAN IF PART OF MOUNT MERU MYSTICISM, IT REPRESENTS THE 19 YEAR METONIC CYCLE , WHERE THE SUN , MOON AND EARTH LINE UP IN THE SAME RELATIVE POSITIONS ONCE EVERY 19 YEARS , AS A RESULT OF THE HINDU KING MANTRA OM ( DIGITAL REPRESENTATION 108 , GEOMETRICAL REPRESENTATION OF SRI YANTRA CONSTRUCTED WITH DIVINE GOLDEN MEAN 1.618 )..</span></b><br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/12/108-numerical-equivalent-of-hindu-king.html</span><br /><br /><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">157 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 SIMPLEX CODE PRIME NUMBER 19 WAS ENMESHED INTO KORAN VERSES BY HINDU SAGES FROM KOUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY TO PREVENT FUDGING LATER BY JEWISH / CHRISTIAN ENEMIES OF ISLAM.. THESE UNGRATEFUL MUSLIMS NOW CALL HINDUS SAVAGES..<br /><br /><br />158 - IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 THE VEDA SRUTI VERSES IN SANSKRIT HAD ITS OWN DIVINE MATH MULTIPLEX VERIFIERS .. VEDIC SRUTIS HAVE GOLDEN MEAN (1.618 ) , FIBONACCI SERIES , PASCALS TRIANGLE, LUCAS NUMBERS , SRI YANTRA ( GEOMETRY OF OM ), ULAM SPIRAL, PRIME NUMBER VERIFIER , ISOTOPE MAGIC EMBEDDED IN IT ..</span></b><br /><span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/02/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html</span><br /><br /><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">159- IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL RIGHT WHEN HE SAYS \u2013 THE ORIGINAL KORAN STILL HAND MADE IN CHERAMAN PERUMAL MOSQUE LIES HIDDEN IN A FOXHOLE UNDER TIMBUCTOO DESERT SANDS SAFE FROM FRENCH JEW ROTHSCHILDs MERCENERIES WHO TRIED TO DESTROY THE BOOK SEVERAL TIMES BY BURNING DOWN THE LIBRARY AT MALI..</span></b><br /><br />LIES WONT WORK.. A BROWN HINDU BLOGGER IS IN TOWN..<br /><br />I WILL NOT REVEAL THE FURTHER DETAILS OF&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">CODE 19&nbsp;</span></b>ENMESHED IN KORAN\u2014I WILL DO IT ONLY WHEN MY REVELATIONS REACH 98 %..<br /><br />IT SO HAPPENS THAT YOU TEACH SOME UNGRATEFUL BASTARD \u2013 AND LATER HE STARTS TEACHING YOU , WHAT HE LEARNT FROM YOU..<br /><br />Capt ajit vadakayil<br />..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c7822148748057008874-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c7822148748057008874-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c806970617106005461\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. HOW HE CHEATED THE HINDUS... EVEN HIS FINAL WORDS \"HET RAM\" IS FAKE..<br />\n<br />\nGANDHIs MOTHER PUTALIBHAI WAS A JAIN, A FOLLOWER OF JAIN MONK BECHARJI SWAMI .. HER NEIGHBOUR WAS MY OFFICERs GREAT GRAND FATHER<br />\n<br />\nPREVIOUSLY WIKIPEDIA WROTE GANDHIs RELIGION AS \"JAIN\"<br />\n<br />\nTHEN IT BECAME \"HINDU WITH JAIN AFFILIATIONS\"<br />\n<br />\nNOW IT HAS DISAPPEARED..<br />\n<br />\nGandhi's personal guru was JAIN Shrimad Rajchandra.. Everybody knows this. Gandhi had written this several times..<br />\n<br />\nGandhi wrote about ROTHSCHILDs NON-VIOLENCE AGENT Shrimad Rajchandra in his autobiography, The Story of My Experiments with Truth, calling Raichandbhai his \"guide and helper\" and his \"refuge in moments of spiritual crisis\".<br />\n<br />\nShrimad Rajchandra, his mother, and wife stayed at JEW Aga Khan's bungalow in Ahmedabad..<br />\n<br />\nGANDHI USED TO BE THROWN INTO JAIL BY ROTHSCHILD OFTEN...<br />\n<br />\nGREAT PUBLICITY WAS GIVEN IN THE FRONT PAGES OF ALL NEWSPAPERS (MONOPOLISED BY ROTHSCHILD ) --OF GANDHI BRAVELY DEFYING THE BRITISH AND ENTERING JAIL..<br />\n<br />\nSAME NIGHT GANDHI WOULD BE WHISKED FROM JAIL IN GREAT SECRECY TO ONE OF JEW AGA KHANs PALACES NEARBY-- WHERE TWO UNDERAGE GIRLS WOULD BE WAITING WITH ENEMA KIT AND BLANKET..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/01/mahatma-gandhi-and-his-endless.html<br />\n<br />\nJEW AGHA KHAN WAS THE ONLY RELIGIOUS LEADER TO GET A GUN SALUTE FROM THE WHITE INVADER<br />\n<br />\nSAAAB KO CHOOTIYA BANAAYA..<br />\n<br />\nSir Sultan Muhammed Shah, Aga Khan III was the founder of ALL INDIA MUSLIM LEAGUE--which demanded the partition of India..<br />\n<br />\nThis JEW was the the first Honorary President of the Muslim League. JEW Sir Sultan Muhammed Shah, Aga Khan III was taken by Jew Rothschild in all three Round Table Conferences in London from 1930\u201332..<br />\n<br />\nRotshchild made JEW Agha Khan III the President of the League of Nations from 1937\u201338 --this org was the fore runner of UN--to carve out Israel.<br />\n<br />\nAga Khan's last three wives were JEWESSES--Cleope Teresa Magliano/ Andr\u00e9e Jos\u00e9phine Carron/ Yvonne Blanche Labrousse<br />\n<br />\nThe AIML party arose out of a literary movement begun at The Aligarh Muslim University in which JEW Syed Ahmad Khan was a central figure..<br />\n<br />\nThe principles of the League were espoused in the \"Green Book,\" which included the organisation's constitution, written by JEW Maulana Mohammad Ali. Mumbai's Muhammad Ali road is named after this JEW. I have seen his KOSHER grave in Jerusalem..<br />\n<br />\nOn 29 December 1930 JEW Sir Muhammad Iqbal delivered his monumental presidential address to the All India Muslim League annual session, demanding Pakistan.<br />\n<br />\nJinnah was a JEW. At a League conference in Lahore in 1940, Jinnah demanded Pakistan.<br />\n<br />\nBY 1947, ALL MAJOR MUSLIM KINGDOMS IN INDIA WERE RULED BY CRYPTO JEWS.<br />\n<br />\nMAJJA HAI-- KISSI KOH KUCH NAHIN PATHA.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; one street ( at Marriott Hotel over looking river Neckar ) is named after Iqbal called IQBAL UFER-- thanks to German Jew Rothschild..Rothschild rewarded him for his role in pouring cold water over Muslim world anger over Palestine and ending the powerful Ottoman empire at Turkey.<br />\n<br />\nIqbal was first noticed by Rothschild , as a piece of clay to be molded, when he wrote something which surprised everybody.<br />\n<br />\nUpon the death of Queen Victoria in 1901, Dr. Iqbal penned an epicedium of ten pages, entitled \u201cTears of Blood \u201c.<br />\n<br />\nThe Queen died on the day of Eid-ul-Fitr, and Iqbal the slave wrote : ---<br />\n\"Happiness came, but grief came along with it,<br />\nYesterday was Eid, but today muharram<br />\n(Month of the year associated with the deepest mourning<br />\nfor Muslims) came.<br />\n<br />\n\"Easier than the grief and mourning of this day,<br />\nWould be the coming of the morn of the day of judgment.<br />\n<br />\n\"Ah! the Queen of the realm of the heart has passed away,<br />\nMy scarred heart has become a house of mourning.<br />\n<br />\n\"O India, thy lover has passed away,<br />\nShe who sighed at thy troubles has passed away.<br />\n<br />\n\"O India, the protective shadow of God has<br />\nbeen lifted from above you,<br />\nShe who sympathised with your inhabitants has gone.<br />\n<br />\n\"Victoria is not dead as her good name remains,<br />\nthis is the life to whomever God gives it.<br />\n<br />\n\"May the deceased receive abundant heavenly<br />\nreward, and may we show goodly patience.\"<br />\n<br />\n(Baqiyyat-i Iqbal, Poem runs over pages 71\u2013 90.)<br />\n<br />\nSOB--SOB--CRY--CRY!!<br />\n<br />\nIn December 1911, on the occasion of the coronation of King George V, Iqbal wrote and read out a poem entitled `Our King':<br />\n<br />\n\"It is the height of our good fortune,<br />\nThat our King is crowned today.<br />\n<br />\n\"By his life our peoples have honour,<br />\nBy his name our respect is established.<br />\n<br />\n\"With him have the Indians made a bond of loyalty,<br />\nOn the dust of his footsteps are our hearts sacrifced.\"<br />\n(Baqiyyat-i Iqbal, p. 206.)<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_172BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, HE WAS TUTORED BY JEW JAMES PRINCEP , A RIGHT HAND MAN OF JEW\nROTHSCHILD.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">USING BRAHMI SCRIPT HE\nPLANTED ROCK EDICTS AND RELICS ALL OVER INDIA..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">EMPEROR ASHOKA WHO\nCONVERTED FROM BAAAAAD HINDUISM TO GOOOOOD BUDDHISM NEVER EXISTED..&nbsp;&nbsp; THE WHOLE IDEA WAS TO GIVE HINDU DALITS WHO\nCONVERT TO BUDDHISM ( UNDER BR AMBEDKAR ) AN ICON..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/08/chanakya-taxila-university-professor.html<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE TRAVEL ACCOUNTS OF\nBUDDHIST TRAVELERS FA HIEN AND HSUAN TSANG WERE COOKED UP BY ALEXANDER\nCUNNINGHAM. FOR THIS lying EFFORT HE WAS KNIGHTED.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He published \u201cThe\nAncient Geography of India\u201d in 1871, which was the first collection of the edicts\nof the 3rd-Century-BC Indian emperor Ashoka, and \u201cThe Stupa of Bharhut\u201d in\n1879-- all kosher LIES ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ALEXANDER CUNNINGHAM\nGAVE AWAY TAXILA AND NALANDA UNIVERSITIES TO BUDDHISTS... THESE UNIVERSITIES\nEXISTED THOUSANDS OF YEARS BEFORE BUDDHA WAS BORN..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4700 YEARS AGO , KERALA\nMATHEMATICIAN ARYAN BHATTATHIRIPPAD ( ARYABHATTA ) WAS A VISITING MATH /\nASTRONOMY PROFESSOR FROM KODUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY, AT MUZIRIS OWNED BY THE\nCALICUT KING ( MY HOMETOWN ) TO NALANDA UNIVERISTY ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/01/isaac-newton-calculus-thief-capt-ajit.html<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ALL OVER THE PLANET\nWHITE JEWS HAVE REPLACED AYYAPPA WITH BUDDHA AS THE NINTH AVATAR OF\nVISHNU...BUDDHISM WAS REVIVED TO MAKE THE HINDU SELF LOATHING...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE IN INDIA NEVER HEARD\nOE EMPEROR ASHOKA BEFORE THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">The entire Math ,astronomy , science in Arabic was sold in gold to Arabs by Calicut, Kerala Kings.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">ANCIENT ARABS AND GREEKS DO NOT HAVE A SINGLE INVENTION OR DISCOVERY repeat NOT A SINGLE INVENTION OR DISCOVERY , WHICH IS NOT STOLEN FROM INDIA .. .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">We never affixed author\u2019s names on our books of knowledge.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Kodungallur university BLACK BALLED all stealing Greeks who patented knowledge in their own names BINDAASSSS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">And ancient Greek knowledge suddenly dried up like water in the hot desert sands..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Arabic language was created by Kerala Namboodiris . Their numerals are called Hindu-Arabic even today.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">#####################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 18.4px;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b>Al Biruni<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">AL fuckin\u2019 BIRUNI STUDIED IN KODUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY AND TOOK ELABORATE NOTES WITH HIM -WITHOUT UNDERSTANDING, AS HE WAS NOT VERY BRIGHT<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Al-Biruni was a Sanskrit scholar who learnt Math and astronomy in from Namboodiri professors adept in Sanskrit and Arabic .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Let me quote Wikipedia -<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">QUOTE: Al-Biruni wrote an encyclopedic work on India called \u201cTarikh Al-Hind\u201d (History of India) in which he explored nearly every aspect of Indian life, including religion, history, geography, geology, science, and mathematics. My book is nothing but a simple historic record of facts. I shall place before the reader the theories of the Hindus exactly as they are, and I shall mention in connection with them similar theories of the Greeks in order to show the relationship existing between them.(1910, Vol. 1, p. 7;1958, p. 5)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Hindus considered Muslims violent and impure, and did not want to share anything with him.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Over time, Al-Biruni won the welcome of Hindu scholars. Al-Biruni collected books and studied with these Hindu scholars to become fluent in Sanskrit, discover and translate into Arabic the mathematics, science, medicine, astronomy and other fields of arts as practiced in 11th century India. He was inspired by the arguments offered by Indian scholars who believed earth must be ellipsoid shape, with yet to be discovered continent at earth's south pole, and earth's rotation around the sun is the only way to fully explain the difference in daylight hours by latitude, seasons and earth's relative positions with moon and stars.[36] Al-Biruni was also critical of Indian scribes who he believed carelessly corrupted Indian documents while making copies of older documents.[37] Al-Biruni's translations as well as his own original contributions reached Europe in 12th and 13th century, where they were actively sought.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">CONTINUED TO 2--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">CONTINUED FROM 1--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">While others were killing each other over religious differences, Al-Biruni had a remarkable ability to engage Hindus in peaceful dialogue. Mohammad Yasin puts this dramatically when he says, \u201cThe Indica is like a magic island of quiet, impartial research in the midst of a world of clashing swords, burning towns, and burned temples.\u201d (Indica is another name for Al-Biruni\u2019s history of India). (Yasin, 1975, p. 212). :UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Al-Biruni</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">############################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 18.4px;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b>Ibn al-haytham<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Ibn fuckin\u2019 al-Haytham or Alhazen has been made out to be the first theoretical physicists, -- a system where a hypothesis must be proved by mathematical evidence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Alhazen\u2019s ( Ibn al-Haytham) science of optics is not his own. He just lifted and patented.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">As regards Alzhazen\u2019s OPTICS, the wolrd must know we Indians were masters in TOTAL INTERNAL REFLECTION \u2013 the ultimate in optics<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/10/total-internal-reflection-capt-ajit.html</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Ptolemy stole from the astronomical data from Surya Siddhanta . The white historians had the gall to LIE that Varahamihira 2660 BC stole from Ptolemy of 155 AD.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">He went back and patented SWASTIKA ( dhruv / Polaris and sapt rishis/ great bear ) in his own name.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">We never affixed author\u2019s names on our books of knowledge.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Kodungallur university BLACK BALLED all stealing Greeks . And ancient Greek knowledge suddenly dried up like water in the hot desert sands..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">##########################################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 18.4px;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b>Muhammad ibn Zakariya al-Razi<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Muhammad fuckin\u2019 ibn Zakariya al-Razi studied in Kodungallur University in 886 AD. He left behind several translated to Arabic manuscripts on medicine and surgery ( Al Mansuri ) and astronomy. This knowledge of Susruta and Charaka was sold to him for gold . All the manuscripts he left behind were ready made translated knowledge from Kodungllur university ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">###############################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 18.4px;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b>Nasir al-Din al-Tusi<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Nasir al-Din fuckin\u2019 al-Tusi studied in Kodungallur University in 1260 AD. He is called the father of Trigonometry This is nonsense . He was NOT a bright student and he was given translated Math knowledge ( Kit\u0101b al-Shakl al-qatt\u0101 ) from the Kerala school of Math in exchange for gold.
