font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">################################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 18.4px;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-size: x-large;\"><b>Muhammad ibn Musa al-Khwarizmi</b></span><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Mathematician Muhammad ibn fuckin\u2019 Musa al-Khwarizmi studied in Kodungallur University in Kerala.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Fibonacci took his Arabic works to Italy from Bejaya , Algeria.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">ALGEBRA is derived from Al-Jabr, one of the two operations he used to solve quadratic equations. Algorism and algorithm stem from Algoritmi, the Latin form of his name.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Let me quote wikipedia:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">QUOTE- Ibn al-Nad\u012bm's Kit\u0101b al-Fihrist includes a short biography on al-Khw\u0101rizm\u012b together with a list of the books he wrote. Al-Khw\u0101rizm\u012b accomplished most of his work in the period between 813 and 833. After the Muslim conquest of Persia, Baghdad became the centre of scientific studies and trade, and many merchants and scientists from as far as China and India traveled to this city, as did al-Khw\u0101rizm\u012b. He worked in Baghdad as a scholar at the House of Wisdom established by Caliph al-Ma\u2019m\u016bn, where he studied the sciences and mathematics, which included the translation of Greek and Sanskrit scientific manuscripts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Al-Khw\u0101rizm\u012b's Z\u012bj al-Sindhind[11] (Arabic: \u0632\u064a\u062c \u0627\u0644\u0633\u0646\u062f \u0647\u0646\u062f\u200e, \"astronomical tables of Sindh and Hind\") is a work consisting of approximately 37 chapters on calendrical and astronomical calculations and 116 tables with calendrical, astronomical and astrological data, as well as a table of sine values. This is the first of many Arabic Zijes based on the Indian astronomical methods known as the sindhind.[22] The work contains tables for the movements of the sun, the moon and the five planets known at the time. This work marked the turning point in Islamic astronomy. Hitherto, Muslim astronomers had adopted a primarily research approach to the field, translating works of others and learning already discovered knowledge.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">-UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Muhammad_ibn_Musa_al-Khwarizmi</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">LIES WONT WORK ANYMORE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">FROM 800 AD TO 1450AD KODUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY OWNED BY THE CALICUT KING EARNED HUGE AMOUNT OF GOLD FOR SELLING READY MADE TRANSLATED KNOWLEDGE ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; CHIEF OFFICER OPENED OUT A KORAN ON HIS BED AND INSIDE THE COVER WAS WRITTEN \" DEATH TO ISRAEL.. DEATH TO USA \"..<br />\n<br />\nHE WAS A HANDSOME GUY, CLEAN AT HEART..<br />\n<br />\nHE BECAME MY FAN AND WOULD DISCUSS THE KORAN WITH ME -- THINGS WHICH HIS ISLAMIC TEACHERS ( WHO JUST KNEW ARABIC ) COULD NOT ADDRESS.<br />\n<br />\nONE DAY HE TOLD ME-- CAPTAIN SAAB, I HAVE HEAVY CLOUT IN PAKISTAN.. ANYTIME YOU SHIP COMES TO PAKISTAN, JUST GIVE ME A RING, I WILL GET YOU OUT OF THE PORT GATES WITH PROPER IMMIGRATION PASS AND TAKE YOU WHERE EVER YOU WANT TO GO IN PAKISTAN PERSONALLY..<br />\n<br />\nONE DAY , HE SHOWED ME HIS WOULD BE WIFEs PHOTO..<br />\n<br />\nA VERY BEAUTIFUL WOMAN<br />\n<br />\nSHE WAS A HARDCORE ISLAMIC PREACHER ( FOR RADICALIZING ISLAMIC WOMEN )..<br />\n<br />\nI CONVINCED HIM THAT HE SHOULD MARRY A WOMAN WHO LOVES HIM ( NOT ISLAM ), WHO CAN MAKE HIM SMILE, WHO WILL COOK FOR HIM, MAKE HIS HOUSE A HOME AND TAKE CARE OF HIS FUTURE CHILDREN..<br />\n<br />\nHE DID THAT .. SUCH WAS MY INFLUENCE ON HIM..<br />\n<br />\nI DID NOT USE DRUGS TO REVERSE BRAINWASH HIM.. JUST LOGOS..<br />\n<br />\nLATER ON ANOTHER SHIP A PAKISTANI CHIEF OFFICER TOLD ME.. HE KNEW THIS GUY..<br />\n<br />\nONE DAY THE PAKISTANI AIRPORT CUSTOMS CONFISCATED SOMETHING HE DID NOT DECLARE..<br />\n<br />\nHE WITNESSED HIM TELLING THE TOP AIRPORT CUSTOMS OFFICER-- IN 24 HOURS YOU WILL PERSONALLY DELIVER THIS ITEM IN MY HOME.. AND WALKED OFF. HE SAYS THE CUSTOMS GUY BECAME ASHEN FACED...<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"></span><br />\n<ol id=\"top-ra\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c3499858154262815009\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; max-width: 36px; padding: 5px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. IT IS THE GREATEST FEELING IN LIFE AND THIS IS PERMANENT..</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">\n</span>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-weight: 700;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">\n<span style=\"font-weight: bold;\">SELF DISCOVERY HAPPENS OUTSIDE THE COMFORT ZONE..</span></span><br />\nI ASKED THE ISLAMIC SCHOLAR -- DID ANY MULLAH IN PAKISTAN / IRAN/ AFGHANISTAN EVERY TELL YOU WHAT IS 786 ENGRAVED ON THE COVER OF THE KORAN..<br />\n<br />\nHE REPLIED--NO.. HE ASKED ALL . NOBODY COULD TELL HIM OTHER THAT GIVING SOME BULL THAT IT REPRESENTS \"BISMILLAH \".<br />\n<br />\nI ALLOWED HIM TO DISCOVER WHAT IS IN THE VIDEO BELOW-- I DID NOT TELL HIM.. I ENSURED THAT HE LED HIMSELF TO IT..<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SNraVirlP8U</span><br />\n<br />\nHE NEARLY FELL OFF HIS CHAIR IN SHOCK -- THAT HIS KORAN HAD THE HINDU KING MANTRA OM ON THE COVER..<br />\n<br />\nHE HAD A ROSARY AND IT HAD 108 BEADS AGAIN-- OM..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/12/108-numerical-equivalent-of-hindu-king.html</span><br />\n<br />\nHE HAS BEEN SEVERAL TIMES TO MECCA..<br />\n<br />\nI ASKED HIM --WHAT WAS THE PURPOSE OF YOUR PILGRIMAGE TO MECCA..<br />\n<br />\nHE REPLIED-- TO KISS THE BLACK STONE.. I ALLOWED HIM TO DISCOVER BY HIMSELF THAT THE BLACKSTONE IS NOTHING BUT A SHIVA LINGAM.. AND HE KNEW THE ANCIENT COPPER WATER DRIP POTS HANGING ON THE CEILING INSIDE THE KAABA..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2009/07/vedic-practises-in-mecca-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHEN HE NARRATED AN INCIDENT..<br />\n<br />\nMANY OF HIS FRIENDS AND RELATIVES WHO NEVER BEEN TO MECCA , ASKED HIM TO RUB A HANDKERCHIEF ON THE BLACK STONE AND GIVE IT TO THEM AS A PRESENT..<br />\n<br />\nACCORDINGLY HE HAS 24 SMALL SILK HANDKERCHIEFS IN HIS POCKET..<br />\n<br />\nAFTER KISSING THE LACK STONE, HE STARTED RUBBING HE SILK PIECES ON THE STONE.. THE FIERCE GUARD IN UNIFORM STANDING OVER HIM, TOLD HIM TO STOP.. HE DID NOT.. HE CONTINUED RUBBING.<br />\n<br />\nHE FURIOUS GUARD BEAT HIM BADLY WITH THE WHIP-- THE WHIP END TORE HIS CLOTHES AND RIPPED HIS SKIN, STILL HE CONTINUED.. He and his tribe see you from where you cannot see them.\" 7:27<br />\n<br />\nThe Quran emphasises that the only duty of believers in the Hajj is to commemorate the name of God. margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_117B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_118B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8355220650239512652\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_118M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_118MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2--<br />\n<br />\n\"When you disperse from \u2018Arafat\u2019 you shall commemorate God\u2026\u2026\u2026.\" 2:198<br />\n<br />\n\"Once you have completed your rites, you shall commemorate God\u2026\u2026\" 2:200<br />\n<br />\nFAKE HADITHS INSERTED BY JEWS--<br />\n<br />\nIt was narrated from Ibn \u2018Abbaas that the Prophet seated al-Fadl behind him on his mount, and al-Fadl said that he did not stop reciting the Talbiyah until he stoned the Jamrah. -- al-Bukhaari (1685) and Muslim (1282). \u2026<br />\n<br />\nIt was narrated from \u2018Abd-Allaah that he came to the largest Jamrah and put the House on his left and Mina on his right and stoned it with seven (pebbles), and he said: This is how the one to whom Soorat al-Baqarah was revealed stoned it. --Narrated by al-Bukhaari (1748) and Muslim (1296)\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIt was narrated from Ibn \u2018Umar that he would stone al-Jamrah al-Dunya (the Jamrah near the Khayf mosque) with seven pebbles, saying takbeer after every throw. Then he would go ahead until he reached the level ground where he would stand facing the qiblah, and he stood for a long time, offering du\u2019aa\u2019 and raising his hands. Then he would stone the middle pillar, then he would move to the left towards the middle ground, where he would stand facing the qiblah. He would remain there for a long time offering du\u2019aa\u2019 and raising his hands. Then he would stone Jamarat al-\u2018Aqabah from the middle of the valley, but he did not stand beside it. Then he would leave and say: This is how I saw the Prophet doing it. ----Narrated by al-Bukhaari (1751)\u2026<br />\n<br />\nALMOST ALL TOP MUSLIM CLERGY TODAY GET JEWISH FUNDS.. font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dead people tell no\ntales. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">One of them was an\nextremely rich banker ( you can guess who he is ) , who was Noor\u2019s fianc\u00e9 and\nlover. &nbsp;He was a pianist who was smitten\nby Noor\u2019s &nbsp;beauty and her \u201cnon-existant\u201d royal\ngenes. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This love affair\nblossomed under the watchful eye of their French music teacher at the Paris\nConservatory, the great Nadia Boulanger. &nbsp;Noor stayed in a house at Suresnes, near Paris\ndonated to her by her Jewish lover, and who also sponsored her music classes... <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Juliette Nadia\nBoulanger</span> who died on 22 October 1979 was a woman composer, conductor and\nteacher . &nbsp;She was the first woman to\nconduct many major orchestras in America and Europe, including the BBC\nSymphony, Boston Symphony, Hall\u00e9, New York Philharmonic and Philadelphia\norchestras. &nbsp;This woman would NOT take a\nstudent unless the recommendation comes from the high sources , who fund her.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; Lenin and Stalin were Jews.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Noor-un-Nisa&nbsp; Inayat Khan, was born in the Kremlin where\nher father was received as guest of the Czar Nicholas II. The Czar, his country\ntroubled by internal unrest and looming war, was seeking spiritual solutions to\nthe problems facing his regime. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Therefore,\nthe influential Gregory Rasputin invited Inayat Khan to visit Russia in order\nto share with the Emperor's family and court his Sufistic doctrines of peace\nand love. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So, born on 1 January\n1914 in Russia , to her Indian father and American mother, Noor\u2019s infancy was\nspent in London.&nbsp; The family moved to\nFrance when she was a child and lived in Paris, where she was educated and\nlearnt fluent French. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1926 Hazrat , Noor's\nfather returned to India. He died within a year in India and is buried in a\ntomb complex called the Nizumudin Dargah, in Delhi. This had been originally\nbuilt for a 14th century Sufi mystic, Nizamuddin Auliya.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-MnkslCd2kII/UJziegS8PuI/AAAAAAAAXI8/_tGxmK1YxG8/s1600/84983112-dargah-hazrat.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"252\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-MnkslCd2kII/UJziegS8PuI/AAAAAAAAXI8/_tGxmK1YxG8/s320/84983112-dargah-hazrat.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Noor grew up in\nthe suburbs of Paris, at \"Fazal Manzil\", a famous house in Suresnes\noutside which a military band set up by her rich banker cum pianist lover still plays in\nher honour every 14 July. &nbsp;&nbsp;When war\nbroke out in 1939, Noor Inayat Khan trained as a nurse with the French Red\nCross.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She became a German agent and\n\u201cfled from France\u201d&nbsp; just before the\ngovernment surrendered to Germany in November 1940, &nbsp;escaping by the last ship boat to England with\nher mother and sister, and landed at Falmouth in June 1940 .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shortly after arriving\nin the UK, she joined the Women's Auxiliary Air Force (WAAF) as a wireless\noperator and soon caught the attention of recruiters from the SOE .&nbsp; She made it very clear that her little\nprincess heart broke , when France was occupied by Germans.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She wanted to do something against fascism\nand she joined the elite spy squad in 1942, with express recommendation from Winston\nChurchill . &nbsp;Churchill\u2019s mother Jenny\nJerome is Rothchilds.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-6abuEMJKeSk/UJziy37PX6I/AAAAAAAAXJE/zSg0hmDe_Xw/s1600/_64002985_64002984.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"225\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-6abuEMJKeSk/UJziy37PX6I/AAAAAAAAXJE/zSg0hmDe_Xw/s400/_64002985_64002984.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Noor Inayat Khan, was\nto be a wireless operator in the French section of the Special Operations\nExecutive (SOE), on recommendation &nbsp;by\nthe British PM himself\u2014what a honor!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Noor took off by\naircraft from Tangmere UK late on June 16th 1943 and landed in a remote field\nin the Loire on June 17th. &nbsp;She was\nreceived by Henri Dericourt ( code name Gilbert ) recruited by MI6 ( Rothschild\npayroll Secret Intelligence Service) . &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Later\ncrimes investigator Vera Atkins, would reveal that Henri too was a German\ndouble agent.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Both Noor and Henri were\nworking for Sicherheitsdienst des Reichsf\u00fchrers-SS, or SD , the intelligence\nagency of the SS and the Nazi Party in Nazi Germany.&nbsp; During the weeks immediately following her\narrival, at France the Gestapo made mass arrests in the Paris Resistance group.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">It is reported that on\n13 October 1943 <b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">CRYPTO JEWESS Inayat Khan</b> was arrested .&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">There is NIL evidence of her being\nin any German prison &nbsp;at Pforzheim ,\nother than bullshit British propaganda.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Her\nlast word was \"Libert\u00e9\" , before she was shot ? \u2013 what a joke!&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Gestapo had access\nto her secret codes and messages and were now in a position to work back to\nLondon. The Germans made an ass out of Britain by sending false messages\nimitating her. The Germans were able to use her radio to trick London into\nsending new agents - straight into the hands of the waiting Gestapo.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They sucked in many\nmore British agents and \u2013YES\u2014none of them were spared . They were caught by the\nGermans even before they could remove the parachutes from their body. Among\nthem was <span style=\"color: blue;\">Madeleine Damerment</span>, who was executed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-uyshplA-iGI/UJzhT_EG-LI/AAAAAAAAXIE/mOv-mXUyDMc/s1600/Madeleine+Damerment.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-uyshplA-iGI/UJzhT_EG-LI/AAAAAAAAXIE/mOv-mXUyDMc/s1600/Madeleine+Damerment.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">First of all the usual\nmethod of execution at German prison Dachau was by hanging.&nbsp; Even now the staff members at the Dachau\nMemorial site get amused when they hear about princess Noor Inayat Khan ( or\nher various code names like Madeleine, Nora Baker, Nurse etc ) getting tortured for many months\nand then being shot. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are\nabsolutely NIL records of her execution, while records of all others exist. And\nsurely such a pretty woman spy would be noted by all.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-5dVQBBh-esM/UJzvol0d_9I/AAAAAAAAXK4/NEERHmcdwdg/s1600/Noor%E2%80%99s+RAF+ID+Card,+a+unique+and+previously+unseen+document.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"267\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-5dVQBBh-esM/UJzvol0d_9I/AAAAAAAAXK4/NEERHmcdwdg/s400/Noor%E2%80%99s+RAF+ID+Card,+a+unique+and+previously+unseen+document.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Brits and Rothchild\ncontrolled press tom tommed that Noor\u2019s r last words before being shot were\n\u201cliberty\u201d . Another report by a witness says a guard tried to force her to say\n\"Heil Hitler\" she refused saying \"One day you will see the\ntruth\".</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>TEE HEEEEE!</b></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b><o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The same way, Hitler\ndid NOT shoot himself in his Berlin bunker. He escaped on a microlight plane to\nAustria, &nbsp;piloted by his blue eyed ace woman\npilot.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-mQPoCJ9CrQ8/UJziPg9ucoI/AAAAAAAAXI0/WtaZ-EPMcHo/s1600/llpo.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"223\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-mQPoCJ9CrQ8/UJziPg9ucoI/AAAAAAAAXI0/WtaZ-EPMcHo/s400/llpo.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">British PM David\nCameron, who said it was \u2018impossible not to be moved\u2019 by princess Noor's &nbsp;bravery. General\nSir David Richards, the Chief of Defence Staff, said 'We owe our freedom to\nwomen like Noor Inayat Khan.'&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><b>SNIFF!</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now something about\nMata Hari, the alleged German spy..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Nek5JRxgpnE/UJzeSvql9dI/AAAAAAAAXGU/jBLTqKRb8uM/s1600/Mata_Hari_15.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"265\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Nek5JRxgpnE/UJzeSvql9dI/AAAAAAAAXGU/jBLTqKRb8uM/s400/Mata_Hari_15.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mata Hari was arrested\nin her room at the Hotel Elysee Palace, on the Champs Elysee (now the HSBC\nFrench headquarters), in Paris. She was put on trial, accused of spying for\nGermany and consequently causing the deaths of at least 50,000 soldiers. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There was NIL evidence\nagainst her. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Secret ink was found in\nher room, which was incriminating evidence in that period. She tried her best\nto convince all that this ink was part of her stage make up.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Much of her popularity\nis owed to the film titled Mata Hari (1931) starring Greta Garbo in the leading\nrole. &nbsp;While based on real events in the\nlife of Margaretha Zelle, the plot was largely fictional, appealing to the\npublic appetite for fantasy at the expense of historical fact. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-1m-vHjRyQ00/UJze307oZGI/AAAAAAAAXGc/LERlFQnm_3E/s1600/HUUU.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-1m-vHjRyQ00/UJze307oZGI/AAAAAAAAXGc/LERlFQnm_3E/s1600/HUUU.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Paris, Mata Hari\nlived a glitzy and glamorous life, &nbsp;at\nthe Grand Hotel and with plenty of rich and powerful men , including men in\nuniform to keep her occupied . It did not seem to matter that no one had the\nleast bit of evidence against her.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nor could anyone point to a single document,\nplan or secret that she passed to the Germans. Suspicion, envy and the\nprejudices of small-minded men would triumph. It is now clear that she wanted to\nexpose a VERY rich banker.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only 30 years after her\ndeath would one of her prosecutors concede the truth - \"there wasn't\nenough evidence to flog a cat\". <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At the time, as most\nEuropeans were unfamiliar with the mystic of the Orient Dutch , and thus\nthought of Mata Hari as exotic.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-EclkLFH-rDY/UJzgEv_Ny6I/AAAAAAAAXHU/JYzI7uhJ_8M/s1600/220px-Mata_Hari_2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-EclkLFH-rDY/UJzgEv_Ny6I/AAAAAAAAXHU/JYzI7uhJ_8M/s400/220px-Mata_Hari_2.jpg\" width=\"243\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to Pat\nShipman's biography Femme Fatale Mata Hari never was a double agent, but was\nused as a scapegoat by the French military authority to obscure the failing of\nthe French military operations at the front.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This information was obtained by\nShipman when she was allowed to study newly opened files in Paris. &nbsp;She proved to be a brave woman. She refused to\nbe bound and refused a blindfold.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The court file\nconcerning the alleged double agent Mata Hari will not be opened before 15\nOctober 2017, exactly one hundred years after her execution. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A great COOLING PERIOD\nindeed!&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">BRAVO!!</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\"><b>ENJOY THESE CORNY PROPAGANDA\nPEARLS TOO\u2014 ABOUT MUSHY&nbsp;<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">CHRISTIAN / &nbsp;MUSLIM\nCO-OPERATION, WITH JEWISH REMOTE CONTROL</span>&nbsp;.</b></span><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-9HH_p6ZcTuo/UJ3JGWgkUsI/AAAAAAAAXOQ/fECzrJCIykw/s1600/DFGG.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-9HH_p6ZcTuo/UJ3JGWgkUsI/AAAAAAAAXOQ/fECzrJCIykw/s400/DFGG.jpg\" width=\"387\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ms Basu - who spent \u201ceight\nyears researching her life\u201d - told the BBC: &nbsp;\"She was this gentle writer of children's\nstories, a musician, but she was transformed. <span style=\"color: blue;\">She was a tigress</span> in the\nfield.\"&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">London publisher bought\nout <span style=\"color: blue;\">her \u2018Twenty Jataka Tales</span>\u2019, which was published in the UK, USA and France.\nNoor was also in the process of founding a children's newspaper when war broke\nout<i>. &nbsp;&nbsp;Jataka tales is more than 7000 years\nold. &nbsp;Rothschild controlled media just\ncan give this to her.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With <span style=\"color: blue;\">astonishing courage,</span>\nNoor Inayat Khan<span style=\"color: blue;\"> evaded the Gestapo before being betrayed, tortured</span> and, after\nrefusing to reveal any information, executed at Dachau concentration camp. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Princess Anne said&nbsp; stories such as Noor\u2019s are \u2018remarkable in\ntheir own right\u2019 but have a<span style=\"color: blue;\"> real connection to make with the modern age through\ntheir \u2018multi-cultural aspect</span>\u2019. &nbsp;<i><o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Her captors <span style=\"color: blue;\">kicked and\ninterrogated her but she revealed nothing</span>. <i><o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-4E2S6DfEM-s/UK0e_e_Vs5I/AAAAAAAAYws/EKBGVUhg93A/s1600/ndw.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-4E2S6DfEM-s/UK0e_e_Vs5I/AAAAAAAAYws/EKBGVUhg93A/s1600/ndw.gif\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When posthumously\nawarded the George Cross, Britain\u2019s highest civilian decoration, for her\ngallantry in 1949, the citation read: 'She<span style=\"color: blue;\"> refused to abandon what had become\nthe principal and most dangerous post</span> in France, although given the opportunity\nto return to England, because she <span style=\"color: blue;\">did not wish to leave her French comrades\nwithout communications</span>.<i>' &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shrabani Basu : 'I\nrealised how much Noor's story had touched ordinary people, especially the\nyoung.'I felt it was all the more <span style=\"color: blue;\">important to remember Noor's message, her\nideals and her courage in the troubled times we live in.' </span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She decided freedom had\nto be a political and social experience too. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Although Noor Inayat\nKhan was deeply influenced by the pacifist teachings of her father, she decided\nto help defeat Nazi tyranny: \"I wish some Indians would win high military\ndistinction in this war. If one or two could do something in the Allied service\nwhich was very brave and which everybody admired it would help to <span style=\"color: blue;\">make a bridge\nbetween the English people and the Indians</span>.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Over the next month and\na half, all the other Physician network radio operators were arrested by the\nSicherheitsdienst (SD). <span style=\"color: blue;\">In spite of the danger, Noor rejected an offer to\nreturn to Britain</span>. She continued to transmit as the last essential link between\nLondon and Paris. Moving from place to place, she managed to escape capture\nwhile maintaining wireless communication with London. \"She refused to\nabandon what had become the most important and dangerous post in France and did\nexcellent work.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Inayat Khan was\narrested and interrogated at the SD Headquarters at 84 Avenue Foch in Paris.\nThough SOE trainers had expressed doubts about Inayat Khan's gentle and\nunworldly character, <span style=\"color: blue;\">on her arrest she fought so fiercely that SD officers were\nafraid of her</span>. She was thenceforth treated as an extremely dangerous prisoner <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During that time, she\nattempted escape twice. Hans Kieffer, the former head of Gestapo in Paris,\ntestified after the war that she<span style=\"color: blue;\"> did not give the Gestapo a single piece of\ninformation</span>, but lied consistently, despite torture.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After refusing to sign\na declaration renouncing future escape attempts, Inayat Khan was taken to\nGermany on 27 November 1943 \"for safe custody\" and imprisoned at\nPforzheim in solitary confinement as a \"Nacht und Nebel\" (condemned\nto \"Disappearance without Trace\") prisoner, in complete secrecy. <span style=\"color: blue;\">For\nten months, she was kept there handcuffed.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">She was classified as\n\"highly dangerous\" and shackled in chains</span> most of the time. As the\nprison director testified after the war, Inayat Khan remained uncooperative and<span style=\"color: blue;\">\ncontinued to refuse to give any informatio</span>n on her work or her fellow\noperatives.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the early hours of\nthe morning of 13 September 1944, the four women were executed by a shot to the\nhead. Their bodies were immediately burned in the crematorium. An anonymous\nDutch prisoner emerging in 1958 contended that <span style=\"color: blue;\">Inayat Khan was cruelly beaten\nby a high-ranking SS officer named Wilhelm Ruppert before being shot down from\nbehind. Her last word was \"Libert\u00e9\". </span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">SNIFF !&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><br /></span></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Radia tapes\ncontroversy relates to various telephonic conversations involving Nira Radia, a\npolitical lobbyist, taped by the Indian Income Tax Department in 2008\u201309. &nbsp;There\nare more tapes which will come out when Congress loses the 2014 elections.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Fortunately we have a \u201cpatriot core group\u201d in all our government agencies who are more\nloyal to the motherland that to a human being on a throne. &nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>The corrupt ministers who have stashed away their \"lobby\" loot abroad, will have soon cancelled passports. &nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>This \"core group\" will also keep an eye on the various foreign bosses who flow in with the \"IT out sourced\" jobs. &nbsp;Some of them are professionals , trained to do subversive activities.</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; Nira Radia used to run a\npublic relations firm named Vaishnavi Communications, whose clients include the\nTata Teleservices and Mukesh Ambani\u2019s Reliance Industries.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What does the quintessential\nlobbyist ( like Nira Radia) &nbsp;do?<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-nZcayXUKzAw/UJq0oVXpIzI/AAAAAAAAW0c/U7M77jDt6XE/s1600/Nira_radia_INDIAN_MEDIA.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-nZcayXUKzAw/UJq0oVXpIzI/AAAAAAAAW0c/U7M77jDt6XE/s320/Nira_radia_INDIAN_MEDIA.jpg\" width=\"291\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A lobbyist tries to\ninfluence political opinion to his or her benefit. &nbsp;Lobbyists traditionally were considered\n\"information givers,\" usually in support of their cause to swing\nlegislation and government agencies in their favor. &nbsp;Lobbyists are &nbsp;individuals &nbsp;paid well by sections of industry to influence\nthe movers and shakers at the corridors of power. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>Lobbying is legal\nbribing and getting away with it. Lobbying is NOT just talking with politicians\nto try to convince them. Hardly any Indian politician will be swayed by sweet\ntalk and charm. Lobby groups try to convince politicians with money and goodies\n\u2014we are NOT talking about small things like gay rights lobbying here.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2012, around 4.3 Billion USD will be spent\nfor lobbying in USA. Increasingly, lobbyists are ensuring contributions are\nmade to influence decision makers at all stages.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lobbyists systematically build\nup support for their causes. They often have previous government officials\njoining their ranks, leveraging their understanding of how the government\nmachine works , and who all have hand in glove personal chemistry -- and who all are in \"cobra and mongoose\" relationship .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: red;\"><b>Below-- India against Corruption ( IAC ) expose.</b></span></i></div>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;
