text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://1.gvt0.com/vi/urBsk9IXqY0/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/urBsk9IXqY0&fs=1&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/urBsk9IXqY0&fs=1&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://1.gvt0.com/vi/cMI5OCHIT20/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/cMI5OCHIT20&fs=1&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/cMI5OCHIT20&fs=1&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://2.gvt0.com/vi/Upeuw1UFFEo/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/Upeuw1UFFEo&fs=1&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/Upeuw1UFFEo&fs=1&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Above are just a few minutes of the </span><b><span style=\"color: red;\">180 HOURS</span></b><span style=\"color: blue;\"> of \"lobbying\" conversations of Nira Radia --&nbsp;</span></i><br />\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i>\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Oh Boy this motor mouth could talk for ever-- and she held lovely lavish parties at her farm house -- the guest list is with CBI. &nbsp;.</span></i><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Radia tapes have\nexposed the way corporate do lobbying to even fix the appointment of Ministers\nso that they could reap the fruits of dictated and manipulated government\npolicies. These tapes have also exposed how the ministers and bureaucrats\nfunction as cronies of the corporate sector and influence the actions and policies\nof the government in their interest.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Above video clips of Nira\nRadia's taped conversations provide the Indian public a sneak preview as to how\nPR consultants and corporate lobbyists orchestrate deals when it comes to nexus\nbetween mainstream news reporting and government officials.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We would have never\ngot this if it was not leaked. &nbsp;The\npolitical parties are always on look out for funds to fuel their coffers and to\nbuy MPs to form a majority alliance \u2013 or to win a no trust confidence motion in\nthe parliament etc.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>These donations are\nnothing but a \u2018bribe\u2019 on the consideration that corporate pays only for the\nundue `favours' it receives or MUST receive from a political party. &nbsp;No under the table donation\nis free \u2014this is just the small fish at the fish hook which will catch the big\nfish.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Radia episode shows\nthat &nbsp;the real power centre in democracy\nunder capitalist system exists outside the formal and legal structures of the\nState, while the elected organs are rendered more and more toothless and\ncorrupted by the money, with each passing day. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nira Radia with her\nbull dog scowls was instrumental in ensuring a cabinet berth for the DMK\u2019s A.\nRaja when the ministerial portfolios for UPA\u2019s second term were being decided.\nShe lobbied with the Congress leadership to get him the telecom\nportfolio\u2014against the other contender, the DMK\u2019s Dayanidhi Maran. &nbsp;Radia baby has obviously made enemies among some of\nIndia\u2019s top industrialists, who blew the whistle.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-mYChxeHJFyY/UJsefceq19I/AAAAAAAAW7k/VW1psInJkIY/s1600/bbmk.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-mYChxeHJFyY/UJsefceq19I/AAAAAAAAW7k/VW1psInJkIY/s1600/bbmk.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;<span style=\"color: red;\">Above Rotshchild with our PM</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was obvious that Tata\nGroup head Ratan Tata had allegedly put his weight behind Raja and wanted Maran\nout of the scene at any cost. &nbsp;Ratane had in a handwritten letter to Tamil\nNadu CM M. Karunanidhi in December 2007 reportedly praised Raja\u2019s \u201crational,\nfair and action-oriented\u201d leadership. To put the corporate battle in\nperspective, Airtel\u2019s Sunil Mittal ( Walmart\u2019s Indian godfather ) was unhappy\nwith Raja babu in the seat.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CBI says that this\nwoman had the latest state of the art Israeli anti-surveillance gizmos running\non the telephones used by her and her close aides&nbsp; at Vaishnavi Corporate Communications &nbsp;and its sister organisations like Vitcom,\nNeucomp, and Neosys.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-SbB50BX7lRA/UJsek5pmjDI/AAAAAAAAW7s/YMOMiQEHWi0/s1600/15.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"240\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-SbB50BX7lRA/UJsek5pmjDI/AAAAAAAAW7s/YMOMiQEHWi0/s320/15.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;Above Rothschild with Tata.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The IT investigations\nrevealed that apart from managing the telecom licences for builder Unitech,\namong others, Radia also handled and facilitated cross-border transfer of\nfunds. Intercepted conversations between Radia and the allottees of the new\ntelecom licences suggest that she was a key adviser in staggering the inflow of\nfunds from outside India so that no impression could be created that there was\na windfall gain to the companies.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Nira Radia tapes establish\nher links with an IAS officer based in Rajasthan and used by Radia\nto gain access to<b> his batchmates in various ministries.</b>&nbsp; The conversations are a\npart of the CBI notes to the Supreme Court. &nbsp;See her devious ways-- how many of you slack guys could wrangle this?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once A Raja became a\nminister &nbsp;A Raja and corporate lobbyist\nNiira Radia joined hands to bend rules, defy recommendations of the regulator\nand the Ministry of Finance to allot licences in 15 telecom circles to Swan\nTelecom, &nbsp;Unitech Wireless, &nbsp;Datacom and Aircel, according to &nbsp;telephone intercepts.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">UPA government has NIL inner party democracy,\nto facilitate this loot.&nbsp; Queen bee and\nher \u201cnot so bright\u201d son decides everything.&nbsp; There was a time when Italian Quatrocchi could barge in and shout at the babus in the Finance and Defence ministries, just because Queen Bee is also Italian. The babus used to stand up because of fright, while he shouted at them. &nbsp;He used to have minutes of confidential notings , as if to show that he was in the inner cotiere.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-KC-FniABcuo/UJse4ikPXiI/AAAAAAAAW70/U4k_jWVFkQU/s1600/rothschild_lynn_evelyn_sunil_bharti_mittal.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-KC-FniABcuo/UJse4ikPXiI/AAAAAAAAW70/U4k_jWVFkQU/s1600/rothschild_lynn_evelyn_sunil_bharti_mittal.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;<span style=\"color: red;\">Above Rothchild with Sunil Mittal ( Walmart Bharti )&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now we have the shady Italian Augusta helicopter deal. &nbsp;This will explode soon enough. I have dealt with Italians enough to know how they do business.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">We Indians now get the sneaky feelin\u2019 that we are NOT a \u2018Democracy\u2019 but\na well run \u2018Kleptocracy\u2019 i.e. a system of non-governance characterized by\ninjustice, rampant greed and corruption.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">A state where bribery\nhas become a way of life is a kleptocracy.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kleptocracy is a\nGreek-derived term.&nbsp; It means \u201crule by\nthieves\u201d. In our case the Queen bee is a foreigner with 100% foreign DNA.&nbsp; It is used for an establishment that takes\nthe advantage of the rampant corruption in government echelons to increase the\npersonal wealth and political power of the government officials and the ruling\nclass through the embezzlement of government funds at the expense of the wider\npopulace, sometimes without even the pretense of honest service.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once democracy yields to kleptocracy, good governance is given a\nsilent burial. The vacuum thus created is filled by a vicious nexus among\npoliticians, bureaucrats and the corporate who companioning together change the\nlaws of the land to serve their respective interests.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Over a course of time,\nthe corporate interests take over the other interests and corporate start\ndictating terms to the politicians and the bureaucrats. For this they take\nrecourse to greasing their palm or taking the help of lobbyists who, acting on\nbehalf of corporates, influence the policy decisions of the governments, even\ntrying to influence the appointment of ministers to the ministries which are of\nparticular interests to them. Revelations by Neera Radia tapes are clear\npointers to this direction.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All over the world\nover, illegal, underhand donations to political parties have been considered a\nmajor cause of corruption in public life.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-9J8O1FN8CEA/UJsfIzyU9GI/AAAAAAAAW78/JxSAT-IXp-o/s1600/Untitled-1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-9J8O1FN8CEA/UJsfIzyU9GI/AAAAAAAAW78/JxSAT-IXp-o/s1600/Untitled-1.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; <span style=\"color: red;\">&nbsp; &nbsp; Comrades in arms!</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Crony capitalism is a\nterm describing an economy in which success in business depends on close\nrelationships between business people and government officials. </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It may be exhibited by favoritism in the\ndistribution of legal permits, government grants, special tax breaks, or other\nforms of dirigisme.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dirigisme is an economy\nin which a corrupt government whose politicians have been bought by bribes, exerts\nstrong directive influence. The Party Chief issues a WHIP, that every MP must\nvote for FDI in multi-brand retail, so that-- say\u2014 &nbsp;Zionist Walmart can come into the country.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It\ndesignates a mainly capitalist economy with strong directive, as opposed to\nmerely regulatory, economic participation by the state. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Digression: India has\njust become free after 800 years of slavery. These huge foreign corporates , as\nsoon as they secure a toe hold , puts all important Indian power brokers in\ntheir pay rolls and then they run the government by remote control. The wealth\nof the country now gets siphoned out.</i><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; text-align: left;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-sV4KhLjdAgk/UJsgru95QMI/AAAAAAAAW8s/SkFyo1snCiQ/s1600/imagesCACU3OBR.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-sV4KhLjdAgk/UJsgru95QMI/AAAAAAAAW8s/SkFyo1snCiQ/s1600/imagesCACU3OBR.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Crony capitalism arises when\npolitical cronyism spills over into the business world. Self-serving\nfriendships and family ties between businessmen and the government influence\nthe economy and society to the extent that it corrupts public-serving economic\nand political ideals.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They convert our MPs and Ministers into desh-drohis and\nJudases with few pieces of silver. If wealth cant buy them \u2013 it will be muscle, &nbsp;blackmail using honey traps or even assassination. Once you take a bribe, there is no way out.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Black money refers to\nfunds earned on the black market, on which income and other taxes has not been\npaid. Bribing is giving someone some sort of compensation in exchange for\nfavorable treatment.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bribery is an act of\ngiving money or gift giving that alters the behavior of the recipient. Bribery\nconstitutes a crime.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bribery involves offering, giving, receiving, or\nsoliciting of any item of value to influence the actions of an official or\nother person in charge of a public or legal duty. A bribe is a gift bestowed to\ninfluence the recipient's conduct. It may be any money, good, right in action,\nproperty, preferment, privilege, emolument, object of value, advantage, or\nmerely a promise or undertaking to induce or influence the action, vote, or\ninfluence of a person in an official or public capacity.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-jPBMJfFDaPU/UJshLgk6hqI/AAAAAAAAW9M/VRczh1dM8ok/s1600/imagesCANY82GV.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-jPBMJfFDaPU/UJshLgk6hqI/AAAAAAAAW9M/VRczh1dM8ok/s1600/imagesCANY82GV.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lawyer and member\nof IAC Prashant Bhushan said a few days ago , \u201cCrony capitalists are greasing\nthe palms of UPA politicians.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Crony capitalism can devolve into simple\ncorruption, where any pretense of a free market is dispensed with. Bribes to\ngovernment officials are considered de rigueur and tax evasion is common. This\nis sometimes called plutocracy (rule by wealth) or kleptocracy (rule by theft).</span>\n&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Crony capitalism is the\ninevitable result of any capitalist system. Since big businesses make big money\nand money leads to political power, business will inevitably use their power to\ninfluence governments.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The recent Occupy Wall\nStreet movement was all about common man wanting an end to the influence of the\nsuper wealthy in the political process, which is manifestation of crony\ncapitalism.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let me list a few scams\nin our Italian Queen bee's recent rule . Cant put the whole thing as it will be\ntoo much.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Did anybody ever say that India is a poor country.&nbsp; With our scam money alone ( stashed away\nabroad ) we can buy out oil rich middle east countries..<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-h9i5WbRlbxI/UJsha26UjpI/AAAAAAAAW9U/5SDsum1lV4g/s1600/imagesvgy.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-h9i5WbRlbxI/UJsha26UjpI/AAAAAAAAW9U/5SDsum1lV4g/s1600/imagesvgy.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan;\">Note: THE MOTHER OF ALL\nSCAMS (<b>THE THORIUM SCAM</b> ) is still to be exhumed. The year 2012 is still\nincomplete.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1 Billion is 1000\nmillion USD.&nbsp; 1 USD is 55 Rupees.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">Proforma: Title of scam/ year / amount in Indian rupees/ Amount in USD</span></b></div>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Orissa mining scam -2009--&nbsp; &nbsp;7,000\ncrore (US$ 1.32 billion)<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Austral Coke scam \u2013 2009-- 1,000 crore\n(US$189 million)<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Army ration pilferage scam \u2013 2008-- 5,000\ncrore (US$945 million)<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Paazee Forex scam \u2013 2008-- 800 crore\n(US$151.2 million)<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Punjab city centre project scam \u2013 2006--\n1,500 crore (US$283.5 million)<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Taj Co-operative Group Housing Scheme\nscam \u2013 2005- 4,000 crore (US$756 million)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-jS5g7VmiY1s/UJqz-awzmvI/AAAAAAAAWz0/HBFDJM8sVrs/s1600/imageshui990090.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-jS5g7VmiY1s/UJqz-awzmvI/AAAAAAAAWz0/HBFDJM8sVrs/s1600/imageshui990090.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">If India can get back the 2.5 trillion USD of black money stashed away abroad, ( this includes the wealth of our ex-Maharajas ) we will be the world's No 1 economy.</span> <span style=\"color: red;\">&nbsp;</span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">It must be noted that Rothschild's money is Tipu Sultan's money (1799 -Nathan Rothschild's banking base ) -- a small&nbsp;Muslim&nbsp;King of India, who stole the gold from Kerala temple underground vaults.</span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mining group Vedanta\nResources has paid USD 5.69 million (about Rs.28 crore) to Indian politicians in\nthe last three years, as per their own published reports.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vedanta, which has\nemerged as a mining and natural resources giant in last one decade, had\nreported revenues of over $14 billion during the last fiscal.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Without disclosing the beneficiaries, Vedanta in its\nannual report for 2011-12 stated that it paid USD 2.01 million to Indian\npoliticians in 2011-12. This donation was, however, lower than USD 3.66 million\nit had paid in 2009-10 when last general elections were held in the country. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is just ONE single foreign company and that too only what they admit. &nbsp;You\ncan guess how much companies like Walmart, &nbsp;Monsanto , Starbucks&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">Dell Inc, Morgan Stanley, Xerox, Cargill Inc,\nAerospace Industries Association of America , Insurance companies, US Chamber of Commerce</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">etc have <b><span style=\"color: red;\">ACTUALLY</span></b> paid up to open\nshop in India.</span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Tata Sons\nElectoral Trust was the first body set up by a business conglomerate in the\ncountry to formalise the process of donating money to the political parties, &nbsp;the way their past opium drug running masters (\nOpium trade from Bombay to China ) does it in USA. This Trust was in news\nimmediately after the elections when Union railway minister Mamata Banerjee\ndeclined a cheque of over Rs.27 lakh from the Trust<span style=\"color: red;\">.</span>\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2003, India enacted\na new law that made private donations to political parties easier. &nbsp;This law allows contributions by private\ncompanies to political parties to a maximum limit of 5% of their profits. &nbsp;</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It also makes it mandatory for contributions\nto be made by cheque and requires that parties audit their annual accounts and\nmaintain a list of donors who give in excess of Rs20,000 and submit this to the\nElection Commission.&nbsp;</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But then does the\nEC have the breakup of what Vedanta paid? &nbsp;Where is the transparency? &nbsp;Why is this NOT made transparent on the EC web\nsite?<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-0HV8JrFZ3Os/UJshu2FwjRI/AAAAAAAAW9k/zqm-MbvX2IM/s1600/imagesghuio.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; line-height: 150%;\">Wal-Mart Stores, has \u201cconceded\u201d\nthat they have spent nearly USD 1.5 million on lobbying in the last quarter\nended June 30, 2012 on various issues, including matters \"related to FDI\nin India.\" . How much they have not conceded? Your guess is as good as\nmine.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Walmart \u201cofficially\u201d\nspent Rs 52-crore in two years for lobbying alone, to get a toe hold in Mexico\n( recent New York Times exposure ) and now they control the Mexican retail\nmarket. &nbsp;If Wal-mart could bribe its way\nin Mexico, what makes our Italian waitress turned empress &nbsp;think (and her pseudo Hindu side kicks Anand\nSharma and Ambika Soni ), &nbsp;she can\nconvince Indians, &nbsp;they came to India on\ninvitation alone?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dow Chemicals had\n\"Trans Pacific Partnership Market Access - India\" as one of its\nlobbying issues in the last quarter, when it spent more than USD 3.6 million on\nvarious lobby issues.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">Financial services\ngiant Prudential Financial Inc has spent nearly USD four million so far in 2012\non various lobbying matters, including those \"relating to India financial\nservices market access and equity ownership issues\".<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now why do politicians in\npower get payoffs from powerful foreign corporations, organizations or\nindividuals? &nbsp;Pray?&nbsp; Is it because they have such large kind hearts?\n&nbsp;Sorry, it is only out of selfishness. &nbsp;It is in return for making choices in the\ninterests of those parties, or in anticipation of favorable policy.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">India has emerged as\none of the fastest-growing economies in the world, and a host of the companies\nfrom across the world, including from the US, are seeking to enter this market\nor further expand their business here. Despite a global economic slowdown, and Rothschild controlled rating agencies giving bullshit percentages for growth , countries like India and China have managed respectable growth rates.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bribery is the first\nstep towards subversion of the system. Slowly but steadily, a parallel system\nis formed. This results in an unfair advantage for the bribe giver. Over time,\nthe system erodes the economic foundation of the country, hurting the most\nvulnerable members of the society and filling the middle class with a sense of\nhopelessness and cynicism. Corruption is seen as endemic and at the heart of\nthe systemic failure in some countries.<b><o:p></o:p></b></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We just saw the\nelection results in USA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In USA since lobbying\nis legal, lobbyists are required to register with the Secretary of the Senate\nand the Clerk of the House. Furthermore, lobbyists must file disclosures of\ntheir lobbying activity according to the Lobbying Disclosure Act of 1995. No\nsuch formalities are required of bribe givers or takers.</span></div>\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bribery is considered\nillegal, while lobbying is not. &nbsp;Bribery\nis considered a sale of power. &nbsp;However,\nlobbying is considered an influence of political power by offering\ncontributions that affect political outcomes. You have to be a stupid person to\nbelieve that both are different. You gift wrap s#it, it is still s#it--it does NOT become chocolate.</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">US Senators also\naggressively seek contributions for their campaigns and often request lobbyists\nto arrange for fundraisers. It is a symbiotic relationship. This is true of the\nbribe taker and bribe giver relationship as well. &nbsp;Lobbying is a multi-billion dollar business in\nAmerica that funds and influences elections campaigns and the actual brain\nbehind laws and regulations written and legislated in the US Congress.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ukwzVHw38sI/UJsiCteOpAI/AAAAAAAAW98/Bs9vO-dnkUE/s1600/imageshuio8787.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"296\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ukwzVHw38sI/UJsiCteOpAI/AAAAAAAAW98/Bs9vO-dnkUE/s320/imageshuio8787.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The business is so\nlucrative in USA, that experts believe more than 120,000 people are involved in what\ngrowing number of Americans view as illegitimate practice of buying political\ninfluence. A top-notch lobbyist, for instance, can make millions in annual\nincome.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are 26,000\ncorporate lobbyists in Washington, DC, whose sole function is to bribe\ncongressmen - give them millions of dollars, to get their way. </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In every case , this activity is detrimental\nto US citizens. All US congressmen are rich. You don't become a congressman\nunless you are rich. USA is a country of the rich, is controlled by the rich,\nfor the rich.</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Although it is illegal\nin the United States for members of Congress to cast legislative vote in\nexchange for election campaign contributions, yet lobbyists conveniently manage\nto skirt the system.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Virtually all\nWashington lobbyists pass out campaign contributions among candidates for\nelective office from both dominant political parties Republican and Democratic,\nand those campaign donations always take place behind closed doors.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the US till recently,\nthere was a limit to the amount of money corporations could spend to influence\npoliticians. But the US Supreme Court in a shocking decision said that money\nwas equal to speech and that freedom of speech meant that there could be no\nlimit to how much money could be used to buy a politician\u2019s support! &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So this is what George Orwell said in 1984\u2014\nall are equal, but some are more equal than others. So now a rich person has\nmore freedom of speech than a poor one. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But why should we\nIndians bitch? Our private medical colleges churn out substandard\ndoctors who have paid 85 lakhs donation to get into the college, right? The\nintelligent students who could not get a seat , drive auto rickshaws to survive.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Whither merit?</span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At this stage my\nforeign readers must know that our Rothschild trained and handpicked Prime Minister Manmohan Singh and his side kick Montek Singh Ahluwalia, has\npegged India's poverty line at a king's ransom of-- hold your breath --&nbsp; Lipsky had pleaded guilty to one count of conspiracy to commit\nbribery and one count of bribery in January 2012.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Adam Smith\neconomics, the bribe has been described as rent . In some capitalist countries,\nsuch bribes are considered tax-deductible payments.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bribery in bureaucracy is the reason for the higher cost of production of goods and services. Many types\nof bribes exist: tip, gift, sop, perk, skim, favor, discount, waived\nfee/ticket, free food, free ad, free trip, free tickets, sweetheart deal,\nkickback, funding, inflated sale of an object or property, lucrative\ncontract, donation, campaign contribution, fundraiser, sponsorship/backing,\nhigher paying job, stock options, secret commission, or promotion (rise of rank).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Political campaign\ncontributions in the form of cash, are criminal acts of\nbribery in some countries, while in the United States, provided they adhere to\nelection law, are legal. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Example-- a motorist &nbsp;bribes a police officer\nnot to issue a ticket for speeding. A citizen seeking paperwork or utility line\nconnections &nbsp;bribes a functionary for faster service.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bribery may also take\nthe form of a secret commission, a profit made by an agent, in the course of\nhis employment, without the knowledge of his principal. &nbsp;Euphemisms abound for\nthis (commission, sweetener, kick-back etc.) .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-spLlYkw79U0/UJsiN98OxNI/AAAAAAAAW-E/EVAQO3bAml8/s1600/imagesfty76.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-spLlYkw79U0/UJsiN98OxNI/AAAAAAAAW-E/EVAQO3bAml8/s1600/imagesfty76.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bribers and recipients of bribery\nare likewise numerous although bribers have one common denominator and that is\nthe financial ability to bribe.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bribery around the world is estimated at more than $1 trillion .<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lobbying is corruption\nand campaign contributions are bribes, plain and simple. It can attract laws like Prevention of Corruption Act. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, lobbying is a legitimate business in capitalist countries like the USA , where the Zionist banking cartel and their minion corporate goons call the shots..
