Which moron will give Switzerland the No 1 spot for the cleanest country , when it comes to corruption? &nbsp; Are we stupid? &nbsp;Where are all the Rothschild banks , who &nbsp;hold black money situated ? The Internet has exposed all these \"list makers\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Media\u2019s biasness\ntowards corporate houses and media persons acting as the lobbyist for corporate\nsectors in the corridor of power and brokers of secret deals among different\ncorporate groups started in the early eighties. Ramnath Goenka of the Indian\nExpress can be safely called as the father of this trend in India.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-s5_91kCmVHo/UJshDe9X7OI/AAAAAAAAW9E/vOjOWIk-FY8/s1600/imagesCALDLNZP.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-s5_91kCmVHo/UJshDe9X7OI/AAAAAAAAW9E/vOjOWIk-FY8/s320/imagesCALDLNZP.jpg\" width=\"239\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The way Goenka handled the Nusli Wadia-Dhirubhai Ambai tussle and started a vicious anti-Ambani Campaign was\nthe first eye-catching example, &nbsp;of media\u2019s vested role in corporate politics and lobby. We do NOT want media to be king makers , especially foreign funded media. These people must be fined and put in jail-- because it is an EXTREME form of corruption.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even a leader like our PM MAUN Mohan Singh turning a Nelson's eye (to rampant corruption goin' on around him ) is a form of corruption.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A person who gives a bribe is corrupt too. Why do we let all these rich multinationals go scot free? Why do we punch only the bribe receivers. Probably they had no choice but to take the peanuts, because his boss has already taken the lion's share. If he refuses his peanuts, his boss will suspect him to be a potential whistle blower and shove him off. &nbsp;The powerful man who rapes must be punished, not the weak victim who just lay down and let it be , due to compulsions.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What are all these TV sham awards for--if it is NOT for king making ? More often than not they take instructions from their foreign owners , which CM to patronize. So Mamata Bannerjee did , you can catch and swing, OK? &nbsp;No awards for you.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-kZejVmhuEEg/UJsh3ajYxqI/AAAAAAAAW90/gg_7ZlxDsL4/s1600/imagesjii9i988.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"213\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-kZejVmhuEEg/UJsh3ajYxqI/AAAAAAAAW90/gg_7ZlxDsL4/s320/imagesjii9i988.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The recent tape of conversation between corporate lobbyist Nira Radia and two famous\njournalists of India (Barkha Dutt and Vir Sanghvi) are the continued 21st\ncentury version of the trend started by Ramnath Goenka in 1980s.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All this Jan Lokpal and \"eliminate corruption \" efforts will come a cropper unless we cultivate whistle blowers and\ngive them a reward. &nbsp;A whistleblower is a person who works for the government\nand reports misconduct within the government . It can be an employee of a\nprivate company reporting corrupt practices within the company.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">India right now, does not yet have legislation\nfor whistle blowers who face grave personal danger while reporting acts of\ncorruption.&nbsp; By exposing corruption among\ntheir superiors,&nbsp; they face the\npossibility of direct or indirect vindictive action.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-WW8rxwLCjwo/UJsMgNEPUtI/AAAAAAAAW2Q/6BWbTPj7sj4/s1600/downloadhuioppp.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-WW8rxwLCjwo/UJsMgNEPUtI/AAAAAAAAW2Q/6BWbTPj7sj4/s1600/downloadhuioppp.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">In\nsuch cases the Govt must transfer these whistle blowers, so that their safety and career graph\ncan be sustained. They must be rewarded.&nbsp;</span></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>No Lokpal or IAC can do more than a &nbsp;honest and patriotic whistleblower.</b></span></span><br />\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our Govt officials steal\nstate property. In cities and villages, government officials, elected politicians, judicial\nofficers, real estate developers and law enforcement officials, acquire,\ndevelop and sell land in illegal ways. They vitually mint money-as the profit margins are too high.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-lwUbD9844a0/UJq0PRd_CJI/AAAAAAAAWz8/QdYbbJs2uAg/s1600/imagesgyui.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"197\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-lwUbD9844a0/UJq0PRd_CJI/AAAAAAAAWz8/QdYbbJs2uAg/s200/imagesgyui.jpg\" width=\"200\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We all know about the recent Robert Wadhera --nay-- Vadra , &nbsp;DLF nexus case.&nbsp; Corrupt ministers with the connivance\nof IAS babus just make plans for laying by pass roads \u2013 along 5 or 6 routes,\nwhen actually there will be none. &nbsp;They will go in a gang and punch in pegs into the soil, which passes through or adjacent &nbsp;hundreds of homes. &nbsp;Alarmed citizens try and sell off the land at\nthrow away prices and move away. This land will be bought by the mafiia. &nbsp; After all who wants a highway few metres from your bed room?</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nroute where the actual highway will come is kept a secret, till corrupt politicians and\ntheir moneybag cronies buy off all lands adjacent to this planned highway,\nwhose value will skyrocket , 10 times in a couple of months. &nbsp;Farm lands are\nconverted into commercial lands just by altering records.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Projects such as road\nbuilding, are dominated by construction mafias, which are groupings of corrupt\npublic works officials, materials suppliers, politicians and construction\ncontractors. The public distribution programs and social spending contracts\nhave proven to be a waste due to corruption. 90% of the budget to make a raod gets stolen, this is why Indian road have potholes. So that there can be yearly repairs.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Remember, we took 20 years to catch Veerappan. &nbsp;We had four numbers , \"5 year plan\" budget allocations to catch this forest bandit. &nbsp;He was more of a blessing as the sandal wood trees grew for 20 years , and the wild life like tigers too had a conservation period, where they could multiply. Thousands of crores which went into the \"catch ZE Veerappan\" &nbsp;budget -- where did it go?&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The clerks who fudge\nthe paperwork, know all this. &nbsp;&nbsp;But whom are they gonna complain to? &nbsp;How did a bankrupt shoe shop owner, Gopal Goel Kanda\nmake his millions and become the Home Minister too in Sonia Gandhi\u2019s &nbsp;UPA govt of Haryana? &nbsp;Are there no checks and stoppers ?&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This goon Kanda started an airline which had more young , inexperienced , pretty and personally handpicked women employees, &nbsp;than men. He was sexually abusing his girl employees , and when one of them committed suicide , the lid got blown off.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-rA9431oFrr8/UJsf5dpIAxI/AAAAAAAAW8U/S3y6ffLmIFM/s1600/huii.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-rA9431oFrr8/UJsf5dpIAxI/AAAAAAAAW8U/S3y6ffLmIFM/s1600/huii.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In November 2003, one\nMr. Satyendra Dubey, was murdered after he exposed corrupt practices prevalent\nin the National Highways Authority of India (NHAI). The incident led to\nwidespread public/ media outrage and impetus for the enactment of a whistle\nblowers bill.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Satyendra Dubey was one\nof those rare young men who was honest and brave.&nbsp; There will be more like him if we have a\nsystem in place , to protect them. This intelligent engineer from Indian\nInstitute of Technology, Kanpur and working for National Highway Authority of\nIndia, was killed for simply doing the right thing.&nbsp; He was gunned down by the mafia in Gaya on\nearly morning of November 27th, nearly a year after he had complained of\nrampant corruption on the Golden Quadrilateral project to the Prime Minister's\noffice. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Knowing the dangers\nthat surround honest people bucking the whole corrupt system, in his letter,\nDubey had fervently requested that his name be kept secret . This request was\nNOT honored , and the letter was sent from the PMO to the Ministry of Road,\nTransport and Highways and then to the National Highway Authority of India,\nwith which Dubey was working as Deputy General Manager. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dubey's murder speaks\nvolumes about the growing nexus between politicians and mafia and also\nhighlights the illegal procedures/involved in awarding contracts and also\nfraudulent pre-qualification bids in connection to big development\nprojects.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">Mere hollow verbal assurance\nfrom the MAUN Mohan Prime Minister that the guilty wouldn't be spared, &nbsp;is not enough either\nto the citizens or to Dubey's grieving family. &nbsp;If the government really means business and has a political will , it has to demonstrate that there are systems in place, &nbsp;for good honest people to rely on.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A management graduate\nfrom Indian Institute of Management, Lucknow, Manjunath Shanmugham, who was\nworking as a sales officer with the Indian Oil Corporation, was shot dead on\nNovember 19, 2005, when he tried to expose an adulteration racket at an IOC\npetrol pump in Lakhimpur Kheri.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-seOonHopo_k/UJsMm3mu1pI/AAAAAAAAW2Y/QkVxBuskqW8/s1600/tyyuuii.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-seOonHopo_k/UJsMm3mu1pI/AAAAAAAAW2Y/QkVxBuskqW8/s1600/tyyuuii.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While a trial court awarded death sentence to\nthe main accused and life sentence to seven others, last year the Allahabad\nHigh Court Bench in Lucknow commuted the death penalty to life sentence and\nacquitted two of the other seven convicts.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Taxes and bribes are\ncommon between Indian state borders.&nbsp;\nTransparency International estimates that truckers pay annually&nbsp; 27000 crores (US$ 5 billion) in bribes.&nbsp; Government regulators and police share in\nthis extorted bribe money.&nbsp; The en-route\nstoppages including those at checkpoints and entry-points take up to more than\n12 hours in a day.&nbsp; I myself have seen (\n4 decades ago ), the Karnataka state border police snatching gold chains from\nthe necks of Gulf returnee passengers in the Mumbai Kerala bus.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ehwUcE8kyLw/UJsgxEPkyYI/AAAAAAAAW80/25FbQa7u_lo/s1600/imagesCA1LVRT4.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ehwUcE8kyLw/UJsgxEPkyYI/AAAAAAAAW80/25FbQa7u_lo/s1600/imagesCA1LVRT4.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">About 60 percent of these forced stoppages on\nroad by concerned authorities such as government regulators, police, forest,\nsales and excise, octroi, weighing and measuring department are all for extorting\nmoney. We must hace CCTVs installed . The loss in productivity due to these stoppages is an important national\nconcern. The number of truck trips could increase by 55%, if such forced delays\nare avoided.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;In 2006, however, the erstwhile draft Public\nInterest Disclosure Bill was updated and the same was renamed as \u201cThe Whistle\nblowers Bill, 2006. The said Bill was introduced in the Rajya Sabha&nbsp; on March 3, 2006. Over the last few years,\nthe Bill has undergone several changes based on comments and suggestions\nreceived. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The latest version of\nthe Bill, styled as \u201cThe Public Interest Disclosure and Protection to Persons\nMaking the Disclosures Bill, 2010\u201d , was introduced in the Lok Sabha on August\n26, 2010. The revised Bill has several new provisions which were added with a\nview to make a robust legislation on the subject. The Bill is yet to be\nnotified as a statute.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In India we need a fast\nand efficient judiciary to handover judgments in fair and impartial manner&nbsp; without political and social pressure. We\nneed a clean and unbiased police that will come to the aid of those working on\nthe right side of the law. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This type of a thing ,\nwhere as soon as a new home minister ( like Gopal Goyal Kanda ) takes over, he\ngets all honest police officers transferred , and installs his own minions and\nsidekicks, running at his beck and call, must be ended.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-XOQrcYQa7Zs/UJsfw8NOOQI/AAAAAAAAW8M/JPLy1F0CC08/s1600/imagesCASCA7VI.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-XOQrcYQa7Zs/UJsfw8NOOQI/AAAAAAAAW8M/JPLy1F0CC08/s1600/imagesCASCA7VI.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We need to give our public some knowledge about the constitution, their rights therein, and rule of law. &nbsp;Police can walk in and arrest a man at 2 AM , without a warrant, just because a certain Karti Chidambaram is not happy with him. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We need laws that will\nencourage people in both urban and rural areas to come forward without any fear\nof retribution, to usher in an era of transparency, accountability and\nparticipation in the day to day governance of the country. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; such a nation, then it is high time\nthe government rolled up its sleeves and made concrete efforts to pass the\nwhistle blowers act ASAP<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; You cannot land any goods from the\nlorry to the ground, even in your private plot, unless an exorbitant extortion\nmoney is paid\u2014for an easy job.&nbsp; If the\nlorry contains cement these goons will melt away, as they want easy moolah,\nwhere breaking into a sweat in NOT required.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These are the same\ngoons who throw stones on your car if you drive on a bandh day in an\nemergency.. Police will NOT interfere . line-height: 150%;\">..</span></div>\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt. Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "76", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/354168589720966580/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "6686938403621571165", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2012-11-05T05:50:00+05:30", "updated": "2013-03-09T14:50:19+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxMzYyODIwODE5Mjg2Cm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/11/cracking-liar-exposing-lie-capt-ajit.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/6686938403621571165", "title": "CRACKING THE LIAR, EXPOSING THE LIE- CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">DETECTING A LIE</span>, &nbsp; <span style=\"color: red;\">HOW TO CATCH A LIAR</span>, &nbsp;<span style=\"color: magenta;\">HUMAN BEHAVIOR</span>, &nbsp;EXPLORING THE HUMAN MIND</b></span>- &nbsp;CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-0oKjd-97Rcs/UJcyyhZrE_I/AAAAAAAAWu8/dgNEGpzeZms/s1600/kjihuhgu.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"220\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-0oKjd-97Rcs/UJcyyhZrE_I/AAAAAAAAWu8/dgNEGpzeZms/s400/kjihuhgu.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I have been watching\nBigg Boss season 6, since it started, a month ago. The Foreign equivalent is\nBig Brother- where a group of people stay for 3 months in a confined home, with\nabout 70 cameras , equipped with night vision, monitoring every inch and second\nof their progress.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is NOT about peeping\ninto private lives, it is about peeping into the human psyche and mind.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For the past 3 decades,\nas a ship Captain , I have been putting my own mind into test. Every time and\nnew Officer or a crew member joins, I make him sit down , when he first reports\nto me in my cabin, with his documents.&nbsp; I\nask him a few open ended questions --like \"How was your flight?\" etc.\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then I say welcome on\nboard and shake hands with him again. I miss out NOTHING! <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After he leaved my\ncabin, I write down what I think about him--an initial gut feeling\nassessment&nbsp; Then a time comes when he\nsigns off , or I sign off.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At this time I have to\nmake his service report or appraisal report, which is based on a multitude of\nfactors. And then I compare my initial assessment with my final assessment. I\nhave never been wrong.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The perceptive human\nmind can beat any Lie detection machine or any Narco analysis, to exhume the\ntruth. I will talk about these two methods in greater detail later.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Back to Big Boss --<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As soon as I saw Sampat\nPal Devi, the leader of the Gulabi gang , I was interested. here was a woman\nwho was heading a 20,000 strong gang of woman vigilantes, with heavy sticks to\nthrash the men folk. Was she for real?&nbsp;\nHas she breached trust and taken all for a royal ride?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By the way every act of\ninfidelity ( unless it is rape ) is 50:50, unless you are fu#kin' stupid. Both\nmen and women are equal partners.&nbsp; The\nman cannot penetrate unless the woman opens out her legs. If she does NOT open\nout, it goes into a different IPC section and becomes rape, which is severely punishable\nby law. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Why is it that man is\nalways the culprit, when there is an act of sex which is NOT rape --say an\nextra marital affair ?&nbsp; You ask handsome\nmen, and they will tell you what sort of dirty mental games a woman is capable\nof. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What is more painful, a\nslap on a woman's face or DRIP DRIP&nbsp;\nmental bleeding inflicted on man by a woman? The slap was more painful ?\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then this liberator\nwoman must answer this question too.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IS THERE ANY ANIMAL OR\nBIRD OR MAMMAL ( INSECTS PLEASE EXCUSE ) WHERE THE FEMALE GENDER IS MORE\nBEAUTIFUL, STRONGER OR INTELLIGENT THAN THE MALE GENDER? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The cook , the tailor?\n-- BLAH BLAH.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Oh Yeah?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If so, why is it that a\nmaster tailor or a master chef&nbsp; is always\na man? Pray? Prithee?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now back to our Madame\nSampat -who is as attractive as last night's dinner left overs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Gulabi gang (from\nHindi gulabi, \"pink\") wears pink .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></i></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: red;\"><b>She has been invited to\ninternational forums and has travelled to the US, France, Sweden and\nItaly. &nbsp;</b></span></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: red;\"><b><br /></b></span></i></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: red;\"><b>Why not? &nbsp;</b></span></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: red;\"><b><br /></b></span></i></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">One day with an SMS the foreign forces can start off a riot and bring down a popularly elected Indian Government . &nbsp;It is always better to invest in such mindless vigilante forces, right?-- and make India -- a Tunisia or an Egypt or a Libya or a Syria or an Iran?</b></span></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gulabis visit abusive husbands\nand beat them up with heavy sticks.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2008, they stormed an electricity office\nin Banda district and beat up government officials , to turn back the power\nthey had cut , as payments were overdue\u2014as per the law. And all go GA GA. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After two days, I told\nmy wife. This woman is a fake. She is a liar of the first order.&nbsp; This Bigg Boss session will be her undoing\n--as the whole country is watching. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She keeps singing her\nown praises, and creates several occasions throughout the day for this.&nbsp; How she caught a passport official by his\ncollar BLAH BLAH. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After sometime this\ntype of boast from a weasel faced woman, can get on your nerves unless you are\na REAL hero or Champion like Mohammed Ali or Usain Bolt, in which case it can\nbe a source of great joy to lesser mortals.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And sure enough -- 2\ndays ago, she proved to be a shameless liar of the first order. She was called\ninto the confession room, and she apologized profusely for her trespasses&nbsp; Then she comes out and tells everybody that\nBigg Boss apologized to her.&nbsp; She was\nexposed by the telephone caller at the end of the week meeting, and she was arm twisted into admitted to the house mates that she\ntold a BIG LIE-- about the apology.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Beware of false gods\nlike this. They will take you to the cleaners. This is why I am writing this\npost. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-mhy8QUOxrvo/UJc0_z63eWI/AAAAAAAAWwM/7IxBq1jdGc8/s1600/imagesfggg.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-mhy8QUOxrvo/UJc0_z63eWI/AAAAAAAAWwM/7IxBq1jdGc8/s1600/imagesfggg.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\"><i>Digression: There is a woman inside by the name of Sapna-- it is NOT right to put her into Bigg Boss 6 house without putting her through a psychological test. &nbsp;<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">WARNING</b>-- I am serious about this.</i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And to this weird woman Sapna I will tell this: &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>SHOVE YOUR KRANTI !!&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>WE DON'T NEED IT IN INDIA-- WE LIKE OUR INDIAN WOMEN AS THEY ARE.</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">Do we need to see this freak Sapna on national TV? Is she the role model for our young Indian girls?</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-t9RdFXQM1EY/UJc0StAyVBI/AAAAAAAAWwE/Y4ffw7eh-jg/s1600/downloadnnnm.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"212\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-t9RdFXQM1EY/UJc0StAyVBI/AAAAAAAAWwE/Y4ffw7eh-jg/s320/downloadnnnm.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">How do you catch a\nliar?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Well , every creature\non this planet has a behavior pattern. When this pattern matching goes haywire,\nthen you must suspect.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let me give a simple\nexample&nbsp; A cat's DNA is programmed to dig\na hole in the soil before a crap. Then after the solemn and private deed, with\nno prying eyes, the cat will cover the crap filled hole, with great\ncare--taking her own time in order to be very efficient .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even if a cat stays in a building, she will surely do\nthis. If she does NOT do this , something is amiss. And then your antenna must\nbe tuned--why not?</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Check out the video\nbelow-- how the cat goes through them motions.</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://3.gvt0.com/vi/GndyKlxATQ8/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/GndyKlxATQ8&fs=1&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/GndyKlxATQ8&fs=1&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>To solve a situation , you have to know the inherent behavior of the subjects involved.</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now let me talk about\nze rat.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I will narrate a true\nincident which happened 32 years ago, when I was a Chief Officer&nbsp; on a hectic tanker. The engineers had their\nown duty mess where they used to eat in their greasy boiler suits at odd hours.\nWell \u2013 Mickey mouse made a house there. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Actually it was a huge\nvicious looking and fearless bandicoot who would charge at you if you tried to\ncorner him.&nbsp; The Captain had a mini-\ncrisis as the engineers refused to eat there till they saw the dead body of Mickey.&nbsp; I really wonder if women fear rats more than\nHE men.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now Mickey was too\nlarge to enter a rat trap and sort of immune to the rat poison, we had on board\n.&nbsp; So we held a meeting after a Abandon\nship drill , and Captain , who was a big fan of my perception, put me in charge\nof a brainstorming session. We had the entire crew list of nearly 55 crew\nassembled on the bridge .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All and sundry gave\ntheir suggestions, and I rejected them all.&nbsp;\nThe second engineers steward ( who was plain loco ) also gave his two\npennies worth which made every body burst into derisive laughter. Actually this\nman was a big liability\u2014but since he had a past track record of good service\nand a huge family for whom he was the sole bread winner, he was tolerated . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now what was his\nsuggestion?&nbsp; He said--- take two buckets\none red , one blue ( which made me wonder if the bandicoot had color vision )\nhalf fill the red one with soap water\u2014 in the blue one put a piece of salted\ndried fish. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">That was all\u2014he looked\nconfused and all were in splits , some even fell on the the floor among tears\nof pure unadulterated pleasure.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Before I terminated the\nbrainstorming session I sort of made a judgement remark ( now \u2013you MUST NOT\ndeliver judgement or evaluate during or after a brainstorming session \u2013as a\nmatter of law ) . \u201c I am sure to find a drowned rat in the red bucket tomorrow\nmorning \u201c .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The sailors whose ideas\nI rejected were a bit pissed off.&nbsp;\nThey&nbsp; asked me , how can you be so\nsure.&nbsp; I relied \u201c I know rat behavior. To\nfind a rat , if you don\u2019t know his home, you have to find where the guy shat\nduring the past week \u201c .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">That night I set up the\nbuckets myself and locked and sealed the duty mess door.&nbsp; Full night I could not sleep out of\ncuriosity.&nbsp; Finally after tossing and\nturning till 5 am I went to the duty mess with the Chief engineer and the\nmaster key\u2013and sure enough the huge drowned bandicoot was floating in the red\nbucket.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chief Engineer kept\nrepeating \" This is unbelievable\" . I guess the scenario unfolded as\nfollows.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mickey smells the dried\nfish ( it is the best rat bait, ahead of cheese ) comes out to investigate \u2013\nthe smell is powerful enough to home into the blue bucket . Mickey jumps right\nin, eats ze fish, and gets his olfactory senses briefly overpowered.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Suddenly he remembers\none more bucket holding a possible juicy treat. He dives right into the red\nbucket half filled with soap water and gets drowned.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sherlock fu#kin\u2019\nHolmes\u2014shut up!&nbsp; Don\u2019t ever think , you\nknow it all.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-KHueOzObpaw/UJczn9JKRkI/AAAAAAAAWvk/M6A7KbgcG9c/s1600/k;o;h.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-KHueOzObpaw/UJczn9JKRkI/AAAAAAAAWvk/M6A7KbgcG9c/s320/k;o;h.jpg\" width=\"247\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>Criminal investigation\nis all about picking up a lead- and then following it with determination to the logical end. &nbsp;It\nalways succeeds.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let me tell you about a\ntrue incident which happened on my ship at Kingston anchorage, Jamaica. We were\nto go to dry dock and the paint store was full of ship side paint-- a fortune,\nas the orange ( 99.99% Sulphuric acid resistant ) paint is very expensive.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At 0630, My Jamaican\nThird Mate knocks on my door and tells me that the paint store is empty, and\nthe lock is broken. This now meant our dry docking would be delayed and all\ncommercial plans would go PHUT!.&nbsp; And\nCapt Vadakayil would smell of s#it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So I called up the\nagents and told them to come on my ship immediately, with the local police.\nMeanwhile I found that one of the drums was leaking slightly as there were\ndrips on Orange paint till the area on the main deck where they lowered it into\na boat .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As soon as the agent\nand the police came, I told them to take me to all the small boat berths in\nthat area, starting off with the furthest and the least busiest, at that\nhour.&nbsp; As we approached the first berth\nitself, I could see by binoculars a huge black guy sitting at the water edge\nand despondently trying to scrape off orange marks from his body. It will NOT\ncome off unless you apply a specific thinner stripper.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anyway we bush whacked\nhim, and got him to confess , where the paints have been taken by a lorry. The\npaints were back on board within two hours.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-P4Pt_5GCHG0/UJc3VAf-PxI/AAAAAAAAWwU/rTqWqRQa2Qk/s1600/imageskkkiii.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-P4Pt_5GCHG0/UJc3VAf-PxI/AAAAAAAAWwU/rTqWqRQa2Qk/s1600/imageskkkiii.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Later the Third mate\ntells me \" As soon as you left , the Jamaican crew were commenting,&nbsp; that our Indian Captain has the brains to get all the paint back. And they were laying out wagers . Because all were terribly afraid of a brutal Jamaican police inquiry , which could mean losing their jobs , as an 'inside job' \" .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To be frank, I felt\ngood.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-X8LDDJidJMw/UJczwRKLgPI/AAAAAAAAWvs/Hvei9Unlfso/s1600/images+(5).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-X8LDDJidJMw/UJczwRKLgPI/AAAAAAAAWvs/Hvei9Unlfso/s1600/images+(5).jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b style=\"color: blue; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: x-large; line-height: 150%;\">The human mind has\ninherent weaknesses. It can be raped at will by people who know how to do it.</b></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A quarter century ago,\nI had walked into a captains cabin to take over command of the ship.&nbsp; The outgoing master was in animated\nconference with the bosun and the ships laundryman.&nbsp; From the laundryman\u2019s \u201c I don\u2019t give a damn \u201c\n, body language I could see that he that he was on the warpath.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Both sailors were sent\naway and we settled down to the formal process of handing / taking over\ncommand. I could see that the outgoing captain could not harness his mind to\nthe job\u2014his mind was chattering . So I asked him, what transpired with the\nlaundryman.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To cut a long story\nshort, the laundryman had refused to do a particular job. He was right, and he\nhad a point. For he was employed to wash stewards uniforms ( white tunics and\npants ) \u2013 not civilian clothes. At the same time the stewards had a point, as\nthey had won civilian clothes on duty due to water rationing at a long\nanchorage.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I told the captain \u201c\nyou just call him back and I will make him agree to what he refused to do ,\njust a few minutes ago\u2014 even if he was sacked or his knee caps were broken\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I then took a A4 size\npaper and wrote down 10 questions , whose answers required the answer YES.&nbsp; The last and 10th question would be \u201c are you\nwilling to wash the clothes , you refused to wash\u201d .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The captain was clean\nbowled.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Here was a guy telling\nthat he could do the impossible. He wanted to see the questionnaire , and I\ngave it to him. All I wanted him to do was sit in the bedroom behind the\ncurtains and hear the proceedings\u2014to check if I followed the script.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So pretty soon the\nbosun and laundryman were called back.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I shot off the first\nquestion, after introducing myself as the new captain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1)Are you the\nlaundryman ?\u2014YEEEAH!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2)Is you name Mr so and\nso? \u2013 YES<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3)You have come to the\nship to earn money for your family?\u2014YES<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4)You have refused to\nwash the stewards civilian clothes?\u2014YES ( he started to give an explanation \u2013I\nstopped him by raising my hand )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">5)These civilian\nclothes were worn during water rationing \u2013YES<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">6th to 9th is\nclassified-</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;XXXX</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\">10th question:) SO WILL\nYOU WASH THE CLOTHES NOW , SO THAT I DON\u2019T HAVE TO SEND YOU HOME \u2013&nbsp; </span><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>\u201cYES SIR!\u201d </b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The average human mind\nis not programmed or intelligent enough&nbsp;\nto open its doors wide and then suddenly slam shut.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you can indeed slam\nit shut and give NO answer after 9 consecutive YES answers \u2013then you are a\nsuper genius\u2014like the legendary James Bond.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By the way if you put 3\nof the best geniuses in the world along with 007 in the 4 corners of a room,\ntell them that there will be an explosion within 30 seconds\u2014and they MUST find\na way out of the room\u2014we all know who will escape in a jiffy.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-kkDSVxb4jDE/UJcz9PYGsoI/AAAAAAAAWv8/aWW2d3VF4z8/s1600/downloadilo9op.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-kkDSVxb4jDE/UJcz9PYGsoI/AAAAAAAAWv8/aWW2d3VF4z8/s1600/downloadilo9op.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>A liar can always be squeezed out of his comfort zone, where he starts giving the usual signs exhibited by a liar.</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let me give an example,\nwhich happened 3 decades ago-- on a container Cadet ship with 18 young cadets.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I was sleeping , we had\nsailed out of port. My wife woke me up and said a grim faced Chief Officer is\nstanding at the door with the CC ( Cadet Captain ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thinking that this will\nbe an emergency, I quickly wore my robe and called them into my day room.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It so transpired that\nthe Cadet Captains music set was missing from his cabin. He had spent 3 months\nof wages to but that nice Sony set, and was distraught.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So I told Chief Officer\nto muster all the Cadets on the bridge at 0900 hrs, after breakfast . He was to\nbreak this news&nbsp; just before breakfast.\nAnd then he had to keep vigilance using the First Officer as to which all\ncadets were having closed door meetings.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So pretty soon, Chief\nOfficer rang me up and said all the Cadets are now on the bridge. I called him\ndown and told him to make them stand in alphabetical order from left to right\nin a single line, in full uniform with peak cap . And he would have to watch\ntheir hands from behind. The hands in front I would watch.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prettyy soon I went up on the\nbridge , in my dark Ray Ban shades , announced that this session is to catch\nthe cadet who has thrown the music set of the Cadet leader overboard.&nbsp; First I got all of them to say individually\nthat they had nothing to do with it. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And then for the next 3\nminutes I just stood in front of them, with my head not moving at all-- but my\neyes scanning for the usual tell tale signs. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Suddenly I said \"\nCadet XXX fall out.&nbsp; Pack your bags. &nbsp;Your wages stop\nnow.&nbsp; You shall remain confined within your\ncabin, till the next port. &nbsp;Your food will be served in your cabin.&nbsp; All dismissed!\".&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then I went down to my cabin.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chief Officer followed me to\nmy cabin and said \" That cadet whom you chose, does NOT get along with the\nCadet Captain, and the OOW on the bridge was witness to a dispute between them\nwhile lashing containers prior departure port . His hands were behind his back tightly clenched while he stood in line \"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then he walked out and\ncame back inside immediately. \" The cadet is waiting outside in\ntears\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He came in and confessed\nand requested me fervently NOT to ruin his sea career.&nbsp; And he promised to buy a new set to replace\nthe one he threw overboard.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So that matter died\nthere, and I told Chief officer to let this confession , remain a secret.&nbsp; Repentance is a good thing. You dont destroy\na young budding career,&nbsp; based on ONE\nsingle bad incident.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now let me get to the\nnitty gritty of body language and fake behavior.</span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A guilty person gets\ndefensive. An innocent person will often go on the offensive.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is why I\ntold my wife about the Aarushi Talwar case, as soon as the incident happened. &nbsp;A\nwoman whose 14 year old daughter has been raped and murdered in cold blood is bound to be hysterical.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You\nnormally expect a parent whose child is missing ( not killed ) to be\nhysterical, begging for the police to get out there and find their baby. &nbsp;If a parent seems detached and aloof,\nsomething is fishy , right?&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google search</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b> THE RAPE OF THE\nSUBCONSCIOUS MIND- VADAKAYIL.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-lEOH2x17icE/UJcy_v2wcLI/AAAAAAAAWvM/C0lDl0hA4Cs/s1600/dddw3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em;
