font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So what are the usual\ntell tale signs of a liar?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When words and body\nlanguage are in conflict, ignore 'em words. And secret-- when women lie they\nalways appear to be damn busy. <b><o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The liar always takes\nup less body space. He will avoid making eye contact. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If it is a cold day\nwith less humidity he will touch his nose to dissipate the static build up\ncaused by the blood rushing within the mobius coil inside his rib cage. &nbsp;Bill Clinton touched his nose 88 times , during his Monika Lewisnky hearing.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-7mHyxKwTSYU/UJduVTWZ-oI/AAAAAAAAWx8/qel5U88TRzE/s1600/jioo.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-7mHyxKwTSYU/UJduVTWZ-oI/AAAAAAAAWx8/qel5U88TRzE/s320/jioo.jpg\" width=\"276\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Any display of emotion\nis delayed, stays longer it would naturally, then suddenly ceases.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The timing between face\ngestures and words gets out of sync. &nbsp;Expressions\nare strictly limited to mouth movements when someone is faking emotions.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A liar is always uncomfortable facing his accuser. &nbsp;A liar will use your words to make a answer to your question. &nbsp;When asked, \u201cDid you throw\nthe music set overboard ?\u201d The liar answers, \u201cNo, I did not throw the music set\noverboard\u201d.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The guilty person may speak more than natural, adding unnecessary filling details to convince you... for they are not comfortable with silence or pauses in\nthe conversation.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The guilty wants the subject changed; an innocent person may\nbe confused by the sudden change in topics and will want to back to the\nprevious subject. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you asked someone to \"What was the ship side color of\nyour previous ship\"\u2014he would look up to his right ( for a RH man ) to\nrecollect a true image . If he was to lie and fake it he would look up to his\nleft, for visually constructing an image.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A liar uses humor or\nsarcasm to avoid a subject .&nbsp; A change in\nthe pitch of a person's tone, or a lot of stammering, or throat clearing could\nindicate a lie. &nbsp;He may&nbsp; becoming pale and blink more.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A liar contradicts himself,\nwhen you ask him the same question after a while. He will use emotional blackmail and make you believe that he is a trampled upon underdog, in a soap opera. &nbsp;Your tendency then would be to take his side.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">A liar would manipulate\nand say everything to make you dance to his tune.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He will creates smokescreens,\nor even coercion &nbsp;by raising his voice.&nbsp; A liar tends to breathe faster, displaying a\nseries of short breaths followed by one deep breath. The mouth may appear dry,\ncausing hajaar throat clearing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People tend to sweat more\nwhen they lie. A honest answer comes quickly from memory. Lies require a quick\nmental review of what they have told others to avoid inconsistency and to make\nup new details as needed.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ask the person to tell the story backwards. This is\nvery hard to do, especially when requiring no loss of the details. Even a\nprofessional spy can find this reversal of approach a hard one to tackle\neffectively.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You may hear the phrase\n\u2018to be honest\u2019 more often than not. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When someone is\ncomfortable with you while answering your questions, he will move to comfortable\npositions, eg. tilting their head to one side or the other. &nbsp;When suddenly asked a question that they are\nforced to lie about, he will straighten or stiffen up, no longer tilting their\nhead..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You can always pick\nthem out when they do something they don\u2019t normally do.&nbsp; Women covering the neck dimple , this is\nabout centering themselves.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When people lie, they\ntend to keep their body very still. There will be lack of emphasis. When we\nspeak, we naturally give emphasis both verbally and non-verbally to what we\nsay. Hand gestures, inflections, and head movements accentuate our words. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When our unconscious brain ( right hand brain\nlobe ) doesn\u2019t back up what we\u2019re saying, those emphasizing gestures will not\nbe present. &nbsp;An innocent person accused\nof murder will probably pound their fist and yell, \u201cI didn\u2019t do it!\u201d You\nprobably won\u2019t see that with a person who actually committed the crime .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Liars tend to place\ntheir hands very firmly on the chair rest as if they are holding on to these\nobjects to save their lives. &nbsp;This is\nessentially a way of de-stressing the body that is reacting to the growing\nanxiety within them.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lying need not be\noutright. It can assume various shady avatars. They can omit</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;relevant information, which poses less risk, as it does not &nbsp;involve inventing any cock and bull stories. It is passive deception and less guilt is involved. Or they can be in de</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">nial by just refusing to\nacknowledge a truth. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Or they could m</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">inimize, by reducing\nthe effects of a mistake, a fault, or a judgment call. Or it could be e</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">xaggeration, falsely representing\nas greater, better, more experienced, more successful. &nbsp;Or it could be l</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">ying by exclusion, by which he tells the truth but deliberately leaves out certain critical details--like Bill Clinton of Monika Lewsinsky fame,&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Or it could be a\nmisleading lie , where in he does not tell an out-and-out lie, but still has\nthe deceptive purpose of making someone believe in a falsehood. A good example\nof such a lie would be a car driver </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">who\naccidentally scratches your car, but he says </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"the neighbour's kids were playing by the\ncar.\" </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The neighbour's kids, in\ntruth, were playing by the car but they were not the cause of the scratches on\nthe car.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For example, if a\nteenager goes to his first class and then skips the rest of his school day.\nWhen asked by his parent \"Did you skip school today?\" The teenager\ncan plainly say \"I was at school today,\" without actually lying,\nsince he was at school, while omitting the fact that he was not at school for\nthe entire day.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">There will be a lack of\nassertiveness. His tone of voice will be lower and he will appear to be less\nconfident. He will speak as he has to make up events as he talks. This usually\nresults in slower talking speed or in stopping many times while talking in\norder to find what to say.</span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Picking Imaginary lint,\ncrossing arms across chest, putting hands in pocket are all signs of lying or\nit could be disagreement .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some liars sometimes\navoid \"lying\" by not making direct statements. They imply answers\ninstead of denying something directly.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Finally you have to use\nyour perception and listen to your gut and intuition. &nbsp;If you are not sure, don't jump to\nconclusions.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Intuitive decisions are NOT guesswork . Intuition is a sudden and\ninexplicable knowing. The divining power of intuition comes from our inner\nself. It arises from very rapid processing of bits of information that are\nstored in our subconscious.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Intuition thinks in terms of metaphor, feelings,\npictures, and the spatial whole and doesn't fit neatly into the\ncause-and-effect model. Intuition is a ability to cut through the thickness of\nsurface reality . Your sub-conscious which operates a dozen times faster than\nyour conscious mind has picked up on signals that your conscious mind has not\nyet processed.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We function through partial information, and intuition gives us\nan overview, a whole sense of things Intuition is fast, based on pattern\nmatching. Intuition gone wild becomes \u201cjumping to conclusions\u201d&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So what exactly\nis intuition? It is the messages from your unconscious mind making contact with\nyour consciousness. .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ua9hseysX4E/UJcz2cc3zVI/AAAAAAAAWv0/rrkScPTBHDM/s1600/imagesihugyte.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ua9hseysX4E/UJcz2cc3zVI/AAAAAAAAWv0/rrkScPTBHDM/s1600/imagesihugyte.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Gut feeling is the uncanny ability to detect patterns in the world\naround us, and to extrapolate larger truths .</span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-magsre9XuvU/UJczLj52s-I/AAAAAAAAWvU/_K3S3or98pc/s1600/images+(3).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"271\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-magsre9XuvU/UJczLj52s-I/AAAAAAAAWvU/_K3S3or98pc/s320/images+(3).jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Pope in the Middle\nAges approved using boiling water to detect liars as it was believed honest men\nwould withstand it better than liars.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The polygraph was\ninvented in 1921 by John Augustus Larson, a medical student at the University\nof California at Berkeley . Lie detectors are NOT admissible in court, because they\nare not perfect.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">One of the most\nprolific serial killers in U.S. history passed the polygraph and killed again.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Refusal to submit to a\npolygraph is generally not admissible in court, and polygraphs themselves are\nalways inadmissible.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-RI9TcKG4XPA/UJczeDM69KI/AAAAAAAAWvc/LStV2vUhjO8/s1600/hjkp.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"190\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-RI9TcKG4XPA/UJczeDM69KI/AAAAAAAAWvc/LStV2vUhjO8/s320/hjkp.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The polygraph pens\ndon't do a special dance when a person lies. The polygrapher scores the test by\ncomparing physiological responses (breathing, blood pressure, heart, and\nperspiration rates) to a calibrated base.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">If no difference is\nfound between relevant and control questions, the test result is considered\n\"inconclusive.\"</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You can defeat a polygraph\nby sneaking a tack in your shoe or puckering your a$$hole sphincter muscles. When the interviewer asks you a control\nquestion, like \"Is your name Mr Bumpkin \" sharply press on the tack\nwith your toe. The pain response will throw off all the sensors looking for\nchanges in heartbeat and breath. The only way you can tell if he's lying is to\nwait for him to screw up. Liars always do.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">On May 5, 2010, The\nSupreme Court of India declared use of narcoanalysis, brain mapping and\npolygraph tests on suspects as illegal and against the constitution. Article\n20(3) of the Indian Constitution-\"No person accused of any offence shall\nbe compelled to be a witness against himself.\" Polygraph tests are still\nlegal if the defendant requests one.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You could tickle the upper palate using the tip of your tongue when you give a honest answer to screw the polygraph machine.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Or you could do mental\narithmetic, thinking exciting sexual orgy thoughts, altering your breathing\npattern, or simply biting the side of the tongue.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Develop a breathing\nstrategy. Solve a quadratic equation in your head d</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">uring\ncontrol questions.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Modern polygraphs will\nalso record things like arm and leg movement. They will also have soft seats to\ncheckmate you from puckering your a$$hole. They could make you remove your shoes\nand throw the tack out.&nbsp; Skin\nconductivity (called the galvanic skin or electrodermal response) is measured\nthrough electrodes attached to a subject's fingertips.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-p8DUcum0P-s/UJc3Z9w678I/AAAAAAAAWwc/OYG_VRZfoDw/s1600/kkhgg.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-p8DUcum0P-s/UJc3Z9w678I/AAAAAAAAWwc/OYG_VRZfoDw/s1600/kkhgg.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The job of polygraphers\nis to extract confessions, and in one way, the whole examination is a complex\nruse to trick you into confessing something. &nbsp;The polygrapher will most likely try to\nconvince you that he she can \u201csee\u201d a lie in your polygraph, even if there\u2019s\nnothing abnormal there. Don\u2019t fall for this bait.</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If your polygraph is\npart of a criminal investigation, you have a right to refuse , and you should\nrefuse, even if you are innocent, because of the possibilities of a \u201cfalse\npositive.\u201d&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">If I had my way, I\nwould ban every lawyer from becoming a Minister. &nbsp;Most of the criminals have\ngood qualities like \u201cnamak halal \u201c ( gratitude ) and being \u201cwajan ka pakka\u201d (\nhonour a promise ). &nbsp;&nbsp;How many of you feel\nthat lawyers are NOT ungrateful, &nbsp;pathological\nliars?</span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What is a WHITE LIE? &nbsp; It is a lie told, to protect others. You see, the white men have made sure everything white is good and everything black is bad. &nbsp;So you can wear a white coat and walk in anywhere. Nobody will stop you.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-bgWscMqkPJ4/UJcy7QUmknI/AAAAAAAAWvE/PQHXa1HY-2o/s1600/imageshhii.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even laughing at a joke which is NOT funny, just to please somebody is a lie. &nbsp;Thanking a person when there is nothing to thank him for is a lie.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\">Dom Arigato Gozaimasu.</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">..</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt. Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "76", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/6686938403621571165/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "1865772224913641145", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2012-11-03T07:40:00+05:30", "updated": "2015-03-13T19:57:38+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxNDI2MjU2ODU4NjkyCm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/11/the-haunting-and-eerie-melodies-from.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/1865772224913641145", "title": "THE HAUNTING AND EERIE MELODIES FROM PANPIPES- CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>THE HAUNTING AND EERIE MELODIES FROM PANPIPES</b></span> - CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ejc5h3YF_UU/UJR8PLSieiI/AAAAAAAAWrU/LuOoPkM-wOs/s1600/downloadftrrd.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ejc5h3YF_UU/UJR8PLSieiI/AAAAAAAAWrU/LuOoPkM-wOs/s1600/downloadftrrd.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<i><span style=\"color: red;\">Above: This Bolivian is playing a DOUBLE decker. --requires talent!</span></i><br />\n<i><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></i>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-pdREdBmpwCY/VQLyelbqcRI/AAAAAAAA2Hs/P5VQq3tnxYU/s1600/183d.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-pdREdBmpwCY/VQLyelbqcRI/AAAAAAAA2Hs/P5VQq3tnxYU/s1600/183d.jpg\" height=\"340\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\nI fell in love with panpipes when I stayed for two months at Trogir ( near Split Croatia ) , before taking delivery of a brand new Chemical tanker.<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-WwjpMhSqXqc/UJR8aBfHy-I/AAAAAAAAWrc/Cf3AUeHgPUk/s1600/ajit+1.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-WwjpMhSqXqc/UJR8aBfHy-I/AAAAAAAAWrc/Cf3AUeHgPUk/s400/ajit+1.JPG\" height=\"480\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\nIn the evening myself and my Canadian Chief Engineer used to walk down from our hotel , to the&nbsp;riviera, a 10 minute stroll. <br />\n<br />\nThe whole area used to be crowded chock-a-block with tourists from Europe and Scandinavia ( May and June vacation season ). &nbsp;Tourists come all the way by chartered buses from as far way as Estonia.<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-obk--x3aq9E/UJR8imiticI/AAAAAAAAWrk/VrFgBCKRBvE/s1600/ajit+3.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-obk--x3aq9E/UJR8imiticI/AAAAAAAAWrk/VrFgBCKRBvE/s400/ajit+3.JPG\" height=\"480\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\nThere we used to walk past the well lit seafront at 8 PM with thousands of tourists who have come to this summer get away resort, to enjoy. Girls are all in skimpy dresses, as it is warm.<br />\n<br />\nThe best yachts you can ever see used to be lined up at the berth.<br />\n<br />\nOur daily routine was-- to have a couple of beers have a nice heavy dinner, and go back to our hotel, &nbsp;from where the seafront was just 30 metres away.<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Crer8dAcXt8/UJR8pb7o1sI/AAAAAAAAWrs/vDM9jaH8KJI/s1600/DSCF5753.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Crer8dAcXt8/UJR8pb7o1sI/AAAAAAAAWrs/vDM9jaH8KJI/s400/DSCF5753.JPG\" height=\"480\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\nThe sea water is so clear, blue and salty there. The dense sea water allows you to lie down and float.<br />\n<br />\nBefore going for dinner, we used to stop at a place where two Bolivians from the Andes played the panpipes. They were professionals, and they come here every year, to mint money.<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-wI9J33R9B_s/VQLzE_1Mg4I/AAAAAAAA2H0/8DYsPmA9Cfs/s1600/IM2cG_5161.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-wI9J33R9B_s/VQLzE_1Mg4I/AAAAAAAA2H0/8DYsPmA9Cfs/s1600/IM2cG_5161.jpg\" height=\"422\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\nAfter a few days I noticed that I was the most&nbsp;honored&nbsp;man in the audience. The moment the musician duo saw us coming they would wave out to me. &nbsp;And in between the songs , they used to make it a point to exchange small talk with me.<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-yeG8axDirEU/VQLx5WlM5WI/AAAAAAAA2Hk/pRlDTqa1lJw/s1600/do4wnload%2B(1).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-yeG8axDirEU/VQLx5WlM5WI/AAAAAAAA2Hk/pRlDTqa1lJw/s1600/do4wnload%2B(1).jpg\" height=\"262\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\nOne day while having our beers,I asked my Chief Engineer \"Why do the Bolivians like me so much?\"<br />\n<br />\nAt the time the Norwegian Framo Engineer who was a guest on our boozing up table asked \" Captain have you not noticed that you are the ONLY dark skinned man on the seafront for the past month ? &nbsp;As you walk past everybody keeps looking at you \".<br />\n<br />\nMy chief Engineer agreed \" Yes, sometimes I used to feel jealous, why all are keep staring at Captain and not at me\"<br />\n<br />\nAnd then I reminisced --yes-- he was right-- &nbsp;every single soul was white , except me , in fact in the whole of Trogir. &nbsp;This area was an expensive one, and only rich white tourists came here.<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-NMFahhSCHeA/VQLzze6OwaI/AAAAAAAA2H8/7z0zcMh7hk0/s1600/6a00d8343v1e1cb753ef00e54f4ac2208834-500wi.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-NMFahhSCHeA/VQLzze6OwaI/AAAAAAAA2H8/7z0zcMh7hk0/s1600/6a00d8343v1e1cb753ef00e54f4ac2208834-500wi.jpg\" height=\"480\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\nIn the shipyard my nickname was SANDOKAN, behind my back . &nbsp;Apparently&nbsp;he was supposed to be a dark skinned pirate. <br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Gi94KVuc4co/UJR71qxINOI/AAAAAAAAWrE/OC-0U0Dp42A/s1600/imagesnjj887.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Gi94KVuc4co/UJR71qxINOI/AAAAAAAAWrE/OC-0U0Dp42A/s1600/imagesnjj887.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\nI guess , Capt Jack Sparrow ( Johnny Depp ) never came anywhere close to Sandokan, &nbsp;in revving the motors of the European women-- <span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>red hot</b></span>-- &nbsp;forcing them to lift their hood..<br />\n<br />\nCapt Jack Sparrow was only for boy kids.<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-iK_xnIVuQSU/UJR8D7F2aPI/AAAAAAAAWrM/iwI5CgF5Yms/s1600/dfgg.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-iK_xnIVuQSU/UJR8D7F2aPI/AAAAAAAAWrM/iwI5CgF5Yms/s1600/dfgg.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\nAnyway, the day the Bolivians went back home to their beloved Andes, having made their dough, they gave &nbsp;me an expensive panpipe at a discount.<br />\n<br />\nCant imagine , CIA trained the GREEN BERETS to smoke out Che&nbsp;Guevara&nbsp;in these rugged parts.<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-OFt2fsSal_w/UJR7htLv8UI/AAAAAAAAWq0/jgtfE82uRJU/s1600/downloadUII88.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-OFt2fsSal_w/UJR7htLv8UI/AAAAAAAAWq0/jgtfE82uRJU/s400/downloadUII88.jpg\" height=\"278\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\nSome woman in a farm who gave him some eggs, sneaked . Even today CIA does NOT accept their part in this capture of a legend.<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-5X6rMYaY0MQ/UJR7s8v8KII/AAAAAAAAWq8/y0hDr4JxPxA/s1600/imagesHHJI9O.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-5X6rMYaY0MQ/UJR7s8v8KII/AAAAAAAAWq8/y0hDr4JxPxA/s1600/imagesHHJI9O.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\nI would like all of you to read this post&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">SPIRIT AND CHE GUEVARA- VADAKAYIL</span></b>. &nbsp;Punch this into Google search.<br />\n<br />\nOnly one in a BILLION can be a Che Guevara.<br />\n<br />\nWell , well, what do you know?<br />\n<br />\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Below the bones of Che\nGuevara , sans hands exhumed after 30 years . &nbsp;Che\u2019s hands were chopped off by CIA and sent to\nFidel Castro in Formaldehyde, just to taunt him.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Gary Prado, the captain\nwho commanded the Bolivian Ranger company that captured Che, and who later rose\nto the rank of general, insisted for years that the body had been cremated and\nthe ashes scattered in the jungle. <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>Jubilation erupted when\nthe handless body was exhumed. &nbsp;There will never ever be such a rapturous occasion again-- on this planet.</b><o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-j6g_jbU5HS8/UJXOWRgyDyI/AAAAAAAAWtM/vRgPP7F5OnE/s1600/eeeed.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-j6g_jbU5HS8/UJXOWRgyDyI/AAAAAAAAWtM/vRgPP7F5OnE/s400/eeeed.jpg\" height=\"317\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>In the dead of\nnight , a convoy of 10 vehicles made a five-hour, 150-mile dash at breakneck\nspeeds along treacherous mountain roads to transfer the remains to the provincial\ncapital of Santa Cruz\u2014as if they were in a race rally. &nbsp;</b></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><br /></b></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">Such was the passion the bones of Che generated.</span></b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">There, the handless\nremains were quickly identified.&nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-RXtbNvBaXMo/UJXOrklY6MI/AAAAAAAAWtU/6G4a8QwpUUM/s1600/downloadffffer.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-RXtbNvBaXMo/UJXOrklY6MI/AAAAAAAAWtU/6G4a8QwpUUM/s400/downloadffffer.jpg\" height=\"246\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The excavated teeth perfectly matched a\nplaster mold of Che's teeth made in Havana before he left for the Congo so that\nhe could be identified if he died in combat.</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\nI tried playing that huge panpipe &nbsp;-- I never could. &nbsp;Then I forgot to bring it home, --for I forgot to put it into my suitcase when I signed off the ship.<br />\n<br />\nEven today , one of my elusive dreams is to be a HAUNTING panpipe player who can hold an entire audience in a trance.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">Nobody will even dare to breathe hard -- such is the magic. &nbsp;Here there is NO waving hands, and all that nonsense. &nbsp;All will be still, misty eyed and flush faced.</span><br />\n<br />\nPeople listen, spellbound.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><b>ENJOY!</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://3.gvt0.com/vi/lbWlYz9Zv5c/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/lbWlYz9Zv5c&fs=1&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/lbWlYz9Zv5c&fs=1&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: red;\"><b>Above--how to play it--tutorial.</b></span></i></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></i></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-size: 12.0pt;\">I kept my promise<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Don't keep your distance</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">And as for fortune, and as for fame<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">They are illusions<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">They are not the solutions they promised\nto be<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">The answer was here all the time<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Don't cry for me Argentina<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<i><span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18px; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://1.gvt0.com/vi/7ypK6hvI9zU/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/7ypK6hvI9zU&fs=1&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/7ypK6hvI9zU&fs=1&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<div>\n<i><span style=\"color: red;\"><b><br /></b></span></i></div>\n<div>\n<i><b><span style=\"color: red;\">Above- Titanic ( &nbsp;Intimidating--&nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\">YIKES!!!!!</span><span style=\"color: red;\"> )</span></b></i></div>\n<div>\n<i><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></i></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://2.gvt0.com/vi/0Fjeoo7RRQo/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/0Fjeoo7RRQo&fs=1&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/0Fjeoo7RRQo&fs=1&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<div>\n<i><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></i></div>\n<div>\n<i><b><span style=\"color: red;\">Above- I have a dream ( ABBA-- </span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">close your eyes and put head phones on</span><span style=\"color: red;\"> )&nbsp;</span></b></i></div>\n<div>\n<i><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></i></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Panpipe is based on the\nprinciple of the closed tube, consisting usually of five or more pipes of\ngradually increasing length (and, at times, girth). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The pan flute's tubes\nare stopped at one end, at which the standing wave is reflected giving a note\nan octave lower than that produced by an open pipe of equal length.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After every song they\ntune the pipes electronically , by dropping a small ball into one of the tubes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The pan flute is played\nby blowing horizontally across the open end against the sharp inner edge of the\npipes.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They use the technique of both tilting the pipes and jaw movement, thus\nreducing the size of the pipe's opening and producing a change in pitch. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An advanced player can\nplay any scale and in any key. There are two styles of vibrato possible, hand\nvibrato and breath vibrato. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In hand vibrato, the\nplayer applies a gentle motion to one end of the pan flute (usually the high\nend) in much the same way as the violin vibrato is achieved by rocking the hand\nfrom the wrist. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Breath vibrato is the\nsame technique used by players of the flute and other woodwinds by use of the\nplayer's diaphragm.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Below:--The cosmic mind of Shiva-- Grace and peace!</i></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://0.gvt0.com/vi/iMZUh8mCp-A/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/iMZUh8mCp-A&fs=1&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/iMZUh8mCp-A&fs=1&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;;
