text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-oSnHjkxKTCE/UJM0PKN9qKI/AAAAAAAAWiI/phjICGKExmE/s1600/newton3r.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"298\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-oSnHjkxKTCE/UJM0PKN9qKI/AAAAAAAAWiI/phjICGKExmE/s400/newton3r.gif\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only in this Digital Age\nand with the Internet information super highway could the Streisand Effect exist.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The nature of social\nmedia ( with shares and retweets giving information ze perpetual life ) &nbsp;makes the\nStreisand Effect more ubiquitous than ever.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif; font-size: large;\"><i>So, what is this <span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">\"Streisand effect\"</span> - meme, &nbsp;all about ?</i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif; font-size: large;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-YEvQenGekZ0/UJM0bo1vRQI/AAAAAAAAWiQ/6RdIA24ONXI/s1600/7hioF.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"345\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-YEvQenGekZ0/UJM0bo1vRQI/AAAAAAAAWiQ/6RdIA24ONXI/s400/7hioF.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Barbara Streisand\u2019s\nlawyers tried to force Kenneth Adelman and Pictopia.com to remove a photo of her palatial Malibu home, &nbsp;that was among a collection of 12,000 photos\nof the California coastline.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The photo had been accessed six times when the\nlawsuit was filed, four times by her own lawyer. &nbsp;After news of the lawsuit went national, the\nphoto was viewed nearly 500,000 times.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This was not even some\nfrisky paparazzo taking pictures specifically of her goodies \u2013nay\u2014nose, while\nat the pool side. Rather, it was part of the California Coastal Records\nProject, a government-commissioned photographic study of the entire California\ncoast. &nbsp;And she sued for 50 million daallerzs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Adding insult to injury, the lawsuit was\nthrown out.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: x-large;\"><b> TEE HEEEE!!</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-dYlYWG0Amig/UJM1HLXcqVI/AAAAAAAAWiY/sWaV6_hbiBY/s1600/nhgggtyu.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"260\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-dYlYWG0Amig/UJM1HLXcqVI/AAAAAAAAWiY/sWaV6_hbiBY/s400/nhgggtyu.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The term is a modern\nexpression of the older phenomenon that banning or censoring something often\nmakes that item or information more desirable, and leads to it being actively\nsought out to a greater extent than it would have otherwise been\u2014 and with large hearted Internet available, it goes viral.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<b style=\"color: blue; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: x-large; line-height: 150%;\">How people organically\ntalk about you, your company, your brand or your bank balance, doesn\u2019t make or\nbreak your reputation in this Digital Age \u2014&nbsp;</b><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Till then nobody gave a\ndang about Barbara baby, her weird nose and her fancy bungalow on the cliff.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-VmELE2-KP6c/UJNuHkbukZI/AAAAAAAAWpM/hEkgF6oM3iU/s1600/fffde.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-VmELE2-KP6c/UJNuHkbukZI/AAAAAAAAWpM/hEkgF6oM3iU/s400/fffde.jpg\" width=\"265\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An industrialist was\narrested on Tuesday on charges of posting \"offensive remarks\" on\nUnion finance minister P Chidambaram's son Karti Chidambaram on micro-blogging\nsite Twitter.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">S Ravi, 46, in a tweet on\nOctober 19 2012,&nbsp; alleged that Karti\nChidambaram had \"amassed\" more wealth than Robert Vadra, UPA\nchairperson Sonia Gandhi's son-in-law.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karti Chidambaram lodged a complaint and Ravi was booked under Section\n66 (1) (hacking with computer system) of the Information Technology Act.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Police arrested Ravi and produced him before\nchief judicial magistrate, who granted him bail. If convicted, the\nindustrialist faces imprisonment up to three years or a fine or both.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is a self\ninflicted goal.&nbsp;&nbsp; In a single stroke,\nKarti has ensured that his father will NOT win the next elections in 2014 \u2014 and\nhe has also ensured that from now on , the whole of India will be keeping a\nhawk\u2019s eye on his \u201cbusiness\u201d dealings.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This\nman Ravi had a Twitter following of 12, out of which half were his relatives.\nToday every Indian who watches TV knows our man Ravi-- and poor Thiru Karti has painted himself\ninto a corner..<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">This planet is now obsessed\nwith the latest celebrity gossip, &nbsp;a gross\ndislike for brutal censorship from uppity folks, and then there is always this\ndelicious innate human inquisitiveness. There aint no goin\u2019 back\u2014it is for\nkeeps!.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>The faster apna Karti baby knows and understands this new founded Internet thingy the better.&nbsp;</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><i style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></i></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><i style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Suppress to exacerbate</i>, is the name of this Internet mantra.</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-TPU8T20TzwI/UJNYa3AI4hI/AAAAAAAAWnU/8IWhN8OFLnM/s1600/imagesvhhj.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-TPU8T20TzwI/UJNYa3AI4hI/AAAAAAAAWnU/8IWhN8OFLnM/s1600/imagesvhhj.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Well, ladies and\ngentlemen , this is the miserable condition of India in 2012.&nbsp;</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>We Indians claim\nto be the world\u2019s largest democracy, yet we choose among rotten eggs.&nbsp;&nbsp;</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Every country on this planet knows how much\ninner party democracy there is in India, when it comes to major decisions like\nchoosing the President of India or the Prime Minister of India or high profile\ncabinet Ministers \u2014 leave alone Indians. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Streisand effect is\nan internet-coined name ( although the effect predates the popular usage of the\ninternet ) for a PARADOX phenomenon whereby an attempt to censor or gag a\nreport has led to great interest in the story or work that nobody would have\nnoticed , had they not attempted to ban or censor the story or work.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the modern world of\nblogs, there are no shortages of such examples, &nbsp;as blogs have become a main\nmeans whereby people speak out, and often have a network of friends or\ncollaborators just waiting to get pissed off - if one is censored, it will\nquickly be picked up by another, and then it snowballs.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Censorship on Internet, is obviously seen as an assault on\n-nay -assassination of free speech, and it is usually this aspect that attracts\nthe attention, rather than the nature of the story itself - indeed, many of the\nstories are downright boring compared to the ensuing sh#tstorm about\ncensorship.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is no law out\nthere that is a silver bullet for getting rid of everything you don\u2019t like on\nthe Web and that, if you try to treat it as such, there\u2019s a decent chance that\nyou could find out just how difficult it is to make the Web bend to your will\n( and how hard it can snap back and bloody your nose and your personal brand ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch \u201cSanthosh Pandit\u201d and you will find 7.6 millions posts. &nbsp;Abhisekh\nBachchan who has been in Bollywood movies for 12 years as a hero has only 2.9 million and\nthat too, only because his name is associated with his more famous father, wife and\nmother.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pandit made a very bad Malayalam movie , and it got such bad reviews, &nbsp;that it became a hit. &nbsp;Cinema halls in\nKerala are full -- all with young educated men. Women are afraid to go to the\ntheatre , as the audience cheers , booes, claps and whistles throughout the movie.\nThe movie is NONSENSE, and some guys wear motorcycle helmets to avoid being\nseen watching this crap.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Santosh will even put the camera out of focus or off\ntarget to piss you off.&nbsp; Suddenly you\nwill see the grass and ants instead of the actor. And the people love him.&nbsp; 3 hours of unadulterated madness and crazed\ncheering from die hard fans- - better to do so than squirm in your seats,\nright?&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You must understand that Kerala movie going public is generally more\nintelligent than the rest of India. That is why when the whole of India burns\nwith race and religions riots, &nbsp;nothing happens here.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His dialogues are\nridiculous.&nbsp; He takes Plain Jane\nheroines. He cant sing for nuts, yet he sings all the songs in his movies. &nbsp;Santosh Pandit with a 4 decades \u201cmisplaced back\nin time fashion sense\u201d is the hero in all his movies. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">He is targeted on face book and twitter. &nbsp;When he goes to&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">inaugurate</span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;show rooms people throw eggs on him. &nbsp;</span></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">Since\nthe advent of DVDs' cinema halls running mainstream Malayalam movies with mega\nheroes are rarely houseful.&nbsp;</span></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The proof of a pudding lies in the eating\u2014every\nMaster Chef knows that. &nbsp;Nobody is gonna\neat it if he is gonna puke and choke on it. &nbsp;After eating too many rasgollas , we sometimes\ncrave for a chilly Kondattam.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">During the last Michael\nJackson trial, Tonight Show host Jay Leno made the requisite jokes about\nJackson being a pedophile, and Jackson obtained a gag order on the grounds that\nLeno was a witness in the case. The judge eventually ruled that Leno could make\njokes about Jackson as long as he didn't discuss his testimony.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Meanwhile, Leno\ncircumvented the order by having guest comedians come on and make the jokes for\nhim, and celebrated the lifting of the gag order by doing a monologue\nconsisting entirely of jokes about Michael Jackson.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ryan Giggs was already\nworld famous as a footballer for Manchester United - and then he decided to\ntake on Twitter. He sued the site after a user revealed that he was the subject\nof an anonymous privacy injunction - commonly known as a super-injunction -\npreventing the publication of details regarding an alleged affair with model\nImogen Thomas.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the video below Hilter's secretary has a secret affair with Giggs--<b>TEE HEEEE!</b> (<i> hope Giggs will NOT sue me</i> )&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://3.gvt0.com/vi/6b-s4xQfZ_M/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/6b-s4xQfZ_M&fs=1&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/6b-s4xQfZ_M&fs=1&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ryan Giggs's attempts to hide his identity in the story of his\nalleged affair were scuppered by Twitter.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, this legal action greatly\noffended the \"twitterati\" or at least 75,000 of them, who\nsubsequently retweeted - or republished - Giggs's name and affair claim around\nthe site. It posed a challenge to Giggs and to the law, to see if they were\nboth willing to chase an ever-growing number of microbloggers for their\npublication of his name in this particular context.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>Hey, Karti saar, and\nChid paaji, &nbsp;sometimes it's best to pick\nyour battles, or platform using wisdom, like Bill Clinton of Monika Lewisnky fame .&nbsp;</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-FaPDr1y05V4/UJNIY48TNxI/AAAAAAAAWj0/fAgcetp7NAg/s1600/downloadbhhjkk.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Who ever knew of a folk hero Aseem Trivedi , the quintessential average cartoonist, before he was arrested for --hold your breath-- sedition ?</span><b style=\"color: red;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</b><span style=\"color: purple;\">He is now strutting around in shiny pointy shoes , in the house of Bigg Boss 6.</span></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>Who ever heard of a tsunami in India till 2004. &nbsp;Thanks to you, in India we shall rename Streisand effect as THE <span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Karti effect</span>.</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Streisand Effect usually\nstarts with social media and spread to mainstream media. Obviously, targeting\nsomeone who is social media savvy increases the risk of a spectacular domino Streisand\nEffect.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">How you respond in a\nmature and intelligent manner, to the way people talk about your personal brand\nhas a much greater effect on your reputation. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is a daunting task with today\u2019s\nunfathomably massive and torrential flow of Internet &nbsp;information to direct or control a message. &nbsp;In more cases than not, it\u2019s more effective to\nembrace the way people are talking about you, if you are in public life. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>People do NOT believe everything what is\nprinted in the \"free for all\" Internet maidan -- &nbsp; unless they are idiots of the first order !!&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Internet\nis NOT a peer reviewed magazine owned by Rothschild. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is the charm of the electronic social media.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some time I myself make an aggressive comment on the Internet and derive a lot\nof fun, when people respond like dorks in a knee jerk manner. </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In fact my last line would be \u2018<b>DORKS SHALL\nFETCH</b>' \u2013 it requires intelligence to understand this ( ever heard of a dog fetching\nwhat you have thrown \u2013or an echo ?) . </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Like\nwhat the saint in the graveyard,</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">told Amitabh\nBachchan &nbsp;(holding a dead Rekha in his arm s) &nbsp;in the Bollywood movie Mukkaddar Ka Sikkandar\u2014 </span><i style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">dard ko gale se lagaa, dard ko apna le beta !.</i><br />\n<i style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-KRl92-Y71p8/UJNZYxznKvI/AAAAAAAAWnc/vUEWEOdjsB0/s1600/imagesffff.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"146\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-KRl92-Y71p8/UJNZYxznKvI/AAAAAAAAWnc/vUEWEOdjsB0/s400/imagesffff.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<i style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Would anybody have\nknown about &nbsp;Salman Rushdie's and his\nverbose and complex The Satanic Verses , ever? &nbsp;&nbsp;This\nspooky loonin\u2019 guy became a celebrity , got invites to the Queen\u2019s box, got for\nhimself &nbsp;a fortune and wrangled an\nattractive wife. Any attempt at suppressing some books turned them into instant\nbest-sellers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In October 2009, Ralph\nLauren issued a DMCA complaint against Photoshop Disasters for criticising and\nreposting some of their advertising. Although the company later apologised for\nthe shoddy photoshopping, they went and did an encore a few weeks later.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If there is a fine they will pay it, &nbsp;if they have to go to jail they will gladly go\nskippety skip. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They cannot give you 100\nlashes , or cut off your family jewels, in the year 2012 , right? &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">See in business and politics, nothing succeeds\nlike success.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So-called \"gag\norders\" and \"super injunctions\" are designed by courts to limit\nthe effect. These orders prevent the press not just from reporting an incident,\nbut also from reporting or hinting that they've been prevented from reporting\nit! &nbsp;These are often used in privacy or\nlibel battles, but if overturned or lifted, the Streisand Effect is free to\ncome out in full force. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Indeed, it often\ncomes out in fuller force thanks to the nature of the super-injunctions limits\non free speech. &nbsp;Applying for, and\nfailing to achieve, a super-injunction in court often leads to greater\npublicity for a scandal.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-BNu18VN1fdk/UJNOpBeFgWI/AAAAAAAAWlo/8Ra7kbVegRY/s1600/images99900k.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"239\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-BNu18VN1fdk/UJNOpBeFgWI/AAAAAAAAWlo/8Ra7kbVegRY/s320/images99900k.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In December 2010, the\nwebsite WikiLeaks was the subject of DoS attacks and rejection from ISPs as a\nconsequence of the United States cable leaks.&nbsp;\nPeople sympathetic to WikiLeaks' cause and admiring Julian Assange\u2019s bal#s\nof steel , which clanged to create sparks, voluntarily mirrored the website in\norder to make it impossible for any one person to completely remove the cables.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kim Kardashian has lately\nbeing staging ze \u201c Streisand effect in reverse\u201d , with her leaked sex tapes, starring herself and &nbsp;well\nendowed rapper Ray J. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-jDn0tzM6LqA/UJNZy436MUI/AAAAAAAAWnk/QKBvq-BlgeE/s1600/downloadvfrrr.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-jDn0tzM6LqA/UJNZy436MUI/AAAAAAAAWnk/QKBvq-BlgeE/s400/downloadvfrrr.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Do we look stupid to you, Kim, baby ? &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Did you say Yeah? &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ok then-- where is mE banana ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-96UOufwkICE/UJNIiKOSOsI/AAAAAAAAWj8/L3Tdomc9Dco/s1600/bnm,..jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-96UOufwkICE/UJNIiKOSOsI/AAAAAAAAWj8/L3Tdomc9Dco/s1600/bnm,..jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Streisand Effects are\nmost common when the person doing the silencing is seen as either being a \u201chigh\nand mighty\u201d corrupt man silencing a smaller one or someone who is otherwise\nabusing power. &nbsp;While this isn\u2019t always\ntrue, &nbsp;most who fall victim to the effect\nare either celebrities or large gung ho companies.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No one likes\ncensorship\u2014especially on the Internet. &nbsp;Transparency\nis the expectation, and when that is challenged, &nbsp;the outcome seldom favors those trying to\nsuppress the information. The bitter lesson is that you can no longer hide from\nthe truth on the net.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Those in public life with no truth to hide from will be\nfine. But those who try beware: The Streisand effect looms large. Nobody\ntargets a nice private citizen.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Here is the psychology ,\nall free . &nbsp;All humans have innate\ninquisitiveness programmed into their DNA . When this curiosity is mixed with a\nfear of missing the bus, the sneaky feeling something is being hidden from them\nor that someone is overacting to something, it can cause individuals to react\nin mischievous ways that others will support. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-oeQvIC5qIIs/UJNIoflSRVI/AAAAAAAAWkE/TuoA6xPR1YM/s1600/huii.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-oeQvIC5qIIs/UJNIoflSRVI/AAAAAAAAWkE/TuoA6xPR1YM/s400/huii.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Add to this combination with a natural dislike\nfor censorship from evil brands or uppity corrupt power broking individuals \u2013\nit becomes a heady mix .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Psychologists have done\nstudies and found that the subjects' desire for any kind of potentially\ncensor-able material increased when the subjects were told that it was\ncensored. &nbsp;The old Forbidden Fruit\nprinciple in action, in other words. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Banning any discussion\nor otherwise trying to close down a discussion will typically serve only to\nmake more people aware of it. &nbsp;The\n\u2018banning\u2019 becomes the new story and a much bigger and more important discussion.\n&nbsp;People forget and do NOT care was the\noriginal bu##shit discussion was all about.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">People will continue to\ndiscuss things online, as humans tend to disagree. They will discuss issues which\nmay not be in consonance with your &nbsp;preferred line of thinking. &nbsp;Many of these harmless discussions will be\nbetween small groups of people , and it dies a natural death after it runs out\nof passion, &nbsp;or steam. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-y3NCIK4lAVo/UJNWkihAGJI/AAAAAAAAWnM/Gr8M_GEeGSw/s1600/downloadcccfft.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-y3NCIK4lAVo/UJNWkihAGJI/AAAAAAAAWnM/Gr8M_GEeGSw/s1600/downloadcccfft.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 16px;\">You will only give it a much larger undeserving audience and convert it to a growing deadly hurricane ( which may consume you and your personal brand ) if you join try to throw a high profile spanner in the works, in a \u201ctake me if you can\u201d or \u201cdon\u2019t mess with me\u201d manner.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-V4yoflPpChU/UJNWHwcuc5I/AAAAAAAAWnE/fChyh5Lku70/s1600/fhjklo.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; line-height: 150%;\">CPR can be a one man\njob.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">15 external heart compressions at\n19 times per minute and 2 blows.&nbsp; If the\npatient has a regular heart beat , don\u2019t give heart compressions.&nbsp; And if he is breathing there is no need to\nblow.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-bTQZParCplk/UJJyyj8cMpI/AAAAAAAAWck/1MTwR1t4MH0/s1600/HHJHTTT.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-bTQZParCplk/UJJyyj8cMpI/AAAAAAAAWck/1MTwR1t4MH0/s1600/HHJHTTT.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only a proportion of the air\nexhaled is carbon dioxide there is plenty of Oxygen there to do what is\nrequired under normal circumstances. People don't use all of the oxygen they\nbreath in, a % of it is blown right back out of the body again.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">SO WHEN YOU DO CPR, &nbsp;DONT CONSUME ALL THE OXYGEN YOURSELF, BY HOLDING YOUR BREATH IN YOUR OWN LUNGS , BEFORE BLOWING OUT.</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-JdQYHEJbbSA/UJJy7zX-JnI/AAAAAAAAWc0/oeLW9vXSncc/s1600/downloadGGYYY.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-JdQYHEJbbSA/UJJy7zX-JnI/AAAAAAAAWc0/oeLW9vXSncc/s1600/downloadGGYYY.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cardiopulmonary\nresuscitation (CPR) is an emergency medical procedure for a victim of cardiac\narrest or, in some circumstances, respiratory arrest. &nbsp;CPR involves physical\ninterventions to create artificial circulation through rhythmic pressing on the\npatient's chest to manually pump blood through the heart, called chest\ncompressions, and usually also involves the rescuer exhaling into the patient\n(or using a device to simulate this) to inflate the lungs and pass oxygen in to\nthe blood, called artificial respiration. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-zq49jVlmTdA/UJJy4J5RHAI/AAAAAAAAWcs/iLsCFnT5m0o/s1600/downloadH5U6IT.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-zq49jVlmTdA/UJJy4J5RHAI/AAAAAAAAWcs/iLsCFnT5m0o/s1600/downloadH5U6IT.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CPR is unlikely to\nrestart the heart, but rather its purpose is to maintain a flow of oxygenated\nblood to the brain and the heart, thereby delaying tissue death and extending\nthe brief window of opportunity for a successful resuscitation without\npermanent brain damage.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-imE4muFZvM4/UJJzMXQqe7I/AAAAAAAAWdE/PtqUSvI-2rc/s1600/downloadKL;'U7Y.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"222\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-imE4muFZvM4/UJJzMXQqe7I/AAAAAAAAWdE/PtqUSvI-2rc/s320/downloadKL;'U7Y.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Advanced life support and defibrillation, the\nadministration of an electric shock to the heart, is usually needed for the\nheart to restart, CPR is generally continued, until the patient regains a heart\nbeat (called \"return of spontaneous circulation\" or \"ROSC\")\nor is declared dead<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-mTo6BFDxuPY/UJJzA7ub31I/AAAAAAAAWc8/V_GiaJkRFOk/s1600/downloadHHJKP.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-mTo6BFDxuPY/UJJzA7ub31I/AAAAAAAAWc8/V_GiaJkRFOk/s1600/downloadHHJKP.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When cardiac arrest\noccurs, the heart stops pumping blood.&nbsp;\nCPR can support a small amount of blood flow to the heart and brain to\n\u201cbuy time\u201d until normal heart function is restored. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cardiac arrest is often\ncaused by an abnormal heart rhythm called ventricular fibrillation (VF).&nbsp; When VF develops, the heart quivers and\ndoesn't pump blood. The victim in VF cardiac arrest needs CPR and delivery of a\nshock to the heart, called defibrillation.&nbsp;\nDefibrillation eliminates the abnormal VF heart rhythm and allows the\nnormal rhythm to resume.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">AMBU BAG</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A bag valve mask (also\nknown as a BVM or Ambu bag) is a hand-held device used to provide positive\npressure ventilation to a patient who is not breathing or who is breathing\ninadequately. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Tz29eQ2Fs4Q/UJJzSZKhOcI/AAAAAAAAWdM/_noFFkF7Zrw/s1600/downloadTREHD.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"252\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Tz29eQ2Fs4Q/UJJzSZKhOcI/AAAAAAAAWdM/_noFFkF7Zrw/s320/downloadTREHD.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The device is\nself-filling with air, although additional oxygen (O2) can be added. manually\nprovide mechanical ventilation in preference to mouth-to-mouth\nresuscitation.&nbsp; The BVM consists of a\nflexible air chamber, about the size of a rugby ball, attached to a face mask\nvia a shutter valve.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the air chamber or \"bag\" is squeezed, the\ndevice forces air through into the patient's lungs; when the bag is released,\nit self-inflates, drawing in ambient air or a low pressure oxygen flow supplied\nfrom a regulated cylinder, whilst the patient's lungs deflate to the air\nthrough the one way valve.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-zkp9aBwZh8Y/UJJzX8y6OJI/AAAAAAAAWdU/M5h9Fvw7oD8/s1600/imagesHTES.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"196\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-zkp9aBwZh8Y/UJJzX8y6OJI/AAAAAAAAWdU/M5h9Fvw7oD8/s320/imagesHTES.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Squeezing the bag once\nevery 5 seconds for an adult or once every 3 seconds for an infant or child\nprovides an adequate respiratory rate (12 respirations per minute in an adult\nand 20 per minute in a child or infant). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ensure that the mask\nportion of the BVM is properly sealed around the patient's face (that is, to\nensure proper \"mask seal\"); otherwise, air escapes from the mask and\nis not pushed into the lungs.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In order to maintain this protocol, some\nprotocols use a method of ventilation involving two rescuers: one rescuer to\nhold the mask to the patient's face with both hands and ensure a mask seal,\nwhile the other squeezes the bag. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When using a BVM, as\nwith other methods of positive pressure ventilation, there is a risk of\nover-inflating the lungs. This can lead to pressure damage to the lungs\nthemselves, and can also cause air to enter the stomach, causing gastric\ndistention which can make it more difficult to inflate the lungs and which can\ncause the patient to vomit. This can be avoided by care on behalf of the\nrescuer. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">OXYGEN RESUSCITATOR</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every chemical tanker\ncrew member must know how to use the portable oxygen resuscitator with 2 litre\ncompressed oxygen cylinder.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Regular drills&nbsp; must be&nbsp;\nheld on board. Show the effect on human lungs by attaching the bellow,\nwhere oxygen fills the balloon and at a set pressure of the relief valve , how\nit automatically releases the contents and repeats the breathing cycle.The\noperating manual must remain in the kit.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-fZhYQyA1mnI/UJJze_6paaI/AAAAAAAAWdc/K8NEKKjYLUE/s1600/imagesNTRUD.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"336\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-fZhYQyA1mnI/UJJze_6paaI/AAAAAAAAWdc/K8NEKKjYLUE/s400/imagesNTRUD.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The airbottle must\nalways contain the required minimum pressure of 150 bars OR in the green zone ,\nor 30 minutes for&nbsp; an adult. The 2 litre\nbottle can be filled up , by equalizing with a large high pressure, accumulator\nbottle, till the pressure guage does not move anymore.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Making sure that there\nis no mucous or froth in the nose and mouth, caused by chemical&nbsp; allergy , pulmonary odema . If it is indeed\nthere an aspirator (connected to a catheter) , powered by the compressed oxygen\ncan be used to suck it out. Insert the catheter into the nose and mouth and\npress the aspirator button in short pushes.&nbsp;\nYou can see the sucked out contents in the plastic delivery bottle.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-rfmGR7JE3uU/UJJzk0O5llI/AAAAAAAAWdk/Z-62h42m6XI/s1600/imagesRERTOD.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"227\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-rfmGR7JE3uU/UJJzk0O5llI/AAAAAAAAWdk/Z-62h42m6XI/s320/imagesRERTOD.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once the mucous is\ncleared, place the face mask firmly to cover the nose and mouth. Automatic\nresuscitation of positive (+14mm ) and negative pressure ( -8mm ) will start.\nThere is a volume setting for adult/ child and to increase the delivery volume\n. There is as air-oxygen mixing lever, to bring down the oxygen delivered from\n100% , 0.5 LTM to lower values of 21%,&nbsp; 6\nLTM gradually as the patient recovers . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-YMVabDUl6TU/UJJ0UZBKDyI/AAAAAAAAWds/2lvYOUL2qyA/s1600/images;;;UUUU.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-YMVabDUl6TU/UJJ0UZBKDyI/AAAAAAAAWds/2lvYOUL2qyA/s1600/images;;;UUUU.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Long-term exposure to\n100% oxygen is toxic.&nbsp; Several brain\nareas responded to 100 percent oxygen by kicking the hypothalamus into\noverdrive, The hypothalamus overreacted by dumping a massive flood of hormones\nand neurotransmitters into the bloodstream. These chemicals interfere with the\nheart's ability to pump blood and deliver oxygen - the opposite effect you want\nwhen you're trying to resuscitate someone.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To suspend oxygen\nresuscitation, the screw knob of the hose adaptor can be loosened . there is an\nextension tube upto 4 meters long from the cylinder to face mask.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A humidifier operated\nby fresh water can be screwed onto the flow meter, which has&nbsp; a white floating ball inside..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<b><span lang=\"EN-GB\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">MEDICAL EMERGENCIES</span></b><span lang=\"EN-GB\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Calibri&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<table border=\"1\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" class=\"MsoNormalTable\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse; border: none; margin-left: -.95pt; mso-border-alt: double windowtext 4.5pt; mso-padding-alt: 0in 3.55pt 0in 3.55pt; mso-table-layout-alt: fixed; width: 639px;\">\n <tbody>\n<tr>\n  <td style=\"background: #DFDFDF; border-bottom: none; border-left: solid windowtext 1.0pt; border-right: none; border-top: solid windowtext 1.0pt; mso-border-left-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; mso-border-top-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Note:<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Master must not hesitate to seek radio\nmedical assistance for chemical poisoning and injury cases. If proper treatment\nis given in good time recovery will be faster.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Never give Morphine to a person who has\nbeen gassed&nbsp; especially by irritant\ngases.. For all poisoning you can give a glass of milk. Milk should NOT be\ngiven for degreasing solvents and Chlorinated Hydrocarbon poisoning.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Carbon Monoxide poisoning makes the lips\nbright red and the face pink. Toxic and noxious gases have distinctive odours\nexcept Carbon Monoxide. CO causes chemical asphyxiation by restricting O2 in\nblood. TLV/ 25ppm<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Pulmonary odema:&nbsp; Fluid collects in lungs and you have\ndifficulty in breathing or lying flat. Caused by inhalation of certain gases or\nby vomited matter going into lungs. It can be delayed by as much as 2\ndays.&nbsp; Use a Guedel airway which can\nvacuum out froth from the airway. If the patient is conscious he must be kept\nin a sitting up position and if unconscious kept in the three prone position.\nThe medicine used is Furosemide.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Anaphylaxis is allergy and swelling of\ntissue which can be fatal.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">H2S gas has odour\nthreshold &nbsp;of less than 1 ppm. Rapid paralyses sense of smell. TLV/ 10 ppm. Heavier than air, eyes get sensitive to\nlight.&nbsp; Metallic taste in mouth, head\nache , vomiting , diarrhoea, paralysis , difficult breathing.</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">TDI and Nitriles enters blood and\nparalyses the nervous system and causes death.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-te8jA1Ggde0/UJJw21mnsaI/AAAAAAAAWcc/sAs24iZLP_k/s1600/PAA7140036.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-te8jA1Ggde0/UJJw21mnsaI/AAAAAAAAWcc/sAs24iZLP_k/s1600/PAA7140036.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt.
